story:
SMART is available for pre-order!

We did it! Thank you to all of our supporters for making our SMART helmet become a reality! 

We are at the final countdown... make sure you get your SMART helmet today:


 

Check our R&D team video:


 

LifeBEAM's New Perk!

Limited edition - An awesome pilot helmet carrier case

 

We got great coverage:

LifeBEAM is proud to present SMART -

The world's first smart cycling helmet with an integrated heart rate sensor, allowing real time, accurate, hassle-free heart-rate monitoring without using a chest strap!

The SMART platform is lightweight and incorporates a microprocessor integrated with LifeBEAM’s advanced algorithm, a state-of-the-art optical physiological sensor, accelerometer, and full wireless communication capabilities.

We Need Your Help!

While we have experience in the Aerospace industry, this is our first consumer facing product, and we need your help to make it a success!

The SMART Solution

We integrated our unique sensor & algorithms, originally developed for fighter pilots & astronauts, into the Lazer’s GENESIS helmet resulting in the SMART – a cycling helmet that provides highly accurate, real time measurements of heart rate under normal as well as extreme physiological conditions without the problems inherent to chest straps. 
The information gathered by the SMART appears in real time on your mobile phone, sport watch or cycling computer via ANT+ or Bluetooth.

Our sensing technology was built for intense activities in extreme environments and demonstrated highly accurate results compared to the most reliable ECG chest belts in market. It is, therefore, suitable for high performance athletes in any cycling environment.

 

Heart-Rate Monitoring

Cyclists who want to monitor and improve their performance cannot ignore their heart rate. Personal heart-rate provides a window to individual's overall fitness.

Heart rate is commonly monitored using chest straps. Fitness watches, cycling computers & smartphones - all provide a platform that can communicate with a chest strap and display heart rate.

But what if you hate wearing that strap around your chest for hours? Straps can chafe, irritate, lose contact and migrate. We now offer the perfect solution - the SMART.

What do you get with SMART?

The SMART will arrive to you ready-to-use with no assembly required.
The systems includes:

  • Lazer Sport GENESIS helmet integrated with LifeBEAM sensing technology
  • LifeBEAM’s physiological sensor & processing unit:
    • Integrated 3-axis accelerometer
    • Bluetooth 4.0 or ANT+ Wireless Communication capabilities
    • Rechargeable Lithium battery - at least 15 hours of continuous usage
    • Weight: 50 grams (0.132 lbs.)

The sensor & technology integrated into the SMART platform will allow future implementation of additional sensing, sound & display features.

 From Aerospace to Cycling

LifeBEAM is a startup company comprised of engineers and pilots, passionate about the development of physiological monitoring solutions. We specialize in remote monitoring of multi-physiological parameters, such as heart-rate, blood flow, oxygen saturation and more.

Our first development was a unique miniature sensing platform that was implemented into fighter pilot and astronaut helmets, to monitor their physiological conditions, help them perform better, and in extreme cases – even save lives.

 

 

Now you can use this technology during cycling!

What could be simpler than putting on your SMART cycling helmet integrated with our small and almost invisible sensor, and continuously monitoring your heart rate?!

 

Technology - main features & benefits

LifeBEAM's core sensing technology is based on state of the art non-invasive optical methods, using miniature components that allow unobtrusive & continuous physiological monitoring. These unique sensing methods enable a high-accuracy measurement of various physiological parameters.

LifeBEAM's main technological expertise creates applicative solutions that are significantly insensitive to motion artifacts and thus can be used in dynamic environments and under extreme conditions. 

 

 

So what’s so cool about SMART?

SMART uses electro-optical technology to continuously measure your heart-rate.

The optical sensor is placed on the helmet’s front, gently touching your forehead. The sensor samples the blood pulse in a high frequency and transmits a raw signal to the processing unit, which is placed in the helmet’s back.

The processing unit filters the signal from motion artifacts and, using the communication module, wirelessly transmits the cleansed pulse to your display device in real-time.

 

 

AND…YES, IT WORKS WITH MOST DEVICES AND APPS IN THE MARKET!

The SMART is compatible with Bluetooth 4.0 & ANT+ devices - smartphones, fitness watches, cycling computers - and works with most fitness applications, so use your favorite display device or smartphone app for additional functions, such as: average speed, distance, pace, GPS, calories-burned, etc.

  

Future Developments

We plan to continue developing the SMART, keeping it up to date with the ever-changing technologies, in order to provide the best and most cutting-edge product for our customers.

Integrating a processing unit and wireless communication capabilities opens the door for various additional sensors & features that will be processed in the helmet and transmitted wirelessly to any place!

A few examples for some optional future implementations:

  • Additional Functions: Stand-alone device, Crash detection, Bicycle locator, integration with Cycling training apps for additional parameters and more!
  • Advanced display capabilities: head up display capabilities just like in fighter pilots helmets!
  • Additional Sensors: GPS, SIM, Logger and more!
  • Sound feedback features.

 

Prototyping process

After successfully monitoring a pilot's vitals, LifeBEAM wanted to expand and reach new horizons. 

On one of their weekend rides, two engineers from our team modified our technology and integrated it into their cycling helmets. 

Excited by the outcome and the idea of combining our technology with their love of cycling, they convinced the team to pursue their dream.

On the following 6 months, the R&D team worked together to amend the algorithms to suit the cycling environment and develop a kit that could be integrated into a professional cycling helmet while prolonging the battery life, maximizing the duration between charges, and without adding unnecessary weight.

After numerous testing iterations & prototype improvements, we were ready to choose the right helmet-manufacturing partner.

 

Cooperation with LAZER SPORT

 

 

Lazer is one of the top cycling helmet manufacturers in the world with over 90 years of experience (the oldest helmet manufacturers still operating).

With its headquarter in Belgium, Lazer designs, manufactures and markets helmets in more than 50 countries.

 

Lazer’s GENESIS cycling helmet (in Canada also called GS) is one of the most popular helmets in the world.

Helmet spec:

  • Fit System: Rollsys® Retention System
  • Construction: In-Mold (6 pieces)
  • Ventilation: 19 vents
  • Weight: 280g (0.617 lbs) (M) CE
  • Certification: CE - CPSC - AS
  • Sizes: M-L

 

Many great champions teamed up with Lazer along the years.

 

Awards & Recognitions

In 2010, LifeBEAM won the national innovation contest "Ramon Breakthrough", sponsored by Google and represented Israel at Singularity program at NASA Ames in Silicon Valley.

In 2012, we were honored to participate in NASA’s R&D activity, where our unique sensors were used and tested during different research activities.
In addition, we have performed a joint research at the European Flights training facility in the Netherlands and with a number of Air Forces around the world.

 

Rewards/Pricing

We created a great list of exciting perks that will allow you to enjoy our forthcoming product & technology while supporting our efforts.

The Pioneer Deal: Early Bird (200 available) – $149

The SMART Package: Own a SMART – $189

The Gift package: Surprise your friend with a SMART Gift– $195

The Buddies package: Order 2 SMARTS with your friend or ride buddy – $358

The Group package: Order 5 SMARTS for your cycling group – $845

The Silver Distributor package: Order 20 SMARTS – $2,780

The Gold Distributor package: Order 50 SMARTS – $6,450

The Carrier package: SMART carrier case - $45

 

Use of Funds

We are asking for your help so we can produce the first run of the SMART and deliver them to our initial customers. If you love cycling, sports, or fitness in general, we would love your support so we can bring the SMART helmet to market and further implement our technologies in new products in the future.

 

Join Our Ride!

Our team developed the groundbreaking technology, but in order to bring it to mass production … we need your help!

We ask you to help us elevate our project from a working prototype to its final production stage.

 

We welcome you to join our ride! Thanks for your support!!!

 

FAQ

How does your technology work?

LifeBEAM's sensing platform and algorithms can accurately measure heart-rate in a non-invasive, miniature and unobtrusive manner. The unique mechanical solution helps to provide an improved raw signal. A robust & unique multi-layer method that calculates the heart-rate from pulse signals by implementing two types of reference sensors in our sensing platform: 3D accelerometer and an optic reference that monitor motion but not pulse wave. We use both references for the reduction of motion artifacts since some artifacts are reflected in one reference, and other artifacts are reflected in the other.

 

On which devices will I be able to present the heart-rate data?

By using the Bluetooth 4.0 or ANT+ Wireless Communication, the SMART can work with most Fitness Watches, Cycling Computers and Smartphones apps in the market.

Any display device that can accept heart-rate from an ANT+ heart rate chest strap will be able to accept heart rate data from the SMART.

  • For the list of devices supported by Bluetooth 4.0/BLE protocol visit here
  • For the list of devices supported by ANT+ protocol visit here

 

When will I receive my SMART?

We expect to deliver the first SMART batches to our Indiegogo contributors within 4-6 months from the campaign end date.

 

Can I choose a color?

Our intention is to provide with more than one color selection, while the number of available designs depends on the amount of support that we get in the campaign. During the campaign, we will update about this subject and the available design choices.  

 

Why can’t I use your technology on my current helmet?

The sensing platform requires a unique mechanical solution in order to provide you with a continuous & accurate heart-rate reading, which we embedded in Lazer’s GENESIS helmet. In the future, we may be able to provide additional designs.

 

Why did no one else think about it before?

That’s a great question… but seriously, extracting heart-rate from the forehead is extremely complicated and years of monitoring pilots & astronauts, enabled us to overcome this challenge. In addition, integrating the various components into a cycling helmet without adding significant weight and without interfering with the user’s ride was extremely challenging.

 

What parameters will I be able to receive from my SMART?

You will receive a continuous measurement of your heart-rate and any other heart-rate feature provided by the chosen display device or app. For example: Average heart-rate, Max heart-rate, etc.

The information will be displayed in real time on all types of display devices, such as Smartphones apps, Fitness Watches and Cycling Computers.

 

Does the sensor work regardless of weather conditions or sweat?

Yes, definitely. Our sensing platform is resistant to sweat, rain & other environmental conditions.

 

For how long between chargers will the battery last?

The battery life is at least 15 hours of continuous usage. It will switch to idle mode if not used more than 3 minutes, in order to extend the battery life.

 

What about shipping charges?

We offer Free Shipping to the U.S., and $15 for International Shipping.
For the Silver & Gold Distributor packages, we offer Free Shipping Worldwide.

Please make sure you add the shipping rate to your payment on the chosen perk/s.  If you forgot to contribute for International shipping, just click the “Contribute Now” button and select “No perk, I just want to contribute”.
From there you can add the shipping costs. The transaction will be registered in our databases and linked to your previous transaction.

Regarding customs duty - please check the policy in your country.

 

When will the SMART be available for sale to the public?

Only after we deliver the Indiegogo pre-orders, we will enter into an additional production process and then the SMART will be available for everyone else.

 

Why do we need to monitor our heart-rate during cycling?

During an aerobic workout, large groups of your body's muscles are used over an extended period of time in a consistent, rhythmic manner. In order to function aerobically, your muscles demand oxygen. The harder you exercise your muscles, the more oxygen they require. This oxygen is supplied to your muscles by your lungs through the bloodstream. As a result, your heart pumps faster during a workout in an effort to deliver the additional oxygen that your muscles are demanding. As you strengthen your body through exercise, you also strengthen your heart.

Personal heart-rate provides a window to individual's overall fitness. Measuring your heart-rate is the best and most commonly used method to gauge the effectiveness of your workout! Measuring the rate of your heart during exercise can help you determine when you're pushing your body too hard or need to push it harder to achieve the level of fitness you are seeking.

 

If I have a power meter, do I need a Heart-Rate monitor?

Power-meters are essential, however they demonstrate the work you're doing; your heart rate is your body's response to that work. For example: accurate heart rate monitoring can provide real time feedback whether you should continue with your workout. If you have recovered from the prior day's work out, your heart-rate will increase as you begin an interval. If your heart-rate is slow to rise and remains elevated longer than normal into your recovery period, you're probably better off saving a hard session for another day.

 

How do I choose between Bluetooth and ANT+?

After your payment process, we will contact you and make sure we get your preferred communication method: ANT+ or Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE - Bluetooth Low Energy).

  • If you use ANT+ device, iPhone 4 or lower version or Smartphone with built-in ANT+ then choose ANT+
  • If you use devices or smartphones with Bluetooth 4.0 (e.g. iPhone 4S or 5, Samsung Galaxy SIII, Motorola Droid RAZR) then choose Bluetooth    

 

Will the SMART Cycling Helmet fit me? What size is the helmet?

The sizes we're providing are medium (52-58cm) and large (59-61cm) and are the same standard sizes that Lazer is providing to all of its customers.

The weight of the helmet itself is 280g (M) with LifeBEAM physiological sensor & processing unit adding only 50g.

After processing your payment, we will contact you and make sure we get your preferred helmet size.

 

Does it display the Heart-Rate all the time or will I have to do any action to see it?

No additional action is needed except for turning your SMART helmet ON, wearing it and starting to cycle!

 

Since it is an Optical light sensor, does it have a problem in the sun? On bright days?

No. Our system was successfully tested in different extreme weather and light environments. 

 

What phones support the ANT+ protocol?

Please check in the following link (choose “mobile phones/devices” category)

 

Will the SMART work with a skull cap?

Our technology is an advanced variation of optical sensors commonly-used in hospitals for many years. In general, two light beams are transmitted to the skin and the reflection is measured in an electro-optical cell. This allows us to monitor changes in blood flow and extract heart rate. Blocking the light beam with any kind of cloth will prevent this action. The sensor is located on the helmet's front - gently touching the upper part of the forehead. As long as the cap doesn't block the sensor or isn't under the hairline - you're good to go.

 

Will the SMART Cycling Helmet work with my Android or iPhone?

The SMART communicates over the ANT+ and Bluetooth 4.0 protocols. It sends out its data using the standard Heart-Rate Profiles to any devices that support these protocols and Profiles.

iPhones, Android & Windows phone Smartphones can be used to display your Heart-rate data by using applications that support the Bluetooth 4.0 Heart-Rate Profile or have ANT+ support (via built-in ANT+ or via an available ANT+ dongle adapter).

 

Can I upgrade my Perk at a later stage?

Yes, see it here:

http://support.indiegogo.com/entries/20517401-how-to-upgrade-your-perk

 

Who are you? Tell me about your company

LifeBEAM is a startup company comprised of engineers and pilots, passionate about the development of physiological monitoring solutions. We specialize in remote monitoring of multi-physiological parameters, such as heart-rate, blood flow, oxygen saturation and more.

For information about the team, please visit our website:

http://www.life-beam.com/company/board-advisory/
story_txt:
SMART is available for pre-order!
We did it! Thank you to all of our supporters for making our SMART helmet become a reality! 

We are at the final countdown... make sure you get your SMART helmet today:



 
Check our R&D team video:
 
LifeBEAM's New Perk!
Limited edition - An awesome pilot helmet carrier case
 
We got great coverage:















LifeBEAM is proud to present SMART -
The world's first smart cycling helmet with an integrated heart rate sensor, allowing real time, accurate, hassle-free heart-rate monitoring without using a chest strap!

The SMART platform is lightweight and incorporates a microprocessor integrated with LifeBEAM’s advanced algorithm, a state-of-the-art optical physiological sensor, accelerometer, and full wireless communication capabilities.
We Need Your Help!
While we have experience in the Aerospace industry, this is our first consumer facing product, and we need your help to make it a success!
The SMART Solution
We integrated our unique sensor & algorithms, originally developed for fighter pilots & astronauts, into the Lazer’s GENESIS helmet resulting in the SMART – a cycling helmet that provides highly accurate, real time measurements of heart rate under normal as well as extreme physiological conditions without the problems inherent to chest straps. The information gathered by the SMART appears in real time on your mobile phone, sport watch or cycling computer via ANT+ or Bluetooth.
Our sensing technology was built for intense activities in extreme environments and demonstrated highly accurate results compared to the most reliable ECG chest belts in market. It is, therefore, suitable for high performance athletes in any cycling environment.
 
Heart-Rate Monitoring
Cyclists who want to monitor and improve their performance cannot ignore their heart rate. Personal heart-rate provides a window to individual's overall fitness.
Heart rate is commonly monitored using chest straps. Fitness watches, cycling computers & smartphones - all provide a platform that can communicate with a chest strap and display heart rate.
But what if you hate wearing that strap around your chest for hours? Straps can chafe, irritate, lose contact and migrate. We now offer the perfect solution - the SMART.

What do you get with SMART?
The SMART will arrive to you ready-to-use with no assembly required.The systems includes:

Lazer Sport GENESIS helmet integrated with LifeBEAM sensing technology
LifeBEAM’s physiological sensor & processing unit:

Integrated 3-axis accelerometer
Bluetooth 4.0 or ANT+ Wireless Communication capabilities
Rechargeable Lithium battery - at least 15 hours of continuous usage
Weight: 50 grams (0.132 lbs.)


The sensor & technology integrated into the SMART platform will allow future implementation of additional sensing, sound & display features.

 From Aerospace to Cycling

LifeBEAM is a startup company comprised of engineers and pilots, passionate about the development of physiological monitoring solutions. We specialize in remote monitoring of multi-physiological parameters, such as heart-rate, blood flow, oxygen saturation and more.


Our first development was a unique miniature sensing platform that was implemented into fighter pilot and astronaut helmets, to monitor their physiological conditions, help them perform better, and in extreme cases – even save lives.
 
 
Now you can use this technology during cycling!
What could be simpler than putting on your SMART cycling helmet integrated with our small and almost invisible sensor, and continuously monitoring your heart rate?!
 
Technology - main features & benefits
LifeBEAM's core sensing technology is based on state of the art non-invasive optical methods, using miniature components that allow unobtrusive & continuous physiological monitoring. These unique sensing methods enable a high-accuracy measurement of various physiological parameters.
LifeBEAM's main technological expertise creates applicative solutions that are significantly insensitive to motion artifacts and thus can be used in dynamic environments and under extreme conditions. 
 

 
So what’s so cool about SMART?
SMART uses electro-optical technology to continuously measure your heart-rate.
The optical sensor is placed on the helmet’s front, gently touching your forehead. The sensor samples the blood pulse in a high frequency and transmits a raw signal to the processing unit, which is placed in the helmet’s back.

The processing unit filters the signal from motion artifacts and, using the communication module, wirelessly transmits the cleansed pulse to your display device in real-time.
 

 
AND…YES, IT WORKS WITH MOST DEVICES AND APPS IN THE MARKET!
The SMART is compatible with Bluetooth 4.0 & ANT+ devices - smartphones, fitness watches, cycling computers - and works with most fitness applications, so use your favorite display device or smartphone app for additional functions, such as: average speed, distance, pace, GPS, calories-burned, etc.
  
Future Developments
We plan to continue developing the SMART, keeping it up to date with the ever-changing technologies, in order to provide the best and most cutting-edge product for our customers.
Integrating a processing unit and wireless communication capabilities opens the door for various additional sensors & features that will be processed in the helmet and transmitted wirelessly to any place!
A few examples for some optional future implementations:

Additional Functions: Stand-alone device, Crash detection, Bicycle locator, integration with Cycling training apps for additional parameters and more!
Advanced display capabilities: head up display capabilities just like in fighter pilots helmets!
Additional Sensors: GPS, SIM, Logger and more!
Sound feedback features.
 
Prototyping process
After successfully monitoring a pilot's vitals, LifeBEAM wanted to expand and reach new horizons. 
On one of their weekend rides, two engineers from our team modified our technology and integrated it into their cycling helmets. 
Excited by the outcome and the idea of combining our technology with their love of cycling, they convinced the team to pursue their dream.
On the following 6 months, the R&D team worked together to amend the algorithms to suit the cycling environment and develop a kit that could be integrated into a professional cycling helmet while prolonging the battery life, maximizing the duration between charges, and without adding unnecessary weight.

After numerous testing iterations & prototype improvements, we were ready to choose the right helmet-manufacturing partner.
 
Cooperation with LAZER SPORT
 
 
Lazer is one of the top cycling helmet manufacturers in the world with over 90 years of experience (the oldest helmet manufacturers still operating).
With its headquarter in Belgium, Lazer designs, manufactures and markets helmets in more than 50 countries.
 
Lazer’s GENESIS cycling helmet (in Canada also called GS) is one of the most popular helmets in the world.
Helmet spec:

Fit System: Rollsys® Retention System
Construction: In-Mold (6 pieces)
Ventilation: 19 vents
Weight: 280g (0.617 lbs) (M) CE
Certification: CE - CPSC - AS
Sizes: M-L
 
Many great champions teamed up with Lazer along the years.
 
Awards & Recognitions
In 2010, LifeBEAM won the national innovation contest "Ramon Breakthrough", sponsored by Google and represented Israel at Singularity program at NASA Ames in Silicon Valley.

In 2012, we were honored to participate in NASA’s R&D activity, where our unique sensors were used and tested during different research activities.  In addition, we have performed a joint research at the European Flights training facility in the Netherlands and with a number of Air Forces around the world.
 
Rewards/Pricing
We created a great list of exciting perks that will allow you to enjoy our forthcoming product & technology while supporting our efforts.
The Pioneer Deal: Early Bird (200 available) – $149
The SMART Package: Own a SMART – $189
The Gift package: Surprise your friend with a SMART Gift– $195
The Buddies package: Order 2 SMARTS with your friend or ride buddy – $358
The Group package: Order 5 SMARTS for your cycling group – $845
The Silver Distributor package: Order 20 SMARTS – $2,780
The Gold Distributor package: Order 50 SMARTS – $6,450
The Carrier package: SMART carrier case - $45
 
Use of Funds
We are asking for your help so we can produce the first run of the SMART and deliver them to our initial customers. If you love cycling, sports, or fitness in general, we would love your support so we can bring the SMART helmet to market and further implement our technologies in new products in the future.
 
Join Our Ride!
Our team developed the groundbreaking technology, but in order to bring it to mass production … we need your help!
We ask you to help us elevate our project from a working prototype to its final production stage.
 
We welcome you to join our ride! Thanks for your support!!!
 
FAQ
How does your technology work?
LifeBEAM's sensing platform and algorithms can accurately measure heart-rate in a non-invasive, miniature and unobtrusive manner. The unique mechanical solution helps to provide an improved raw signal. A robust & unique multi-layer method that calculates the heart-rate from pulse signals by implementing two types of reference sensors in our sensing platform: 3D accelerometer and an optic reference that monitor motion but not pulse wave. We use both references for the reduction of motion artifacts since some artifacts are reflected in one reference, and other artifacts are reflected in the other.
 
On which devices will I be able to present the heart-rate data?
By using the Bluetooth 4.0 or ANT+ Wireless Communication, the SMART can work with most Fitness Watches, Cycling Computers and Smartphones apps in the market.
Any display device that can accept heart-rate from an ANT+ heart rate chest strap will be able to accept heart rate data from the SMART.

For the list of devices supported by Bluetooth 4.0/BLE protocol visit here

For the list of devices supported by ANT+ protocol visit here

 
When will I receive my SMART?
We expect to deliver the first SMART batches to our Indiegogo contributors within 4-6 months from the campaign end date.
 
Can I choose a color?
Our intention is to provide with more than one color selection, while the number of available designs depends on the amount of support that we get in the campaign. During the campaign, we will update about this subject and the available design choices.  
 
Why can’t I use your technology on my current helmet?
The sensing platform requires a unique mechanical solution in order to provide you with a continuous & accurate heart-rate reading, which we embedded in Lazer’s GENESIS helmet. In the future, we may be able to provide additional designs.
 
Why did no one else think about it before?
That’s a great question… but seriously, extracting heart-rate from the forehead is extremely complicated and years of monitoring pilots & astronauts, enabled us to overcome this challenge. In addition, integrating the various components into a cycling helmet without adding significant weight and without interfering with the user’s ride was extremely challenging.
 
What parameters will I be able to receive from my SMART?
You will receive a continuous measurement of your heart-rate and any other heart-rate feature provided by the chosen display device or app. For example: Average heart-rate, Max heart-rate, etc.
The information will be displayed in real time on all types of display devices, such as Smartphones apps, Fitness Watches and Cycling Computers.
 
Does the sensor work regardless of weather conditions or sweat?
Yes, definitely. Our sensing platform is resistant to sweat, rain & other environmental conditions.
 
For how long between chargers will the battery last?
The battery life is at least 15 hours of continuous usage. It will switch to idle mode if not used more than 3 minutes, in order to extend the battery life.
 
What about shipping charges?
We offer Free Shipping to the U.S., and $15 for International Shipping.For the Silver & Gold Distributor packages, we offer Free Shipping Worldwide.
Please make sure you add the shipping rate to your payment on the chosen perk/s.  If you forgot to contribute for International shipping, just click the “Contribute Now” button and select “No perk, I just want to contribute”. From there you can add the shipping costs. The transaction will be registered in our databases and linked to your previous transaction.
Regarding customs duty - please check the policy in your country.
 
When will the SMART be available for sale to the public?
Only after we deliver the Indiegogo pre-orders, we will enter into an additional production process and then the SMART will be available for everyone else.
 
Why do we need to monitor our heart-rate during cycling?
During an aerobic workout, large groups of your body's muscles are used over an extended period of time in a consistent, rhythmic manner. In order to function aerobically, your muscles demand oxygen. The harder you exercise your muscles, the more oxygen they require. This oxygen is supplied to your muscles by your lungs through the bloodstream. As a result, your heart pumps faster during a workout in an effort to deliver the additional oxygen that your muscles are demanding. As you strengthen your body through exercise, you also strengthen your heart.
Personal heart-rate provides a window to individual's overall fitness. Measuring your heart-rate is the best and most commonly used method to gauge the effectiveness of your workout! Measuring the rate of your heart during exercise can help you determine when you're pushing your body too hard or need to push it harder to achieve the level of fitness you are seeking.
 
If I have a power meter, do I need a Heart-Rate monitor?
Power-meters are essential, however they demonstrate the work you're doing; your heart rate is your body's response to that work. For example: accurate heart rate monitoring can provide real time feedback whether you should continue with your workout. If you have recovered from the prior day's work out, your heart-rate will increase as you begin an interval. If your heart-rate is slow to rise and remains elevated longer than normal into your recovery period, you're probably better off saving a hard session for another day.
 
How do I choose between Bluetooth and ANT+?
After your payment process, we will contact you and make sure we get your preferred communication method: ANT+ or Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE - Bluetooth Low Energy).

If you use ANT+ device, iPhone 4 or lower version or Smartphone with built-in ANT+ then choose ANT+
If you use devices or smartphones with Bluetooth 4.0 (e.g. iPhone 4S or 5, Samsung Galaxy SIII, Motorola Droid RAZR) then choose Bluetooth    
 
Will the SMART Cycling Helmet fit me? What size is the helmet?
The sizes we're providing are medium (52-58cm) and large (59-61cm) and are the same standard sizes that Lazer is providing to all of its customers.
The weight of the helmet itself is 280g (M) with LifeBEAM physiological sensor & processing unit adding only 50g.
After processing your payment, we will contact you and make sure we get your preferred helmet size.
 
Does it display the Heart-Rate all the time or will I have to do any action to see it?
No additional action is needed except for turning your SMART helmet ON, wearing it and starting to cycle!
 
Since it is an Optical light sensor, does it have a problem in the sun? On bright days?
No. Our system was successfully tested in different extreme weather and light environments. 
 
What phones support the ANT+ protocol?
Please check in the following link (choose “mobile phones/devices” category)
 
Will the SMART work with a skull cap?
Our technology is an advanced variation of optical sensors commonly-used in hospitals for many years. In general, two light beams are transmitted to the skin and the reflection is measured in an electro-optical cell. This allows us to monitor changes in blood flow and extract heart rate. Blocking the light beam with any kind of cloth will prevent this action. The sensor is located on the helmet's front - gently touching the upper part of the forehead. As long as the cap doesn't block the sensor or isn't under the hairline - you're good to go.
 
Will the SMART Cycling Helmet work with my Android or iPhone?
The SMART communicates over the ANT+ and Bluetooth 4.0 protocols. It sends out its data using the standard Heart-Rate Profiles to any devices that support these protocols and Profiles.
iPhones, Android & Windows phone Smartphones can be used to display your Heart-rate data by using applications that support the Bluetooth 4.0 Heart-Rate Profile or have ANT+ support (via built-in ANT+ or via an available ANT+ dongle adapter).
 
Can I upgrade my Perk at a later stage?
Yes, see it here:
http://support.indiegogo.com/entries/20517401-how-to-upgrade-your-perk
 
Who are you? Tell me about your company
LifeBEAM is a startup company comprised of engineers and pilots, passionate about the development of physiological monitoring solutions. We specialize in remote monitoring of multi-physiological parameters, such as heart-rate, blood flow, oxygen saturation and more.
For information about the team, please visit our website:
http://www.life-beam.com/company/board-advisory/

story:
Praise the Lord! We are 99% funded within 17 days! But it doesn't end there...

The $4,000 goal is the MINIMUM base required for our missions and the people, our teams, and churches need more!!! There is still 43 days left for the campaign. Let's join God and push beyond our original estimated amount! 

God is good, and He is worth sharing to the world! So let's continue to raise awareness and spread the word!

Our Mission

As part of our calling to fulfill the Great Commission, Church of Southland  is currently engaged in missions work in Cincinnati, Ohio (USA), Indonesia, and Guatemala, as well as praying for new doors to open in other parts of the world. By committing training, prayer and financial support, and short-term missions projects to these areas, we believe that God will use us to help spread the Gospel message and build His kingdom among unreached peoples. 

Join Now!

Each Church of Southland member going to missions is providing for 50% of their cost to missions and we are praying faithfully for God to provide the other 50%. This is where you come in!

Church of Southland would like to invite you to join God in His redemptive work by participating  through prayer and/or financial support for the various members going to the mission field. 

We are fundraising for $4,000, however, we believe that God will provide more abundantly than we could ever expect. Your donation will go a long way in providing materials for the evangelism teams, Vacation Bible School tools and resources, and travel and lodging for the members. Also, your donations will also cover campaign fees, perk costs, and shipping/handling.

For your donation of $25 or more in God's work, we would like to send you a Thank You card and a one-of-a-kind designed T-shirt. Please select the member you would like to support to the right! If you're not familiar with any members, please select the General Mission Fund Perk.

Church of Southland is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization which means your donation is TAX DEDUCTIBLE!

The Mission Field

A little bit about our mission field:

OTR Living Water Church is our sister church near Cincinnati, Ohio. This family of believers has a variety of ministries reaching out to the women, men, teens, and children from all walks of life, and Pastor Johann and his staff continue to share the Gospel in the streets each week. They show God's love  to those struggling with poverty, illness, and lost hope through annual events such as this summer's Children’s Retreat, where they take the neighborhood children on a camping trip for 5 days and 4 nights. They will also host a neighborhood block party, feed the homeless, and counsel those who need it in Spirit and Truth.


Indonesia: The primary purpose of this trip is to build up, encourage, and serve our sister church in Indonesia. They also operate an orphanage that cares for over 20 orphans, and seek to serve their community by helping these orphans recognize their significance as precious human beings.

Guatemala: Members of this trip will be joining other AMI churches to assist medical professionals and translators to provide medical and health education to local villages. As they share the Good News, they will also be participating in a children's Bible camp in support of the local ministry.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Pray! Pray! Pray! Prayer is just as important as financial gifts.
  • Indiegogo offers SHARE tools so you can SPREAD the word!
  • Tell your friends, church, family and neighbors! Everyone deserves to hear the Gospel!
  • Save the Date! Come join us for our annual Cafe Night Fundraiser on May 2nd - 6PM @ The Phoenix Club. Please click Facebook link for more details.

story:
For our english speaking backers, US and canadian Citizen please explore our US Campaign "CT WATCH"

A ce jour, le nombre de produits  que l’on appelle bracelets connectés ou montres connectées ne cesse de s’étendre, le récent lancement de la montre connectée d’Apple, montre à quel point ce marché est convoité par les grands de l’électronique grand public. 

Néanmoins il s’agit systématiquement de nouveaux produits, ainsi, si l’on veut porter la belle montre de marque dont vous rêviez, ou que l’on vous a offert, tout en profitant des services d’une montre connectée, c’est impossible : 

Montre connectée ou montre de marque , il faut choisir : soit votre belle montre soit acheter une montre « connectée », à la rigueur, un bracelet connecté. 

Mais avec CT Watch, vous n’avez pas à choisir  

CT Watch s’adresse à tous ceux qui souhaitent disposer de fonctionnalités nouvelles, que l’on peut trouver avec une montre connectée ou un bracelet, voire encore plus ,  mais sans avoir à porter ou acheter une montre connectée ou un bracelet. 

Beaucoup ont acheté ou achètent des montres de marque, et souhaitent les conserver, en profiter,  tout en profitant aussi de ces nouvelles technologies et fonctionnalités. Et donc sans avoir à porter d’autres montres.  C’est à tous ceux-là que s’adresse ce concept, 

En effet, ils possèdent une Rolex, une Hublot, une Piaget, une Timex, une Breitling, une Hermès, une Cartier, une Omega etc. ou toute autre montre de marque, comme une Swatch, une Fossil , une Tissot, etc …  ces noms de marque ne sont donnés qu’à titre d’exemple car ce n’est pas limitatif . CT watch s'adapte à (presque) toutes les montres à bracelet amovible. 

CT Watch , intègre toutes les fonctionnalités nécessaires dans le bracelet de la montre lui même, avec discrétion. 

Les bracelets CT Watch seront disponibles en de nombreuses variétés de cuir de couleurs, largeurs standards - 18 à 24 mm- et types d'attaches ). 


L’électronique embarquée offre les fonctionnalités suivantes :

• Accéléromètre 3D : 

Celui-ci permet de stocker l’activité, le nombre de pas, les calories, etc,  Il permet aussi de piloter tout appareil connecté ( Jeux, drones, TV, fonctions diverses) par détection de tous les mouvements. et donc par les gestes de la main ou les  mouvements du corps 

•  le GPS peut par exemple être intégré dans les bracelets montre d’enfant.

•  Mémoire de stockage (et carte micro sd) 

•  Liaison Bluetooth

•  Système NFS (optionnel) (paiement)

•  Système RF Tags (Optionnel )

•  Vibreur

•  Sonnerie

•Micro : permettant de commander diverses fonctions à reconnaissance vocale, ou encore d’enregistrer une conversation

•Camera ( optionnel ) 

CT Watch dispose du son, d’un  vibreur, d’un affichage par micro-leds de 4 lignes . Ainsi  aucun affichage n’est visible, lorsque non nécessaire. et de 3 zones de commande sur le bracelet. 


CT Watch se base sur des composants montés sur support flexible de ce type 


Ces divers dispositifs permettant à CT Watch d’agir et d’interagir avec tout objet avec lequel CT Watch peut être connecté.

La connexion Bluetooth offre par ailleurs de nouvelles fonctionnalités :

La spécificité d’une montre est que l’on porte celle-ci au poignet toute la journée, il est donc rare que l’on oublie sa montre. Celle-ci devient donc un dispositif - dont les fonctions sont très vastes - intégré à soi même en permanence 

Fonction anti oubli : en ajoutant un « tag » Bluetooth adapté à divers objets, ceux-ci sont liés à la montre : Lunettes, Stylos de marque, parapluie, manteau, chapeau, et bien sur la liaison avec le smartphone. Certains "tags" existent, mais nous n'excluons pas de développe les nôtres. 

Si la montre s’éloigne d’un des objets connectés, celle-ci vous prévient par une vibration ou une sonnerie et affiche de quel objet il s’agit. 

Cette fonction peut elle-même être intelligente et programmable et couplée au GPS du téléphone, de façon à éviter les alarmes intempestives : par exemple lorsque l’on est chez soi ou encore de ne pas oublier votre manteau parce que la température extérieure est basse. 

Fonction, « trouver »  bi directionnelle : vous ne savez pas où vous avez mis votre téléphone, vous le faites sonner par la montre, et inversement. 

Fonction de sécurité informatique :  elle permet de verrouiller l’accès à votre ordinateur, tablette ou smartphone, si vous vous éloignez temporairement, par exemple , ou si vous décidez de verrouiller l’accès depuis votre bracelet montre pendant votre absence. Ce peut aussi être le cas pour votre voiture, votre bureau...

Fonction « match » : dans le cadre d’applications diverses de réseaux sociaux. lié à votre profil, et lorsque vous croisez quelqu'un qui vous correspond. 

Ainsi, les fonctions d’un « bracelet » ou d’une montre connectée se trouvent entièrement intégrés avec votre montre de marque et de manière discrète. 

Des logiciels applicatifs sur smartphone ( IOS , Android et Windows) ainsi que leurs extensions  PC ou Mac permettent d’analyser divers paramètres d’activité de la journée  d’une part et d’interagir avec ces objets  d’autre part. 

Les fonctions liées au smart phone et aux objets pouvant être connectés, sont les suivantes (non limitatives)  :

-  Prise ou rejet d’appel et identification de l’appelant  (affichage)

-  Affichage d’en têtes d’emails et SMS 

-  Rappel de RDV 

-  Commande et interaction avec des logiciels applicatifs divers du smart phone et des objets « connectés », pouvant être interfacés et interagir avec le dispositif CT Watch ajouté à la montre ( Gestes, dispositifs de commande intégrés au bracelet, ou encore par la voix) 

-  Alertes et informations diverses

-  Température extérieure, météo locale 

-  Enregistrement audio ( et vidéo en cas d'option caméra) 

Le bracelet contient aussi une batterie, rechargeable soit par contact, soit par induction. conférant une autonomie de plusieurs jours . Un rappel de recharge s'affiche sur le téléphone et sur la montre, en cas d'oubli . Un micro connecteur USB permet une recharge filaire,

Chaque bracelet est livré avec un support de recharge


Nos besoins

Les fonds nécessaires,  correspondent aux coûts de développement de l'électronique et des logiciels , des études d'intégration et de design externe (cuirs) et de leur industrialisation, ainsi que des prototypes d'essai. 

Ils concernent par ailleurs les premiers besoins marketing , et le lancement des séries initiales dans une variété de 20 coloris et textures de cuir, environ,  permettant de s'adapter à la plupart des montres à bracelet cuir ou simili 

L'impact marché

Le marché des montres connectées , des bracelets "intelligents" et connectés est l'un des marchés en pleine expansion de ce début de 21 e siècle, il entre en concurrence frontale avec le marché des montres et du luxe et des bijoux féminins ou masculins, de poignet.

Hors, il est tout à fait possible, avec les progrès liés à la miniaturisation des composants,  de marier design, luxe et technologie, sans entrer en concurrence directe, mais en "intégrant" ces technologies aux aspects périphériques des montres par exemple. par leur bracelet. 

C'est là notre objectif . 

Le marché , tel que nous l'avons étudié , se chiffre à plusieurs millions d'unités par an, en y intégrant toutes les déclinaison possibles en coloris, en textures, en "fonctions" orientés vers les Hommes, les Femmes, les Ados, ainsi que des produits de grand luxe qui peuvent être conçus pour leur aspect extérieur par des designers réputés en joaillerie.

Le prix marché  estimé sera de l'ordre de 89 € TTC en version de base et bracelet simili cuir et de l'ordre de 120 € à 199 € avec des cuirs de haute qualité et selon les options technologiques choisies.

Risques et défis

La technologie électronique est  très avancée et miniaturisée . L'intégration des diverses fonctions et liaisons hertziennes a été étudiée avec soin et ne pose pas de problèmes particuliers.

L'implantation des composants sur un substrat flexible a par ailleurs été étudiée avec soin de façon à éviter tout travail mécanique pouvant induire une déconnexion de composants à terme.

L'intégration GPS a été pour l'instant étudiée , mais sans décision d'implantation dans un premier temps, dans la mesure où le GPS du smartphone peut pallier cet éventuel besoin. 

Nous avons par ailleurs étudié l'implantation batterie de façon à maximiser l'autonomie. 

CT WATCH est protégé par plusieurs Brevets et par Copyright pour les aspects logiciel et design

    D'autres façons de nous aider

    Si vous  ne pouvez  pas contribuer  :

    • Si vous ne pouvez pas nous aider, faites  passer le mot et faites nous connaitre auprès de vos amis et sur les réseaux sociaux 
    • Utilisez les outils de partage Indiegogo !
story_txt:
For our english speaking backers, US and canadian Citizen please explore our US Campaign "CT WATCH"
A ce jour, le nombre de produits  que l’on appelle bracelets connectés ou montres connectées ne cesse de s’étendre, le récent lancement de la montre connectée d’Apple, montre à quel point ce marché est convoité par les grands de l’électronique grand public. 
Néanmoins il s’agit systématiquement de nouveaux produits, ainsi, si l’on veut porter la belle montre de marque dont vous rêviez, ou que l’on vous a offert, tout en profitant des services d’une montre connectée, c’est impossible : 
Montre connectée ou montre de marque , il faut choisir : soit votre belle montre soit acheter une montre « connectée », à la rigueur, un bracelet connecté. 

Mais avec CT Watch, vous n’avez pas à choisir  

CT Watch s’adresse à tous ceux qui souhaitent disposer de fonctionnalités nouvelles, que l’on peut trouver avec une montre connectée ou un bracelet, voire encore plus ,  mais sans avoir à porter ou acheter une montre connectée ou un bracelet. 
Beaucoup ont acheté ou achètent des montres de marque, et souhaitent les conserver, en profiter,  tout en profitant aussi de ces nouvelles technologies et fonctionnalités. Et donc sans avoir à porter d’autres montres.  C’est à tous ceux-là que s’adresse ce concept, 
En effet, ils possèdent une Rolex, une Hublot, une Piaget, une Timex, une Breitling, une Hermès, une Cartier, une Omega etc. ou toute autre montre de marque, comme une Swatch, une Fossil , une Tissot, etc …  ces noms de marque ne sont donnés qu’à titre d’exemple car ce n’est pas limitatif . CT watch s'adapte à (presque) toutes les montres à bracelet amovible. 
CT Watch , intègre toutes les fonctionnalités nécessaires dans le bracelet de la montre lui même, avec discrétion. 
Les bracelets CT Watch seront disponibles en de nombreuses variétés de cuir de couleurs, largeurs standards - 18 à 24 mm- et types d'attaches ). 





L’électronique embarquée offre les fonctionnalités suivantes :
• Accéléromètre 3D : 
Celui-ci permet de stocker l’activité, le nombre de pas, les calories, etc,  Il permet aussi de piloter tout appareil connecté ( Jeux, drones, TV, fonctions diverses) par détection de tous les mouvements. et donc par les gestes de la main ou les  mouvements du corps 
•  le GPS peut par exemple être intégré dans les bracelets montre d’enfant.
•  Mémoire de stockage (et carte micro sd) 
•  Liaison Bluetooth
•  Système NFS (optionnel) (paiement)
•  Système RF Tags (Optionnel )
•  Vibreur
•  Sonnerie
•Micro : permettant de commander diverses fonctions à reconnaissance vocale, ou encore d’enregistrer une conversation
•Camera ( optionnel )

story:
How to buy

Our site is now live! See www.eurekawatch.com to see our collection and place orders.

Reviews

By popular request, here are two reviews we have of our watches pre-production:

The Wrist Watch Review: "Taking the minimalist, Bauhaus inspired design to the logical end point, by eliminating the minute hand." See The Wrist Watch Review for the full spiel.

The Time Bum: "Unlike many allegedly "minimalist" watch designs, Eureka has gone "full minimal" with a text-free dial." Click here for their full review: The Time Bum 

More reviews coming as soon as we can get more samples produced (soon).

Status

We're currently conducting QC on every item and sending them out. If you're one of our contributors, expect an email with a tracking code soon!

Story

When we first encountered one-handed watches we were drawn to their simplicity. Most modern one-handed watches are low quality, difficult to read or expensive. We believe you shouldn't have to pay more for minimalist design. So we were inspired to create The Eureka Watch Company.   

Readable 

A true minimalist design cuts out the noise while remaining functional and readable. With only one hand, you can use our watches. You can quickly learn to use our watch to tell the time to within a few minutes.

First, read the hour (just like with the hour hand on any watch). Then, add ten minutes for each notch. The longer middle half-hour notch will help you as a reference point. See the example below showing 2:00, 2:30, 2:40 and 2:45. 


Design

Our minimalist, one-handed design is a beautiful stand-alone piece that should complement, but not over-power your style. .
 

Quality

Our watches are made from top-shelf components - Swiss movements, domed sapphire glass, weather resistance to 5 ATM and luminous markers. We guarantee our watch will last the distance and offer a full year warranty. 


Affordable

We don't believe minimalist design should cost you more. By cutting out the middle-man and advertising costs we are bringing you our watch for well under half of the price of similar ($400+) quality pieces.

Packaging

We have included some beautiful packaging to really showcase the pieces, particularly for those giving them as gifts. 

Specifications
  • Swiss movement (Ronda)
  • Gently domed sapphire crystal glass - as scratch resistant as you can get
  • 5ATM / 50m water resistant - able to withstand rain - however, leather straps (as all leather products) should not be exposed to moisture
  • C3 superluminova. (Note: Colour blending and small dots mean it the markers are visible only in extremely dark conditions - this is not a dive watch)
  • Reversible - a watch for the ambidextrous, can be worn on the left or right wrist
  • 40mm diameter, 7mm thick (thin)
  • High grade (316L) Stainless steel case

Colour options

For all our design options see our site, now live, at www.eurekawatch.com.

Who we are

We are a small but passionate team of entrepreneurs dedicated to bringing a line of high quality fashion pieces direct to the consumer. We have years of experience in online commerce and understand the importance of quality products and great customer service. We are Australian/British and based in Hong Kong.

Our quality guarantee

We understand the importance of quality. We strive for a zero percent failure rate and promise refunds on all physical failures. How we will do this:

  • We will check every piece that is manufactured for physical, mechanical and aesthetic defects
  • We will refund any piece with a physical defect within the guarantee period (excluding damage through operator misuse)
  • We will personally respond to every email from IndieGoGo supporters

story:
Short Summary

Hello!

We are James Reed and Tyler Hsieh, and we are starting a new line of yoyos.  Our first design has already been prototyped and tested intensely.  The yoyo is made out of high quality 7075 aluminum with stainless steel rims. This full-sized high performance yoyo has an emphasis on balance, spin time, speed and stability.  We believe that this bi-metal design is the most effective way to achieve this type of feel in a yoyo. This high performance yoyo is made by players for players!

Specs:

64 Grams

55.5 Diameter

44 Width

KK Bearing


The first 25 supporters ($100 Pulsefire perk) get to have THEIR OWN engraving to go on the hub of this yoyo! Design your own original engraving and we will engrave it on your yoyo! This is exclusive to the first 25 supporters ONLY!


Colors:

The design is ready but YOU choose the colors!

Red? Blue? Green? Purple? Pink? Black? What solid colors would you like to see? We want the community to get involved and decide which colors we put into production. We will be posting a poll to gather your input soon.. Stay tuned!


Why?

Because bi-metal yoyos play amazingly well! James Reed and Tyler Hsieh are both motivated individuals who both have impressive backgrounds in the field of competitive yo-yoing. Tyler is currently ranked as the BEST 2a yoyo player in California! James is currently ranked as the 6th best 1a yoyo player in North America! Both of these individuals have extensive knowledge in the field of yoyoing and want to make a killer yoyo they know will exceed competition standards!


What We Need & What You Get

We are attempting to raise $2,500 USD to have these machined and hit your favorite retailers. We are producing at least 250 of these yoyos but only need 25 Pulsefire supporters to reach our goal!

With your donation, we will be able to speed up machining processes and make for high tolerance high precision products.

story:
Short Summary


Savage Village is a new independent clothing outfitter specializing in merchandise inspired by horror films, pop culture, and music.

Established in Flint, Michigan, SVC will initially sell products online via webstore. Every shirt or sticker ordered in this way is helping us fulfill the rest of the start-up capital. The start-up is vital to the growth of the company. We are personally inviting the community to grow WITH our company from the beginning.

(Note from founder)

"SVC is a brand mostly built using SATIRE, we do NOT want to be taken too seriously. In no way do we promote hate, this brand reflects culture. We are the overfill of an over-saturation."

-Stephen "Shipwreck" Shippritt.


What We Need & What You Get


The funding total will go towards the cost to order and print t-shirts, stickers, panties, koozies, and sunglasses in the debut product supplies.

Our chosen theme is robust and caters to a large market, this is our strength. In the future, the company will also explore other markets as a new channel for growth. The owner will run the business from his home office. Inventory will be stored in a 40 sq ft designated storage area within the home. Sales will be primarily handled through a Bigcartel.com store space until the website is fully developed, part way through the second month.

All t-shirts will be printed on 50/50 blend textile, using high quality silk screens.

PERKS:

$1 - "Bottom of the Barrel"

  • Receive a shout out on our website. EVERY DOLLAR COUNTS. THANK YOU! <3

$5 - "Savage Village" koozie

1 Savage Village Koozie


$20 - "Godless Killing Machine" t-shirt
  • A Godless Killing Machine t-shirt. (Size of your choice)

Front

Back

$20 - "Flint Urban Planning Dept." t-shirt

A Flint Urban Planning Dept. t-shirt (Size of your choice)
Front


Back

$25 - "Water Crisis" t-shirt

(Size of your choice. Add $1 for xl,

Back

$25 -  "God Hates Sinners"

Back




$20 - "Murda' Mania" t-shirt

  • A Murda' Mania t-shirt. (Size of your choice)


$40 -Savage Snapback


The Impact

This is where you come in, you will be able to work side-by-side with us and help guide the direction of designs and products. All starting founders will receive a hefty discount on the intended retail prices. We have many designs that can be printed so we will NEED your help to determine which designs will become products.

Risks & Challenges

There are risks like any other small business start-up. The most difficult part of emerging in the fashion industry is marketing. We plan to execute a targeted marketing campaign to generate awareness of the website and products, we will do this locally and through the use of various social networking sites such as Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. This will be in association with events, companies and other products to promote cross advertising and to build partnerships.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute we ask that you help us get the word out by sharing the campaign. IndieGoGo has some awesome sharing tools that you can use!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Savage Village is
a new independent clothing outfitter specializing in merchandise inspired by horror films, pop culture, and music. 
Established in Flint, Michigan, SVC will initially sell products online via webstore. Every shirt or sticker ordered in this way is helping us fulfill the rest of the start-up capital. The start-up is vital to the growth of the company. We are personally inviting the community to grow WITH our company from the beginning.
(Note from founder) 
"SVC is a brand mostly built using SATIRE, we do NOT want to be taken too seriously. In no way do we promote hate, this brand reflects culture. We are the overfill of an over-saturation."
-Stephen "Shipwreck" Shippritt. 

  What We Need & What You Get
The funding total will go towards the cost to order and print t-shirts, stickers, panties, koozies, and sunglasses in the debut product supplies.
Our chosen theme is robust and
caters to a large market, this is our strength. In the future, the company will
also explore other markets as a new channel for growth.
The owner will run the business from his home office.
Inventory will be stored in a 40 sq ft designated storage area within the
home. Sales will be primarily handled through a Bigcartel.com store space until the
website is fully developed, part way through the second month. 
All t-shirts will be printed on 50/50 blend textile, using high quality silk screens.

story:
We are Body Sense Blankets providing revolutionary technology that provides the optimal level of heat during the cold winter months. Many times traditional heated blankets get too hot during the night or are not keeping you warm enough. These new blankets will sense the temperature of your body and the room that you are in and change the amount of heat that is coming from the blanket.

The Body Sense Heated Blankets Team:
All the members of this team are students of the Rubel School of Business at Bellarmine University. The education that we have received there provides us with sufficient skills to excel with this project.
Darcy Egan- Marketing Manager
Sean Robison- Technology Manager
Garrett Masters- Financial Manager
Pricing:
Once we are able to develop the product with the money that is contributed, we will be able to develop an accurate price. We will keep costs down by attempting to outsource our manufacturing with cheap labor so we can focus on giving our customers high quality technology.
Sales & Marketing Plan:
We want to first attempt to get on online selling sites such as amazon, zappos, etc. Then we will move into larger department stores such as Bed, Bath, and Beyond, Target, Walmart, etc. 
By getting the word out through social media and through our own website we will be able to gain customers who are looking to use revolutionized technology in their homes.
Competition:
There is no other product that exist with automatic technology. We believe we are innovative, however, we know there are other ways to heat your home. By using this technology we will be able to minimize the competition and reach people who are sick of dealing with typical heating devices.
We are looking for $50,000 that will primarily be spent on developing this innovative technology.

story:
ten years ago I married a wonderfully loyal, respectful and selfless man. We both have children that are grown and doing well. a dream of mine had always been to become an artist, and so he suggested I go back to school. He helped make my dream come true. Now at 62 years of age (and in great shape) he too has a longtime unrealized dream that I want desperately to come true. When he was a young auto mechanic of 20 years old, he began to build a funny car for drag racing. His then wife, expecting their second child, insisted that he sell the car and give up this "ridiculous dream" and focus on house and home, and so he did. Some years later the marriage ended but the dream lived on. Forty years pass, always working on other peoples cars and projects but never his own. Five years ago an opportunity came into our lives. He purchased the frame of a front engine nostalgia dragster. Over the past few years he has managed to put together all the components to build a fully functioning machine. Now certified and ready to run, we have one last hurdle to jump. We can muddle through with the flatbed trailer we currently have to haul it to the races, but he needs a SFI 3.3 - 20  safety fire suite which includes: Jacket, pants, boots and gloves in the amount of $1500.00. We are sooo close! I want so much for him to make it this time. I am asking for support to help purchase the suite.

A loving wife

story:
Ergon Band is the first ergonomic watchband that moves your watch to the perfect viewing angle. It helps you use the watch’s full functionality with a glance on all occasions, especially in sports activities. 

 

Move your watch to the natural line of sight when running.

 

Ergonomic

Ergon Band is designed based on hand ergonomy and holds the watch at a perfect viewing angle to boost the full functionality of modern watches. 

Have a glance at the watch and read stats without moving your hand.  

ErgonBand positions your watch at the optimum angle. It is a necessity for your safety. 

Gloves-friendly 

ErgonBand fits almost all types of gloves. It can be worn on many running, cycling, and other sport/winter gloves. The size of ErgonBand is adjustable, so that you can wear it on most of the gloves.

 

The state-of-the-art style for wearing the Ergon Band allows you to do much more, much faster, with your smartwatch.

ErgonBand is the most ergonomic and convenient watch band. Wear it everywhere for better performance and functionality. ErgonBand makes it easier to monitor your stats/interact with your metrics while staying focused.

 

Compatibility and colors

ErgonBand is compatible with almost all watches and comes in different colors.  Whether it is cycling, running, parachuting, taking an exam, or driving, an Ergon Band will help you stay focused on what you are doing by keeping your data at your sight.

 

Luxurious and comfortable

Made of premium quality leather and with an ergonomic design, Ergon Band combines functionality, comfort, and beauty like never before. 

ErgonBand is handmade with the best quality leather, you get more features, without a huge markup. 

ErgonBand is handmade with the best quality leather, you get more features, without a huge markup. 

 

In recent years, traditional wristwatches have been replaced with smartwatches that offer a plethora of features. That being said, the question remains: Do traditional watch bands allow for the best display location for a smartwatch? 

The patent-pending Ergon Band securely holds your watch in a place where you can comfortably communicate with it at a glance without any arm rotation.

 

ErgonBand is completely handmade. The only machine-made process is laser cutting and engraving to ensure size precision and consistency.

More than one-hundred steps and processes should be done precisely by hand to create ErgonBand.

The ergonomic feature and durability of ErgonBand are achieved by several heat treatment procedures and detailed processes.  

 

 

The most durable real leather watchband. A stylish combination of different types of high-quality genuine leather, polycarbonate film, and metal to create the best performance, the highest comfort, and ergonomic feature 

Washing Hands and Ergon Band

 

 

 

 

 

Tell everyone about us on Instagram, Facebook, or wherever you get social. 

Your voice is everything! 

 

Maximum Compatibility

 

 

Return policy. Indiegogo is a platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. In the event that you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact us at info@ergonband.com

Free Global Shipping. We are happy to offer Free worldwide shipping. However, any import duties or taxes (if applicable) are the responsibility of the pledged. In case of any possible problems, we are ready to answer and resolve them immediately. Customer satisfaction is our highest priority and we never fail to exceed the customer's expectations. Thank you for your support.

story:
Tidal Cool Creations, from the Resort to the Red Carpet

The good news; I've been accepted to show my Spring/Summer Collection during New York Fashion Week in September! The not-so-good news; putting together a collection is expensive. I've successully put together several collections since launching my label full time in 2012, but I just haven't been able to afford NYFW. This fall I want to make that dream come true!

Where does the money go?

The money that I'm raising will go directly into funding my Spring/Summer 2014 Collection. I've been resourceful to raise the funds for my other collections, but haven't been able to execute everything exactly as I've envisioned it. The funds I raise from the Indiegogo campaign will allow me to put together my dream designs! 

What goes into making a collection?

Fabric and materials ($1000)

Professional Look Book ($200)

Travel and boarding in NYC for the event ($500)

Registration Fees for Small Boutique Fashion Week ($600)

Photographers and Style Team ($500)

If I'm not able to reach my funding goal, I will use the amount that I do raise towards the project. I will be making and showing the collection either way, I'm just hoping to gain some help with fundraising so I don't have to skimp on things like fabrics! If I raise more than my goal, I will use the money to fund future collections. I'd really love to open my own storefront in the next year, and any overflow will help with that!

About me and my brand

 Since launching her label Tidal Cool Creations in 2012, Andrea Howell has quickly climbed the ranks and gained recognition for her design and tailoring skills. After her first runway event, Cleveland Fashion Week, Howell has gone on to participate in Michigan Fashion Week, Pittsburgh Fashion Week, and Kansas City Fashion Week, and shown in many private runway productions, including a celebrity event in New York City. Howell has collaborated with top-notch photographers and models throughout the country, and been published in fashion magazines in NYC, Chicago, and Europe. 
Howell's love of color and bold prints is evident throughout her designs. "I try and take you on a journey around this world with my clothing, whether its a rich silk brocade from Asia or a wax block print from Africa, we all need more color in our lives." This is especially evident in her summer party dress collection, which combines bright cottons and funky prints in unexpected ways.
 
Andrea's organic approach is largely due to her learning to sew at a young age. "Having mastered many of the sewing skills at a young age allows me to concentrate on the aesthetics of clothes rather than the construction", Howell says of her artistic approach. She is comfortable with a wide variety of garments, from lingerie to hand sewn red carpet gowns, and enjoys the challenge of new techniques.
 
Andrea is based in Cleveland, Ohio, where she lives with her young son, cat, and 6 snakes. When she's not in the workroom, she can be found camping, sailing, kayaking, swimming with sharks, or traveling to remote destinations.

story:
The World's Only Custom Fit Anatomical Men's Underwear

We need your support in launching our truly innovative collection that will disrupt the Men's Underwear Industry. 

The SilkSuit LLC is proud to offer the ultimate underwear experience for Men.  We created a new revolutionary innovation that is simple, elegant, sexy and may provide a solution to increase and reinvigorate lost virility. 

It's going to make you laugh - so do so. It's funny so you should be laughing. We do. Make note of the energy this brings when you tell friends!

It's Here. Custom Fit Men's Anatomical Underwear

We have to be a little crazy obviously, but the background of the company is in designing, developing, selling and implementing Custom Global Trading Systems for Financial Services, literally, all over the world. Groomed in systems and efficiency, a best friend and I found a flaw in Men's Underwear and were immediately convinced we had something. 

After all, I wear socks and STILL have a callous on both big toes! So being circumcised, not covering the little guy had to have an effect - and not a good one. Logical right?

WHY THE SILK SUIT?

This flaw is an opportunity to educate, and provide a solution to hundreds of millions of Men, creating a new market within the global men’s underwear industry. 
For Men, the pleasure "control center", the Glans, the head constantly rubs against the underwear. We call this the ‘sandpaper effect’. 

Due to this constant, day after day, week after week, Year after Year, DECADE AFTER DECADE subtle abrasion - this "sandpaper effect" causes the delicate nerve endings and blood vessels that are the source of the pleasure sensation for men, to move further and further away from the surface - forming, essentially, a "callous". A layer of Keratin (protein in hair and nails) forms just beneath the skin. 

This thickness causes a loss of sensation. The new sensations don't "tickle" but a deeper more satisfying experience. An example is putting a supercharger or turbos on a muscle car. Does it need it? Maybe not, but superchargers and turbos are cool and make the muscle car perform even better. That's the essence of the SilkSuit.

What is it?

The SilkSuit is Custom Fit Anatomical Men’s Underwear, a double layered sheath of the finest stretchable, breathable fabric. Like a second skin. The SilkSack is a pouch of the same fabric for the ‘boys’. The SilkSuit stays on by super soft secure Baby elastic. (Ever see a baby with blue feet?)

The SilkSuit+ comes with an opening to make going to the bathroom simple and quick.

The SilkSuit is custom fit like an expensive Suit tailored to fit your body – made for you!

Athletes and Active Lifestyles!

A this is huge for you. jockstraps are abrasive. Burlap. change it up and experience that extra boost of 'young legs', extra energy like Pacino in "Raging Bull" (no foolin around before a fight!), bounce in your toes! That kind of energy or 'extra step'. 

Hey NIKE! Are you there?! (two layers means - NFL, NHL, NCAA, MLB, and even English Premiere League Football!) The SilkSuit is the 'new jockstap'! with logos! Let's GO! 

We have plenty of styles to come! 

THE BENEFITS

Your Help will bring the revolution in men's underwear and possibly all of  these new benefits to men EVERYWHERE:

  • 1.       Increase in Overall Virility
  • 2.       Dramatic Increase in Sexual Pleasure
  • 3.       Unsurpassed Comfort
  • 4.       Snug Secure Support
  • 5.       Protects against Long Term Abrasion aka “The Sand Paper      Effect”
  • 6.       Heals the little guy
  • 7.       A feeling of security (new sensation for men circumcised since birth)
  • 8.       Medical Research Initiative to Identify Additional Target  Markets that may benefit 
  •                               i.       ED Suffers
  •                               ii.      Prostate Cancer Survivors
  •                              iii.      Men with low Testosterone level
  •                              iv.      Military Survivors of Explosive Devices

Funding Need:

- Database & Website Enhancement

- Publicity Campaign

- Medical Research Study Development

(we have not found studies that are in this specific area. If none exists we will explore the effects on Men).  

- Cost of Production of First Run

- Production of three 30 Secs video commercials by They Said...Productions.  

- Launch Line to create a new market and bring potential benefits to millions of men worldwide - and bring LOVE back! 

The other thing:

An email with simple measuring instructions will be sent so that accurate sizing is submitted.  That part is really important. Simple and Easy.  

This project was TOO HOT for Kickstarter! GOGO INDIEGOGO!

Once the campaign has closed you will receive a link and credentials to log in to the site (pre launch) to enter your sizes and mailing information. We'll keep you informed with the status of your order via email. 

Please spread the word - it will be UNIQUE and your friends will be so jealous you found somethingTRULY UNIQUE on the INTERNET!!

Much Love and Humble Graciousness

Michael Ward

Grady Wilson, Director of Security (no break ins)

&

Donna Harris, Director of HR (no hires!)

ORDER NOW!!
