(we have not found studies that are in this specific area. If none exists we will explore the effects on Men).  
- Cost of Production of First Run
- Production of three 30 Secs video commercials by They Said...Productions.  
- Launch Line to create a new market and bring potential benefits to millions of men worldwide - and bring LOVE back! 
The other thing:
An email with simple measuring instructions will be sent so that accurate sizing is submitted.  That part is really important. Simple and Easy.  
This project was TOO HOT for Kickstarter! GOGO INDIEGOGO!
Once the campaign has closed you will receive a link and credentials to log in to the site (pre launch) to enter your sizes and mailing information. We'll keep you informed with the status of your order via email. 
Please spread the word - it will be UNIQUE and your friends will be so jealous you found somethingTRULY UNIQUE on the INTERNET!!
Much Love and Humble Graciousness
Michael Ward
Grady Wilson, Director of Security (no break ins)
&
Donna Harris, Director of HR (no hires!)
ORDER NOW!!

story:
Gizmodo: “You have a dog that loves to walk…Relax, don't worry. Just grab a supercollar.”

USA Today: “Great products begin with great ideas. To me, the supercollar is one of those 'why hasn't this already been invented?' ideas. It makes so much sense.”

Uncrate: “…sometimes it's a dire situation in which every second counts. And if your leash never seems to be where you left it, supercollar will be your new best friend.”

Los Angeles Times: “Road-worthy collar for canine travelers…the supercollar makes it easy to take Fido on your travels.”

People Pets: “Supercollar is the best of both worlds:  a leash and collar in one.”

What’s a supercollar®?

It’s not a bird, it’s not a plane... it’s supercollar®, the dog collar with a built-in leash.

The name pretty much says it all; supercollar® is a revolutionary, one of a kind dog collar that will change the way dog lovers interact with their best friends during walk time... and any time, really.

We have some fantastic praise from the big dogs and here’s what they are barking about: 

  • The supercollar® was featured by Dr. Debbye Turner Bell on The Early Show, CBS’ national morning news program. 
  • The supercollar® was featured in People Pets, USA Today, Chicago Tribune, Gizmodo, Los Angeles Times, Uncrate, Runway Magazine, Fido Friendly Magazine, Pet Age, Haute Dog, Pet Elite, and over 100 more.
  • The supercollar® won the 2011 PET AGE Pinnacle® Award.
  • The supercollar® won the 3M 2011 In-New-Vation Award for the Most Innovative Product.
  • The supercollar® won the 2011 British Airways Face of Opportunity Award.

Our supercollar® is patented, endorsed by veterinarians, and proudly made in the USA. 

What makes supercollar® so cool?

Here’s the deal… with supercollar®, your dog is always carrying its own leash!

Imagine,

  • never having to look for the leash again. It’s already on. It’s always on! â€¨
  • never having to worry about tripping yourself or your dog with traditional or retractable leads that get tangled around everyone’s legs.
  • having your pet walking beside you, not dragging you, the way it’s supposed to be.

Imagine no more… supercollar® to the rescue!

How does supercollar® work?

The supercollar® is a patented, innovative collar and leash combo that replaces the traditional separate collar and leash. It’s a unique alternative to every other leash and collar on the market. 

The built-in retractable leash allows you to gain immediate control of your dog, instead of having to take the time to attach a leash.

When you need to control your dog, you simply release the safety lock on the collar and pull out the retractable leash. If you like using other leashes, you can still do so, as the supercollar® includes a "D" ring for attachment. Even if you prefer a traditional leash, the supercollar® is like an insurance policy for those times you are without one.

The supercollar® is designed to be strong, durable, and is completely waterproof. The collar is made of sturdy webbing and features two specialized, patented retractors containing high-tech cables. Although the cables may look delicate, they are extremely strong. Check out our video to see a supercollar® pull a 2,700 pound car if you want to see how strong it is… but don’t try this at home!

supercollar® will be available in four sizes for dogs weighing 10 to 120 lbs.

Where can I use my supercollar®?

The real question is, "Where CAN'T I use my supercollar®?”

A run on the beach, hike on the trail, visit to the dog park, or just hopping in the car and heading out with your favorite four-legged friend is a snap with supercollar®. 

It’s perfect for anyone who wants to make life easier and is quickly becoming the collar that dogs and their owners can’t live without.

Why support supercollar®?

An emergency veterinarian, an inventor, a couple of entrepreneurs, and a great bunch of dogs came together to create a dog owner’s dream accessory: supercollar®. 

Throwing tradition out the window, we crafted a smart leash & collar combo, giving the WOW factor to two products that needed a little innovation. 

We are passionate about the safety of dogs, spending time with our furry, four-legged friends and keeping America working.

Who’s running this campaign... it’s the supercollar® team!

Jane Angelich is the CEO of Bright IP Concepts, LLC, the parent company for the revolutionary new pet product, supercollar®. Prior to supercollar®, she spent more than 25 years as an entrepreneur, a business coach, a writer and a speaker. 

For over eight years, Jane has been a volunteer for Guide Dogs for the Blind. She and her husband reside in the San Francisco Bay Area. When she’s not busy working, Jane spends time with her family, which includes two Labrador Retrievers from Guide Dogs for the Blind.

She is the proud mother of two sons and a newly minted grandmother. Her second book, What’s a Mother (In-Law) to Do?, was released by Simon & Schuster in June 2009. It is the winner of the 2009 National Best Books Awards in the relationships category. 

Dr. Jim Clark is the CFO of Bright IP Concepts, LLC and the key veterinary consultant in supercollar’s revolutionary design. He brings more than 20 years of experience in veterinary practice, primarily in emergency and critical care medicine to the supercollar® team.

As one of the founders of Bright IP Concepts, Dr. Clark has played an integral role in the design and development of the supercollar®. According to Jim, “this product combines my passion for animal safety with my desire to bring something new and exciting to market.” 

Dr. Clark serves on the Animal Welfare Committee of the California Veterinary Medical Association. He currently works as a veterinary emergency clinician and a part-time professor at the U.C. Davis School of Veterinary Medicine.

Jim received his undergraduate and veterinary degrees from U.C. Davis and an MBA degree from the San Diego State College of Business Administration, graduating as valedictorian of his class. He and his family, which includes three dogs and two cats, reside in the San Francisco Bay Area where he is currently an owner in a growing network of emergency/specialty practices.

Alex Metzroth is the COO of Bright IP Concepts, LLC. He has been instrumental in the design, manufacturing, and distribution of supercollar®.

After graduating from Cornell University in 2005, Alex managed and consulted for the acclaimed international restaurant group, China Grill Management, in New York City. His management concepts are so innovative that the company adopted his policies and standard operating procedures on a global level.

Alex's front-end customer skills combined with back-end operations management, along with his desire to be part of a start-up organization, and his love of all things four-legged are the perfect combined experiences to assist supercollar® as it launches its global brand.

Alex resides in San Francisco in a building that doesn’t allow pets, so he pet-sits frequently to get his dog on.

Ryan Price is the Vice President of Research and Development of Bright IP Concepts, LLC. As one of the inventors of supercollar®, Ryan is an avid adventurer and passionate dog lover.  He often encountered problems with traditional leashes getting caught around legs and tripping everyone. 

While walking his dog Tenor, he had a light bulb moment! Ryan realized the need for a collar/leash combo that would alleviate the hassle that traditional leashes present when you want to turn your dog loose to run.

"Traditional leashes are a problem because you can’t just let go; you must call your dog over to you, unclip the leash, and then let your dog run." During this particular walk, Ryan looked at his wife and said, “what if the dog carried his own leash?” At this moment, supercollar® was born. 

Ryan met Jane Angelich, CEO of supercollar®, while waiting in line for a show... and the rest is history!

How can you help us gogo all the way?

So here is where you come in. We have funded this project ourselves, to this point. Now that we are introducing supercollar® version 2.0, we really need to scale up production and create cool new packaging to give this distribution campaign a bite even bigger than our bark.

Indiegogo is a great vehicle to allow us to build up the necessary working capital to meet our manufacturers' minimum order quantities for product and packaging and make supercollar® available to everyone. Shortly after this Indiegogo project is successfully funded, we will be able to start selling a full range of beautifully packaged supercollar® in retail stores.

 

IndieColor: Voter's Choice 

You're going to be part of the design process! Six color options are ready to go: Original Black, Big Red, Big Sky Blue, Blaze Orange, Lilac Purple & Pretty Pink.

If you pledge any of the color options, we'll email you a survey after the project closes so you can vote on a new 7th color option. Later on, we'll email you again asking which of the final color options you'd like to select. Even if you don't like the Voter's Choice, you'll be able to choose from the other six.

Can I help in other ways?

Absolutely! Please, please, PLEASE spread the word about supercollar® to your friends and family! Talk about our project when you see dogs and their owners walking by. Share the info on your Facebook wall, Twitter feed and other social sites. Visit our website and like/follow our Facebook and Twitter pages by following the links below:

www.supercollar.com

www.facebook.com/supercollar

www.twitter.com/supercollar

We hope that you are inspired and excited by our product and choose to support us. If you love animals AND you love seeing awesome new pet products enter the world, help us reach our goal. We will be "fur-ever" grateful.

Thank you so much, in advance, for pledging and spreading the word!

story:
In a world of so many “on the go” women, it is essential to have order not only in your life, but also in your handbag. Between meetings and mommy duties, searching through that ever cluttered purse can bring on a sense of frazzle and frustration. You say to yourself “where is an in car purse organizer when you need one. Where is that bag that can keep my ever moving,falling and unorganized bag stationary and neat?” Well ladies that time has come. I am Sarah Abrams and have answered your prayers!

The BNB “bag in a bag” campaign is geared toward not only organization but also safety. So many times women are distracted while driving because they are unable to find what it is they are looking for, causing many to take their eyes off the road potentially creating a safety risk not only for themselves but others in the car. 

The need to have these contributions to the securable storage bag will significantly increase my ability to engage and encourage women to take “bag safety” into their own hands. Having the BNB promotes what I believe is efficiency when it comes to finding those hard to reach items when you need them, the BNB has a place for everything.

 

“The BNB allows easy access to any item while driving —only extract whatever you need without taking your eyes off the road. Upon any sudden stop there is no need to worry that your handbag and other items will go flying forward and get lost amongst the mats and floorboard. Whether left in place on the seat or carried out of the vehicle, it is the perfect carryall for the user. Best of all it works exactly for which it was designed.”

 

By contriubting to the funding of the BNB purse project it will give me the opportunity to:

1. Continue cultivating the BNB brand and bringing the BNB securable bag to the  global market.

2. Manufacturing and supplying the BNB secureable storage bag.

3. Allowing me to move into the customization of the BNB bag.

4. The development of our future projects.

 • The BNB would provide a practical and effective storage receptacle for handbags and other personal items in an automobile, thus eliminating the need to place a purse in the floorboard or the backseat of a car. This handy product would allow female drivers to have their belongings conveniently, and safely, within easy reach.

• Tightly secured to the passenger seat and providing sufficient space for storing virtually any size handbag, the BNB would permit drivers to leave their purses open, without worry. In this manner, sudden breaking and sharp cornering while driving would not result in a veritable explosion of scattered purse contents all over the vehicle.

• Either left in place, or easily transported via back straps or it’s convenient carrying handle, the BNB would also provide a unique carryall for one’s automobile. Attractively offered in various colors and designs, the BNB would surely appeal to any female consumer. While this product was primarily conceived with purse storage in mind, anyone who drives would find the BNB an invaluable auto accessory for storing and securing practically any item. The BNB should be well received by the general public bcause of its affordable price and sizable market potential.

 

What else can YOU do?

Share, share, share! Spread the word! BNB saves LIVES, saves TIME!

story:
My name is Chris and I am a single father of the most amazing daughter in the world. I have always wanted to work in the graphic design field. I love art! My daughter loves art. I went through a divorce a couple years back. I had to move away from my daughter so that I could work to get back on my feet. I am working everyday to get to her. I get her everyother weekend now. 

 

So I am going after a dream I have had for a long time now. Many years actually. I am starting or wanting to start freelance graphic design work. I have seen that every time I have looked into doing this everyone wants file formats that I can't not provide. So I am wanting to purchase Adobe Creative Suite and possibly put money towards a laptop for this. I sold my last laptop and everything I owned as part of getting back on my feet. I have never owned Adobe software before and look forward to one day learning what the pros use.

 

I have worked in freelance off and on for a few years. I have had very happy clients. In the end I kept turning away more and more people due to not having the file formats they required.

 

Basically I want to achieve my dream and at the sametime move back to where my daughter lives.

 

I set a goal of $2000. That will get me the software I need to start my graphic freelancing. Anything left over will go towards the laptop for this work. Anything no matter how small will help and is greatly appreciated. 

 

I plan on putting half of every sale I make in my freelance work towards my daughters school fund/savings account. The other half will go back into my work.

 

I want to thank you for taking the time to read this. I am VERY grateful for any contributions.

story:
In March 2016, a mysterious team of cowboys, known only as the GOLDGENA PROJECT, began sowing the seeds of doubt in the hushed world of Swiss watchmaking by exposing the secrets of the Swiss Made label.

That made some people very unhappy, but others, many others, have joined us. Today is the day that we, along with our community of 15,000 registered members and 50,000 followers, launch CODE41: a community brand with the aim of creating attractive mechanical watches at reasonable prices, through a policy of complete transparency on origin, costs and development.
 

 

 

We are a watch design workshop based in Switzerland. In a little over 11 years we have had the honor of working alongside the most prestigious names in watchmaking.
 
We are fascinated by mechanical watches; especially those in which the mechanism is an integral part of the aesthetic of the piece. Unfortunately, they are often just too expensive. This is why we set to work with the clear objective of designing a spectacular piece using a standard mechanical movement.

 

 

The dial is levelly sculpted, with a machined look that radiates ‘mechanical’ to the point that it becomes an extension of the movement.

The case is simple, elegant and wearable, but both its lugs and its screwed container design ensure an appearance that is strong, distinctive and recognizable.

 

MIYOTA 82S7
JAPANESE MECHANICAL AUTOMATIC MOVEMENT
Hours, minutes (central hands) Second and 24h discs
Self-winding mechanism
Power reserve (if not worn) 40 hours
21,600 vibrations per hour
21 Jewels

 

For those who prefer simplicity, subtlety and elegance, allow us to introduce ANOMALY-02. A 3 hand date model fitted with the Swiss ETA 2824 automatic movement.

 

ETA 2824-2
SWISS MECHANICAL AUTOMATIC MOVEMENT
Hours, minutes, sweep second and date
Self-winding mechanism
Power reserve (if not worn): 40 hours
28.800 vibrations per hour
25 Jewels

The Japanese MIYOTA and Swiss ETA movements are of the utmost quality, precision and reliability. We have chosen our components for their high value for money and distinctiveness, rather than their origin.

 

 

 

 

You will have access to a variety of easily interchangeable straps, which are compatible with all of our models. 

 

 

To complete the range, we are currently working on textile, metal and rubber straps, which will be available in 2017. 

 

 

 

 

The diameter of a watch case is an important factor, and everyone has their own preference. We have tested a number of sizes, and ultimately decided on 42mm. Here’s how that looks on 3 different wrists.

 

 

 

Swiss Made watches are of high quality, admired around the world for their excellence. The only problem is that a watch which is labeled Swiss Made may in fact consist almost entirely of parts made in Asia!

 

For this reason we have decided to be completely transparent on origin, and to choose Swiss and international parts based on their distinctiveness and high value for money; not in order to meet the criteria of a deceptive Swiss Made label.

Our watches are high quality, manufactured in the best Chinese workshops, which have been producing many of the components for Swiss brands for decades.

 

 
 

 

We will be manufacturing our watches with transparency in mind. To this end we have created the TTO Label: Total Transparency on Origin. A kind of ID card will be included with each of our watches, as well as being available online. It will indicate the exact origin of each component and each stage of the process.

 

 

 

We are going to be transparent not only on origin, but also on the costs of production and development.

 

 

Distribution networks are saturated, and are not in tune with modern purchasing behavior. We are going to cut out the middlemen of traditional distribution and promote community power so that we can be closer to you, thus halving the retail price.

But that’s not all…we also want to share our success with you by offering a commission for each sale you generate.

 

 

The online market is growing stronger by the day, but it does still have a few drawbacks: most significantly the inability to see the watch in person before buying it.

Thanks to an innovative application, anyone who would like to order one of our models, but who wants to see it first, is able to speak with and meet a CODE41 watch owner close to them. Like this, the buyer can order their watch free of doubt, and the sponsor receives their 10% commission.

 

 

 

 

 

41 is the country code for Switzerland. Although our approach is based on international synergy, in terms of both manufacturing and our community, we do want to commemorate our fondness for Switzerland.

In computing, code 41 is a system error. We really like it as an analogy for our project, which represents an ANOMALY in the Swiss watchmaking system. 

 

 

Notre campagne est maintenant terminée. Merci beaucoup pour votre incroyable soutien! Vous pouvez toujours commander votre CODE41 sur notre site www.code41.ch

 

 

 

 

En Mars 2016, une mystérieuse équipe de cowboys, connue sous le nom de GOLDGENA PROJECT, sème le trouble dans l’univers feutré de l’horlogerie suisse en dévoilant les secrets du Swiss Made. Ça a rendu certains très mécontents mais d’autres, beaucoup d’autres, nous ont rejoint dans la création de CODE41 : Une marque communautaire qui a pour objectif de créer de la belle horlogerie mécanique à des prix accessibles en étant complètement transparent sur l’origine, les coûts et le développement.

 

 

Nous sommes un atelier de design horloger basé en Suisse. En un peu plus de 11 ans, nous avons eu l’honneur de collaborer avec les marques horlogères les plus prestigieuses. Les montres mécaniques nous fascinent et particulièrement celles où le mécanisme fait partie intégrante de l’esthétique. Malheureusement, elles sont souvent hors de prix. Alors nous nous sommes mis au travail avec la ferme intention de créer une pièce spectaculaire en utilisant un mouvement mécanique standard.

 

 

Le cadran est travaillé en niveau avec une esthétique usinée qui transpire la mécanique pour qu’il devienne un prolongement du mouvement. La boîte est simple, élégante et portable, mais ses cornes ainsi que sa construction en caisson lui confèrent une esthétique forte, particulière et reconnaissable.

 

 

MIYOTA 82S7
MOUVEMENT MÉCANIQUE AUTOMATIQUE JAPONAIS
Heures, minutes au centre, disques seconde et 24h
Remontoir automatique
Réserve de marche (si non portée): 40 heures
21.600 A/h
21 Rubis

 

Pour ceux qui préfèrent la sobriété, la finesse et l’élégance, voici ANOMALY-02. Un modèle 3 aiguilles / date équipé du mouvement automatique suisse ETA 2824

 

 

ETA 2824-2
MOUVEMENT MÉCANIQUE AUTOMATIQUE SUISSE
Heures, minutes, seconde au centre et date
Remontoir automatique
Réserve de marche (si non portée): 40 heures
28.800 A/h
25 Rubis

 

Les mouvements japonais MIYOTA et suisses ETA sont d’une extrême qualité, précision et fiabilité. Nous choisissons nos composants pour leur haut rapport qualité/ prix et leur particularité et non pour leur origine.

 

 

 

Voici une variété de bracelets qui sont facilement interchangeables et compatibles avec tous nos modèles.

 

 

Pour compléter la gamme, nous travaillons actuellement sur des bracelets textile, métal et caoutchouc qui seront disponibles en 2017. 

 

 

Le diamètre d’une montre est un facteur important et chacun a sa préférence. Nous avons testé bon nombre de tailles et avons finalement opté pour un 42mm. Voici ce que ça donne sur 3 poignets différents.

 

 

Les montres Swiss Made sont de haute qualité et appréciées dans le monde pour leur excellence. Seulement voilà, une montre labellisée Swiss Made peut avoir la quasi-totalité de ses composants provenant d’Asie!

 

Nous avons, donc, décidé d’être totalement transparents sur l’origine et de choisir des éléments suisses et étrangers pour leur particularité et leur rapport qualité/ prix élevé et non pas pour répondre aux critères d’un Swiss Made trompeur.  

En Chine, comme partout dans le monde, on trouve une qualité et des prix très variables parmi les entreprises d’un même secteur. Nos montres sont de haute qualité et sont fabriquées dans les meilleurs ateliers chinois qui produisent depuis des décennies bon nombre de composants pour les marques suisses.  

 

Nous allons fabriquer nos montres sous le signe de la transparence. Pour ce faire nous avons créé le Label TTO : Transparence Totale sur l’Origine. Une sorte de carte d’identité sera jointe à chacune de nos pièces et disponible en ligne. Elle indiquera très précisément l’origine de chaque composant et de chaque opération.

 

 

Nous allons être transparents sur l’origine mais également sur les coûts de fabrication et le développement.

 

 

Les réseaux de distribution sont saturés et ne sont pas en phase avec les nouveaux comportements d’achat. Nous allons supprimer les intermédiaires de la distribution traditionnelle et favoriser la puissance communautaire pour être plus proche de vous et diviser ainsi le prix public par 2.

Mais ce n’est pas tout... nous voulons également partager notre succès avec vous en vous versant une commission pour chaque vente que vous générez.

 

 

La vente online se développe de plus en plus mais présente quelques lacunes, la principale étant l’impossibilité de toucher la montre avant de l’acheter.

Grâce à une application, une personne qui aimerait commander l’un de nos modèles, mais pas sans l’avoir vu, peut dialoguer et rencontrer le possesseur d’une montre CODE41 proche de lui. L’acheteur peut ainsi commander en toute confiance et le parrain touche sa commission de 10%.

 

 

 

 

 

Le 41 est le code pays de la Suisse. Bien que notre démarche soit fondée sur une synergie internationale, tant du point de vue de la fabrication que de la communauté, nous voulons marquer notre attachement à la Suisse.

En informatique le code 41 est une erreur système. Nous aimons bien l’analogie avec notre projet qui représente une anomalie (d'où le nom de nos modèles ANOMALY) dans le système horloger suisse.
story_txt:
Our campaign is now over. Thank you very much for the amazing support. You can still order a CODE41 Watch on our website www.code41.ch

 
 
  


    In March 2016, a mysterious team of cowboys, known only as the GOLDGENA PROJECT, began sowing the seeds of doubt in the hushed world of Swiss watchmaking by exposing the secrets of the Swiss Made label.That made some people very unhappy, but others, many others, have joined us. Today is the day that we, along with our community of 15,000 registered members and 50,000 followers, launch CODE41: a community brand with the aim of creating attractive mechanical watches at reasonable prices, through a policy of complete transparency on origin, costs and development.   We are a watch design workshop based in Switzerland. In a little over 11 years we have had the honor of working alongside the most prestigious names in watchmaking. We are fascinated by mechanical watches; especially those in which the mechanism is an integral part of the aesthetic of the piece. Unfortunately, they are often just too expensive. This is why we set to work with the clear objective of designing a spectacular piece using a standard mechanical movement.


 

 
The dial is levelly sculpted, with a machined look that radiates ‘mechanical’ to the point that it becomes an extension of the movement.
The case is simple, elegant and wearable, but both its lugs and its screwed container design ensure an appearance that is strong, distinctive and recognizable.

 

MIYOTA 82S7JAPANESE MECHANICAL AUTOMATIC MOVEMENTHours, minutes (central hands) Second and 24h discsSelf-winding mechanismPower reserve (if not worn) 40 hours21,600 vibrations per hour21 Jewels

 
For those who prefer simplicity, subtlety and elegance, allow us to introduce ANOMALY-02. A 3 hand date model fitted with the Swiss ETA 2824 automatic movement.

 

ETA 2824-2SWISS MECHANICAL AUTOMATIC MOVEMENTHours, minutes, sweep second and dateSelf-winding mechanismPower reserve (if not worn): 40 hours28.800 vibrations per hour25 Jewels

The Japanese MIYOTA and Swiss ETA movements are of the utmost quality, precision and reliability. We have chosen our components for their high value for money and distinctiveness, rather than their origin. 
 

 

 
You will have access to a variety of easily interchangeable straps, which are compatible with all of our models. 

 

 
To complete the range, we are currently working on textile, metal and rubber straps, which will be available in 2017. 
 
 
 

 

 
The diameter of a watch case is an important factor, and everyone has their own preference. We have tested a number of sizes, and ultimately decided on 42mm. Here’s how that looks on 3 different wrists.
 

 

 
Swiss Made watches are of high quality, admired around the world for their excellence. The only problem is that a watch which is labeled Swiss Made may in fact consist almost entirely of parts made in Asia!

 
For this reason we have decided to be completely transparent on origin, and to choose Swiss and international parts based on their distinctiveness and high value for money; not in order to meet the criteria of a deceptive Swiss Made label.
Our watches are high quality, manufactured in the best Chinese workshops, which have been producing many of the components for Swiss brands for decades.

A kind of ID card will be included with each of our watches, as well as being available online. It will indicate the exact origin of each component and each stage of the process.
 

 

 
We are going to be transparent not only on origin, but also on the costs of production and development.


 
 
Distribution networks are saturated, and are not in tune with modern purchasing behavior. We are going to cut out the middlemen of traditional distribution and promote community power so that we can be closer to you, thus halving the retail price.
But that’s not all…we also want to share our success with you by offering a commission for each sale you generate.

 

 
The online market is growing stronger by the day, but it does still have a few drawbacks: most significantly the inability to see the watch in person before buying it.
Thanks to an innovative application, anyone who would like to order one of our models, but who wants to see it first, is able to speak with and meet a CODE41 watch owner close to them. Like this, the buyer can order their watch free of doubt, and the sponsor receives their 10% commission.

 

 

 

 

 
41 is the country code for Switzerland. Although our approach is based on international synergy, in terms of both manufacturing and our community, we do want to commemorate our fondness for Switzerland.
In computing, code 41 is a system error. We really like it as an analogy for our project, which represents an ANOMALY in the Swiss watchmaking system. 
 
 
 
 
Notre campagne est maintenant terminée. Merci beaucoup pour votre incroyable soutien! Vous pouvez toujours commander votre CODE41 sur notre site www.code41.ch

story:
Hi there. I'm Forest, a new mom and the founder of Nui Cobalt Designs.  I handcraft talismans under select Astrological conditions.  This business is the realization of a life long dream to merge a timeless tradition of wisdom with elegance and artistry.

We have gained such popularity in just under two years, that my monthly talisman collections have been selling out in a matter of minutes.  I want to produce more, to keep up with the rising demand, and to expand our creative repertoire.  For that I need your help.


What We Need & What You Get

To keep Nui Cobalt Designs alive and thriving in the coming year, two things are critical.

  • We need a new, faster website and secure, reliable hosting to make sure it works smoothly under heavy traffic.  Estimated cost is $300 per month / $3600 for the year. 
  • We also need a secure, dedicated office space and workshop to support our increased productivity.  Estimated cost is $650 per month / $7800 for the year.

    With these two simple factors addressed, we're confident that we can succeed in keeping pace with the growing demand for our work. 

Flourishing - via "Soothsayer" perk

To thank you for your support, we're offering some really special perks that you can only get through this fundraising campaign.
  • Book a Personal Astrology or Tarot Reading with Forest
  • Receive Exclusive, Limited Edition Talismans
  • Download a recorded Guided Meditation before it's released to the public
  • Try our newest Apothecary Creations before they're released to the public
  • Call "Dibs" on a Talisman in an Upcoming Collection
  • Get a lot more. (We really, really want this to work.)

Flowering - via "Oracle" Perk


Risks & Challenges

Our greatest challenge is simply keeping up: producing enough and maintaining a strong enough infrastructure to meet the rising demand.  We feel passionately about this art form, and while we want to become faster and more efficient, we refuse to cut corners.  We believe that expanding our virtual space and physical space will move us forward in exactly the right direction, without compromise.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please give what you can and help us spread the word about this campaign.  If you're just finding out about us, see why our customers love us and join in the conversation!

  • Browse some of our most popular pieces, here: http://www.nuicobaltdesigns.com/sold-items/
  • Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NuiCobaltDesigns
  • Subscribe to our email newsletter: http://www.nuicobaltdesigns.com/astrology-report-signup/
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to tell your friends all about us!

I hope our work will become a source of inspiration and support for you, too.  Thanks for taking the time to learn about Nui Cobalt Designs.

story:
MONTREE

Montree designs consciously hip clothing for the urban bohemian. All garments are handmade and sustainably sourced from eco-jersey, up-cycled lace, and indigenous trims. Montree is comfortable, wearable, versatile, and above all beautiful.

 

MONTREE CUSTOMER

The hipster, the hippie, the creative, the activist, the yogi, the nature lover, the city lover. She is looking to save the world, while making it beautiful at the same time. She wants to be comfortable, but she also wants the edge. She is a working woman, she is a mother, she is a student, she is a healer, she is a full time lover of life.

 

GROWING UP

Montree is growing! Last year I made close to 400 pieces doing all the designing, sourcing, and sewing myself. More importantly, all 400 pieces sold in a handful of fairs, trunk shows, and online stores. This year, Montree’s team is starting to grow too, and OUR goal for this year is to make and sell at least 1000 pieces. We will do more fairs and shows, create and promote our own montreedesigns.com web store, and begin to include more retail stores always reaching out to our loyal and rapidly growing following.

 

THE OPPORTUNITY

This demand for Montree finally allows, and even requires that I no longer do all the sewing myself. Yeaaah!!!  This is a very exciting opportunity because it allows me not only to grow, but also to transfer my energy to designing even better quality pieces, as well as sales and marketing, allowing Montree to grow even more in the years to come and empower even MORE women along the way!!

 

THE PROJECT

With your help, we are setting up a whole new supply chain in Mexico, which in addition to scaling production will improve quality while ALSO increasing our positive social impact. This is important because I am dedicated to creating fashion that not only helps make the world more beautiful, but also helps create a more sustainable, just, and compassionate world for everyone.

 

THE IMPACT

After the success I had setting up a women's cooperative in Ghana last year, I am excited to continue directly working with and supporting women artisans. In this next phase, we will support indigenous artisans in Naupan a community in Puebla Mexico creating beautiful embroidery, helping to keep their art alive by making it relevant and marketable to the urban customer. 

WHY YOU??

We are on our way! And we need your help to seed this exciting next phase. We are inviting Montree fans, collectors, and friends; old, new, and in the making to help manifest this dream.

 

WHERE YOUR MONEY WILL GO

- Creating graded pattens (small to large) + production samples of 2012 line
- Producing initial runs for each design
- Sourcing sustainable fabrics
- Creating original custom hand made embroidery made by Naupan women artisans
- Completing photo shoots of each design for online sales and look book
- Launching new website and online store
- Developing marketing print materials 

GET YOUR PERKS TODAY!!!

You can PRE ORDER a MonTree shirt, reversible lace skirt or the jersey embroidered skirt today!! We are working on these skirts right now in Mexico and they are going to be GORGEOUS, and will come in many different colors ands SIZES!!! WohOOo!! SO many fun other perks as well, FRIENDSHIP bracelets, MOntree Scarfs, and discounts on Montree for the year! Oh MY GoOODness!!

NOTE: I dont have pictures of the actual items you will be getting, but as soon as I have pictures I will post them in MAY. You can look in the gallery at the embroidery tops and skirts and what you get will look very similar to these. Sorry for the inconveniece, but trust me they are ALL really beautiful and there is something for everyone!! <3 <3 <3

 

SPREAD THE WORD! WE NEED YOUR HELP!!!

We so much appreciate your love and support!  How ever you can help $20, $100, ,$5000, every little bit helps!!! Regardless of what you can or can't contribute directly, please also help spread the word, forward, post, like Montree on FB, etc.

 

MY BACKGROUND

I have been designing and making clothes for as long as I can remember. As a child I would cut up my own clothes to create designs for my dolls. Inspired by this, my mother planted the seed by encouraging me to become a fashion designer. I studied fashion design at Columbia College in Chicago. I then moved to San Francisco and studied fashion, merchandising, and product development at FIDM. Seeking cultural, aesthetic, and spiritual inspiration, I traveled extensively through India, Nepal, Thailand, Latin America, Europe, and Africa. In my time abroad, I found a love for the planet and for working with indigenous women whose skills I found inspiring and irreplaceable. MonTree's current projects are inspired by my recent work with women from Ghana, Mexico, Peru, and shelters in Brooklyn. Im dedicated to empowering women and making their beauty come alive.

We are on our way! And we need your help to seed this exciting next phase. We are inviting Montree fans, collectors, and friends; old, new, and in the making to help manifest this dream.
 
WHERE YOUR MONEY WILL GO
- Creating graded pattens (small to large) + production samples of 2012 line- Producing initial runs for each design- Sourcing sustainable fabrics- Creating original custom hand made embroidery made by Naupan women artisans- Completing photo shoots of each design for online sales and look book- Launching new website and online store- Developing marketing print materials 
GET YOUR PERKS TODAY!!!
You can PRE ORDER a MonTree shirt, reversible lace skirt or the jersey embroidered skirt today!! We are working on these skirts right now in Mexico and they are going to be GORGEOUS, and will come in many different colors ands SIZES!!! WohOOo!! SO many fun other perks as well, FRIENDSHIP bracelets, MOntree Scarfs, and discounts on Montree for the year! Oh MY GoOODness!!
NOTE: I dont have pictures of the actual items you will be getting, but as soon as I have pictures I will post them in MAY. You can look in the gallery at the embroidery tops and skirts and what you get will look very similar to these. Sorry for the inconveniece, but trust me they are ALL really beautiful and there is something for everyone!! <3 <3 <3

 
SPREAD THE WORD! WE NEED YOUR HELP!!!
We so much appreciate your love and support!  How ever you can help $20, $100, ,$5000, every little bit helps!!! Regardless of what you can or can't contribute directly, please also help spread the word, forward, post, like Montree on FB, etc.
 
MY BACKGROUND
I have been designing and making clothes for as long as I can remember. As a child I would cut up my own clothes to create designs for my dolls. Inspired by this, my mother planted the seed by encouraging me to become a fashion designer. I studied fashion design at Columbia College in Chicago. I then moved to San Francisco and studied fashion, merchandising, and product development at FIDM. Seeking cultural, aesthetic, and spiritual inspiration, I traveled extensively through India, Nepal, Thailand, Latin America, Europe, and Africa. In my time abroad, I found a love for the planet and for working with indigenous women whose skills I found inspiring and irreplaceable. MonTree's current projects are inspired by my recent work with women from Ghana, Mexico, Peru, and shelters in Brooklyn. Im dedicated to empowering women and making their beauty come alive.

story:
Well, I was trying to post the shot of Pride 2 for those interested in the print and to no avail. So see above.  

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I'm CM Glover, founder of Milieu and this app - "Cruising the North East: Westbrook to Watch Hill".  I've spent most of my adult life 'behind the camera'.

I received my MAH from the University of Virginia and studied abroad for awhile as a grad student.

As a professional photojournalist for the past 'few' years, the New York Times has been a big client since 1999.  They've had me all over Connecticut, as well as in RI and MA. I've met an amazing number of people and have always enjoyed the feature work.  Other well known clients have included Smithsonian, National Geographic, Chesapeake Bay Magazine, the Baltimore Sun, Patuxent Publishing and not long ago I contributed several images to the Rick Smolan book, "America at Home".  In the last few years I have been searching for a way to continue being creative (in the way I most enjoy - shooting and writing editorial) in an ever changing publishing industry.  This is how Milieu came into being.

We are creating an iPad app for boaters which will feature the eastern CT shoreline from Westbrook to Watch Hill; with special mention of day trips to Orient Point, Fisher's Island, and Block Island.  Instead of a series of lists, it will be written in the form of articles - in an engaging editorial style.  Think special edition travel style magazine...

This app is geared toward recreational boaters, both power and sail, from dinghies to yachts, and will be the first in a series of apps covering the north east.  However, travelers by land will also find much of the information interesting.

 

Collaborators

On board we also have K.H. Aspinwall, a videographer and owner of Hamilton Communications in Westbrook, CT.  With over 25 years as a professional, he is looking forward to some time out on the water.

By the way - don't blame him for my little slideshow - he is slammed right now with work and I threw that together with my old iMovie.  We needed to get this posted. Video in the app will be extraordinary!

We also have Renee Beaulieu, professional writer, editor and copy editor, plus a sailing enthusiast for many years, who will be helping with the editing when it is time to throw all of this material together into a readable format.

And we will be getting some help from Sara Guzzo, graphic designer; Jacob Wilson, programmer and designer; and several others in the creative community.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We are seeking initial funding with this campaign to keep the momentum going as we get into the peak boating season this summer.  In particular we need to get all of the photos and video shot while the boating season is in full swing.

Following is a brief outline of what the app will include:

~ Features of the eastern Connecticut coastline.

- Geographic (to include aerial slideshow)

- Ambiance of accessible local towns

~ Popular boating areas.

- scenic

- anchorages

- day trips

~ Nearby destinations for larger craft.

- Block Island

- Fisher's Island

- Orient Point, LI

- Newport/ Jamestown, RI

~ Marinas & places to dock.

- What they offer ... amenities, fuel, repairs, etc

- What they can accommodate 

~ Walking Distance.

- Restaurants/Bars - esp. restaurants with their own docks.

- Amenities - incl. yacht clubs, Sailing Foundation, free bikes in Mystic and NL

- Attractions

- Supplies - food, toiletries, etc.

- General shopping - clothing, jewelry, tourist

~ Don't Miss

- Most popular things in all categories. Example - Esker Point's free summer beach concerts.

~ Things to know before you go.

- Boat ramps, brief descriptions, links to state website.

- Weather - fog

- Fishing - permits and limitations.  (However this is not a fishing app so basic info only on permits and with applicable links).

- Coast Guard - basic rules and contact info.

- Warnings - uncharted obstacles

- Helpful - beaches that allow you to walk dogs.

- Car rental - Enterprise picks up.

 

All funds will help.  Among the things we need to pay for are; aerial photography, videography, editing, copy editing, design and layout, programming the app and of course photography and writing, plus the associated expenses.

 

OUR PERKS

After researching this I have been told that Apple will not allow us to 'give away' apps for which we are planning to charge a fee.  Even though we are not planning to charge more than ~ $2.99 for this app.
So for our perks I have had to come up with other options.  If you know differently and know a way that we can give copies of the app to contributors (with minimal paperwork - since we are trying to keep our budget way down) please shoot me an email and let me know how this can be done.  CruisingNE@gmail.com
 
My goal has been to get you all involved as much as possible.  And I am most certainly open to your suggestions for perks!
 

Corporate Rewards (Advertising/Sponsorships)

We are actively seeking advertisers.   In order to present an elegant and readable design to our readers, we are limiting advertising to a maximum of eight full page ads.

This app will be available for download (for a nominal fee) for a projected two years, until a new edition with updated content will replace it.  Advertisers/sponsorships remain in the app until the next edition, at which time they will have the option to renew.  Your full page ad will be in place for a minimum of a year, plus your logo will be placed on the website (not up yet), and we are considering having each advertiser be the featured advertiser for a period of one month in any marketing emails.

Sponsorships will be available for video segments.  "Sponsored by" in the title, with your logo and links on the page.  And for a premium, a 30 second clip of the sponsor's facility or product can be added to the end of video segments.  (We can produce the clip or you may provide it, but again we have quality control).

If you have something else you would like to do as a video sponsor we are open to suggestions.  Think 'elegant' ...

Advertisers may also place video or slideshows within their full page ad, but this is also a 'premium' ad.

 

If you do not have the resources to help, but you like what we are doing - please, please spread the word!!  We will rain many blessings down upon you.  : )

 

When we reach (or exceed) our total funding goals - and not just this initial round of funding, but all of it - we will be holding a launch party for the app next spring in CT.  Everyone who has contributed at least $250 to the project, as a patron, sponsor, or advertiser, will be a special VIP at the party.  However, we will make it possible for others to come with a small contribution going to a local non-profit.

So help us reach all of our funding goals and we will have a great party to celebrate the app and the beginning of boating season next year!!

If you are interested, we will be happy to keep you posted.  I can't be specific about a venue at this time, but water and boats will be involved.  

: )

If you have any ideas for perks we haven't mentioned - please send an email.

CruisingNE@gmail.com

I will be personally responding to each email in as timely a manner as possible.  Most emails to be sent in the middle of the night... ; )

story:
WHETHER YOU ARE LOOKING TO PROTECT YOUR NEW CUSHIONS FROM THE ELEMENTS, ESTHETICALLY RESTORE OR REFASHION YOUR EXISTING FURNITURE CUSHIONS, THIS VERSATILE SLIPCOVER WILL DO ALL THREE AS WELL AS MAKE YOUR LIFE EASIER DURING THE PATIO SEASON.


  • PROTECT

Our quality slipcovers are made of 100% polyester fabric with a waterproof backing. This soft to the touch, lightweight fabric is water repellent, UV protected and machine washable.

The unique feature of the attached bag makes these slipcovers compact, convenient,  practical and easy to store. Just reach for the bag inside the slipcover, zip both sides of the bag, put the cover in and hang it on the back of the furniture.

It's that simple!


  • RESTORE

Sometimes the furniture is still in good condition but the cushions have faded, ripped and look terrible. You hate to throw it away, especially now that we are conscious of what waste does to our environment. Buying cushions for a full set of furniture can be expensive. These slipcovers are made to cover more than one cushion, so after doing the math, you will find that it is more cost effective than buying new cushions.

Be environmentally friendly and RESTORE your furniture!


  • REFASHION

The ever growing patio industry has been bringing the indoor comfort outdoors. It is predicted that this trend will continue for some time to come. In this modern world of competition, keeping  up with the Joneses is a difficult thing to do and that's why we designed the ultimate waterproof slipcover that will allow the consumer to change the look of their outdoor oasis at a minimum cost.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NO EXTRA STORAGE NEEDED.

The conveniently attached bag eliminates storage hassles when all you need is the back of the furniture. Whether you're at the cottage or in a high rise apartment, you can still enjoy the comfort of outdoor furniture with cushions and not worry about storage.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FURNITURE CAN STILL BE USED WITH THE COVERS ON.

It's a warm day but the weather man is calling for scattered showers. You're not sure if it's worth the time to take the covers off? Well, with these slipcovers, you can sit on the furniture while having the cushions protected and enjoy your day outside. After all, it might or might NOT rain!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THESE  COVERS STAY SECURE.

Some of the current covers on the market don't stay on the furniture. The wind picks them up and next thing you know your neighbour's at your door with your cover. This is not a problem with CoverLOUNGIES©. Having the weight of two or more cushions inside the slipcover will also help keep the cushions secure on the furniture.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GREAT IDEA FOR AROUND THE POOL OR BY THE LAKE.

CoverLOUNGIES© are a great idea to have by the pool. Just think of how often you've sat on a wet chair after the kids have been swimming. As much as you tell them not to sit or throw their wet towels on the furniture, you know it's going to happen. Why not let everyone enjoy the summer?  Throw  CoverLOUNGIES© on, have fun in the pool, take the covers off when you are done. Enjoy dry cushions for the rest of the day.

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

AT PEOPLE'S REQUEST, WE HAVE ALSO DESIGNED A LINE OF CoverLOUNGIES© FOR RECREATIONAL VEHICLES.

Family

If you bring your kids camping, you must know how much sand you need to brush off before making the beds not to mention the wet swimsuits and towels. Don’t get upset at the kids, put CoverLOUNGIES© on during the day, take them off to make the beds  and keep your blood pressure down.

Grandparents

If you’re a grandparent with a new RV and you feel a panic attack coming on when you see the grandchildren coming with a wet swimsuit and a chocolate ice cream cone in their hand, put CoverLOUNGIES© on and relax.

Hunters & Fishermen

If you're a guy that appreciates your wife letting you take the family RV on your sporting trips, make her happy and protect those cushions from dirty sporting  gear and cover them up with CoverLOUNGIES©.

REMEMBER, A HAPPY WIFE IS A HAPPY LIFE!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SO WHEN CAN I GET THEM? Well, with your help, hopefully in time for the next patio season.

Now that we've tested our local market and got the feedback that we needed, it's time to take the next step and make it available to all of you. Our plan is to take it to major retailers and bring CoverLOUNGIES© to you in different trendy colours and patterns.

Thus far, my partner and I have been making them from our home (several hundred units) but with the potential of mass orders, it is not feasible for us to continue with this route. This is why we carefully searched and referenced the manufacturer that we chose. They are now ready for us to give them the green light to go! 


WHY DO WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT?

Since the beginning, we have been able to sustain the financial burden associated with the start up of a new business, the research and development of the prototype and the material needed to make those several hundred units. However, in order to move it into full production, we will incur many expenses such as manufacturing costs, packaging, freight, warehousing and many other expenses that will increase cost considerably.

We understand that not everyone can donate. YOU CAN STILL HELP IN A VERY IMPORTANT WAY. If you beleive that this product deserves a fair chance at getting to market, please SHARE with your friends and familly.


WHY SHOULD YOU PUT YOUR TRUST IN US?

  • Because we KNOW we have a great product.
  • Because we are NOT afraid of working hard.
  • Because we DON'T give up on something we beleive in.
  • Because the outdoor industry says that the timing is PERFECT!


FROM THE BOTTOM OF OUR HEARTS, WE THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!


              Lise Chamberland                                                         Kathy Moggy

                                     Seamstresses with over 40 years of experience.

AGAIN, OUR SINCERE THANKS!

story:
Meet the Veneera Veneer - the simplest & most affordable solution to get a Hollywood smile, build for everyday use

 

Cutting edge biocompatible materials combined with latest milling techniques, make the basis for its realistic appearance and natural wearing comfort

 

Convincing product characteristics as a result of 3 years continuous development. Finally, we can offer a veneer that is not even noticed by the person wearing it

 

Get your new smile without ever having to visit the dentist. The impression kit is being sent right to your door. Customers make their dental impression in the comfort of their homes.

We have a success rate of 97% thanks to a patent pending impression material

 

The before and after transformation is immediate and overwhelming! With two colors to choose from, you decide how significant the change will be

 

Common benefits: A better attitude towards life, greater recognition, more attractiveness and self-confidence

 

Simply put the veneer on whenever you like or wear it the entire day. You can even eat or sleep with it

 

The freedom to smile and laugh freely again without being ashamed of the real teeth is overwhelming

 

The new solution for people who can not afford the dentist or do not have the insurance coverage.

 

Two friends from Cologne (Köln), Germany who started Veneera with the dream to offer a cheap alternative to expensive dental veneers

3 years and 1,372 orders later with your help we want to expand globally. 

While there are 2-3 alternatives worldwide, they start at $500-$1000 per veneer that can be worn on a daily basis. With sufficient funding we can improve our production efficiency as well as capacity to offer our newly developed Veneer for only 89$.

 

Denture model print based on the provided impression by the customer. Once the model is scanned, the CAD/CAM Design process of the veneer can start

 

Mill-cutting process of the Veneera Veneer. Made out of best PMMA acrylic for excellent durability

 

Post-Production processing for the perfect finish. We have a strict quality management

We seek funding for the following:

  • New Milling Machine (Roland DWX-52DC, used)

  • Employees for post-production process and fulfillment in the US

  • First production facility in the US

 

Back us now to become part of our success story. 

We highly appreciate any contribution

Common benefits: A better attitude towards life, greater recognition, more attractiveness and self-confidence Simply put the veneer on whenever you like or wear it the entire day. You can even eat or sleep with it The freedom to smile and laugh freely again without being ashamed of the real teeth is overwhelming The new solution for people who can not afford the dentist or do not have the insurance coverage. Two friends from Cologne (Köln), Germany who started Veneera with the dream to offer a cheap alternative to expensive dental veneers3 years and 1,372 orders later with your help we want to expand globally. While there are 2-3 alternatives worldwide, they start at $500-$1000 per veneer that can be worn on a daily basis. With sufficient funding we can improve our production efficiency as well as capacity to offer our newly developed Veneer for only 89$. Denture model print based on the provided impression by the customer. Once the model is scanned, the CAD/CAM Design process of the veneer can start Mill-cutting process of the Veneera Veneer. Made out of best PMMA acrylic for excellent durability Post-Production processing for the perfect finish. We have a strict quality managementWe seek funding for the following:
New Milling Machine (Roland DWX-52DC, used)
Employees for post-production process and fulfillment in the US
First production facility in the US
 Back us now to become part of our success story. We highly appreciate any contribution

story:
The effect of stress creates a hormone in our body called Cortisol.

Increased levels of Cortisol are very damaging to the brain and body.

 

High levels are linked to numerous health problems such as depression, reduced bone density, thyroid problems, reduced cognitive performance, reduced muscle tissue, lowered immunity, blood-sugar imbalances, inflammation in the body, increased abdominal fat, and cholesterol imbalances. The "cure" for stress and reduced Cortisol is meditation. However, the benefits of meditation come with regular practice and can take years to perfect.

 

Maybe you are considering  to  buy minddo  to reduce stress easily. But read further for more features.

 

 

 

 

Beta waves vibrate in the range from about 12 to 35 Hz. Beta represents the active attention state. Focus, when you need to!

 

Alpha waves vibrate in the range from about 7 to 12 Hz. Alpha waves occur during the rest of sensory, mental relaxation, deep relaxation, meditation or pacified mind. If alpha waves are increasing, we feel heat to the extremities and experience improved immune function, a sense of peace and well-being, increased productivity in the workplace, improved academic performance, reduced anxiety and better sleep. Live without stress!

It is believed that most creative geniuses  stayed and worked in an almost constant state of Alpha. Alpha waves increase our ability to take in huge amounts of information, and develop abstract thinking and creativity. Achieve your goals!

 

Theta waves are associated with the state of sleep, also called the "twilight" state, a state of hypnotic trance and the dream state. This state increases the activity of memory, access to the subconscious, creativity and unexpected insights. Understand others better!

 

Delta waves are the slowest wave of brain activity with a frequency oscillating from 1 to 3 Hz. Delta waves dominate when we fall asleep and continue to prevail in a state of deep sleep. It is considered as the most mysterious state, by now!

 

 

As the basic functionality, the device helps to achieve those states by resonance. It stimulates the cerebellum, the part of the brain which is responsible for the emotions and motoric behavior.

 

Consider  buying it ?

That is just the beginning of its functionality!

 

A monotone frequency facilitates the transition to another state. When you are sleepy but you want to focus instead, for example, or when you are stressed and want to relax. But the basic states represent only very simple waves, like listening to "music" with only one sound in the same rhythm or writing a book with one letter.

 

The brainwaves are complex, and each part of the brain produces different waves. Therefore, we created a device which can stimulate the brain, especially the cerebellum, at 5 different locations and it can produce different waves at each location. In addition to this, this device has also a much more complex functionality. It can also record the brainwaves at those 5 locations and accurately playing them back. Playing a nice, complex music with many instruments.

 

 

So you can use the machine to help transition to a different state, but you can also use it as a brainwave sensor to record your thoughts, or to replay them for yourself or for your friends / partner / children. Their brain will understand your thoughts, even if not precisely, of course. But the main message will be delivered and it helps to communicate things that you can not describe in words. "Listening” to others’ thoughts is also a good game. And imagine recording your brainwaves during your good moments and replaying them when you are sad. This would immediately change your mood, faster than any pill.

By now, there is no other device which can record your brainwaves and also stimulate your brain in one.

 

This is how the device looks when we remove the plastic cover at the back. It has 5 small electromagnets inside to capture brain activity or produce electromagnetic waves. The device has no moving parts and no cables. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Imagine that you are in control of your mind and mood! And you also utilize this secret technique to perform better than others.

 

 


The device has no moving parts and cables which could break easily. It uses an optional Bluetooth and smart-phone software for more complex functions. For basic functions, like the 8 basic frequencies and recording, no Bluetooth is needed. Bluetooth is only used for to transmit the waves to the phone and from the phone to the device. Aside from that, it is recommended that Bluetooth be turned off as it can interfere with the brainwaves.

By now, you have a very good understanding of the features of minddo®. If you still have some questions or want to know the story of inventing minddo®, please, scroll down.

  

 

It started in 2004, when Zoltan participated in a training (Agykontroll and Agykontroll ULTRA, Laszlo Domjan, Budapest) about the effects of the electro-magnetic fields on living organs. At the time, he was an electrical engineer and had learned about the brain because of his artificial intelligence study. He immediately came up with the idea of connecting these three fields of science,  by way of an electronic device which measures and transmits the brain's electromagnetic waves and emits electro-magnetic waves.

In 2008 he travelled to Asia to create the first prototype and find the manufacturer.

Then, with the start of the smart-phone, the technology and possibilities changed so rapidly that every year he created a new, improved version. In 2012, he immigrated to Australia with his family and started to work on a device which can not only measure, but also record and transmit the waves using smart-phones.

In 2016, the prototype of a brainwave-measuring, -recording and -transmitting device was ready. Then, in 2017, he started this fund-raising project to produce the device efficiently in high quantities efficiently.

 

 

 

 

 

Do you ship worldwide?

Yes, we ship to all countries for the same flat fee with international tracking.

 

What material did you use for minddo®?

We used non-allergic, durable and flexible plastic. The product is completely latex free.

 

Is it safe?

It is absolutely safe. Minimal power is used, and the technology is FDA approved. You can use it all day long, or for short periods, it is totally up to you. The more you use it, the better it will work for you.

 

Are there special materials needed to clean the device?

No, you can keep the device clean by using wet wipes, or any alcohol based sanitiser.

 

Where does the name come from?

The name come from the words "mind" and the "do". Do you mind discovering what your mind can do?

 

Do I need to charge the device?

Yes. The device has an internal power source in order to avoid any inconvenient and breakable cables. However, you only need to charge the device approximately once per month.

 

Is the device bulky because of the battery?

Not at all. It has a very small battery on the side of the band, so even if your head is on the bed, you can not feel it. The band is less than half a centimetre thick.

 

Is it waterproof?

It is sweat proof but do not use it in the shower.

 

What is your return policy?

During the Indiegogo campaign, you can get a refund at any time. We also provide a 30 day money back guarantee after you receive the product because we are sure that you will be more than satisfied with the quality and efficiency.

 

Is minddo a medical device?

No, absolutely not. However, it can improve general health (depression, anxiety, stress, insomnia, fatigue, tiredness) and the technology is FDA approved for medical uses as well.

 

Is it scientifically proven?

Yes, PEMS (pulsed electromagnetic stimulation, or PEMF - pulsed electromagnetic field) has been scientifically proven since the early 1900's. Many benefits of Pulsed Electro-Magnetic Field (―PEMF‖) therapy have been demonstrated through more than 2,000 university level double-blind medical studies done in many countries with many different PEMF therapy devices. Some of the positive effects of PEMF therapy were well established by the mid 1900’s. The first commercially produced PEMF therapy devices entered the market in the early 1900's. These were used for studies and experimentation in healing and cellular wellness. They were sold both to consumers and as medical devices to doctors. The first commercially produced high power PEMF therapy devices entered the market around 1975. They focused on cellular regeneration, pain reduction and the health of muscles, nerves, tendons, ligaments and cartilage.

 

Save money and order minddo® before it is on the market!

story:
Detachable, Easy-to-use, Non-slip and Affordable!

With the 9to6 mid-section arch support for Chuck Taylors, you don't have to sacrifice comfort for style! Now enjoy classic look for Chuck Taylors without every step. 

Designed to relieve foot fatigue, this little nub of soft material sits between your toes, providing comfort as you walk. 

9to6 can be used regardless of the size of the shoes. It's like... magic.

9to6 distributes the impact evenly when you walk. So you don't feel so tired when you wear your Chuck Taylors all day. It doesn't hurt any more to look so good

When we designed the 9to6 arch support insole to fit the contour of your foot so that your body weight is evenly distributed over the bottom of your feet. 

9to6 has a special patch to prevent your feet from slipping around inside your shoes. This prevents your poor toes from getting wedged into the narrow front of your shoes, possibly causing those ugly and painful bunions.

9to6 used special material called EVA to disperse impact. 

The 9to6 insoles are mounted inside your shoes with special reusable sticker. You can detach and re-attach to make fine adjustments. Washing in water restores adhesiveness. If you own many pairs of Chucks, you can move the arch supports from one pair of shoes to another. Besides Chuck Taylors, it can also be used on other shoes. But we're really hoping that you don't get cheap and buy multiples sets of insoles!

story:
Whitmore Watches

 

Affordable. Versatile. Timeless.  The 3 main attributes we strive for at Whitmore Watches.  Preparing for an interview or a meeting with the CEO of your company about a new promotion?   Taking a road trip with your family or friends to enjoy the fresh outdoor air? Maybe even putting the finishing touches on your wedding day and getting your vows ready?  Events like these, important and casual, are why we make timepieces without breaking the bank.  Our watches are a sure shot way to build your confidence to take on the day.  You should always be able to look and feel your best with designs that will last for years to come.  Each watch has a backstory you can relate to and appreciate. Those stories are based on amazing people who had a voice, worked hard and made a difference. We design and manufacture our watches right here in the USA.

 

Be sure to follow us on Facebook, Instagram and at WhitmoreWatches.com

story:
Bamboo clothing reinvented. 
We are Nooboo. We started our adventure while exploring opportunities for high quality bamboo clothing vs regular cotton. 

We established partnerships with producers of the highest quality bamboo fiber who are also focusing on a environmental friendly production process.

Our products are designed in Amsterdam, locally harvested near bamboo forests and assembled and produced in Portugal and Indonesia. Keeping quality as our highest goal, whilst keeping a close eye out for the environment and design, we managed to create a product that stands for more comfort, heat regulation, breathability and sustainability. 

We choose our suppliers carefully to make sure that the production process is in a closed loop and ethically sourced. Our suppliers are paid a life supporting salary and we focus on going green throughout the entire supply chain including packaging. 

Our sweaters, socks and boxer shorts are made from 100% organic bamboo fiber, making the products soft and durable. Our t-shirts and longsleeves are made from 60% organic bamboo fiber and 40% organic cotton. We’ve created the perfect balance between bamboo fiber and organic cotton, with as main goal to produce products with the qualities of bamboo and the firmness of cotton. With this combination we’ve managed to create products that are not only sustainable and good for the environment, but are also the perfect mix of fabric for soft yet strong products made to last.

Welcome to Nooboo!

 

Breathing and humidity regulating 
Our products do not wring the skin or have an uncomfortable fit, on the contrary they let the skin breathe freely. The products also absorb humidity better than cotton or other fabrics. This combination results in optimized comfort and durability! Whether you are wearing our products on a daily basis or breaking a sweat in the gym, you will be amazed with the comfort you’re experiencing. 

Antibacterial and odor resistant 
Bamboo is one of the plants that is naturally resistant to bacteria’s, making it easy to keep and environmentally friendly to grow. Derived from the plant, bamboo fiber is also naturally resistant to bacteria. As a result of this the fabric is no ground for bacteria to grow on and produce their side effects, such as a nasty smell. No, with bamboo products you will hand first experience an odor repellent fabric. 

Hypoallergenic and protective 
Bamboo is naturally hypoallergenic, which makes it perfect to wear for people with a sensitive skin or allergies. No more itching and scratching and no more rashes or red spots from wearing a piece of clothing. Next to that bamboo clothing actually protects your skin! It prevents 95% of harmful UV radiation to reach your skin, opposite to 75% prevention that cotton provides. This makes bamboo especially good to wear when you’re out in the sun a lot, or when the sun shines its brightest. 

Softness 
Mixing bamboo fiber and cotton can best be described as the difference between Kashmir to regular wool. It is one of the softest, yet sturdiest, fabrics known to man! 

Thermodynamic body regulation 
The structure of bamboo fiber is using the principle of thermodynamics, making it cool to wear in the summer and warm to wear in the winter. This makes the products perfect the wear for any type of weather and any type of activity, including athletic activities. You no longer need a winter and summer wardrobe with our products, they are wearable all year round!

 


100% biodegradable 
Opposed to synthetics with similar qualities of bamboo fiber, bamboo fiber is 100% biodegradable. 

Clean farming 
Bamboo is a plant that gets all its nutrients and energy from the soil. This means that no (artificial) fertilizers are needed for its optimal growth. 

Saves water 
Bamboo only needs sun and natural rainwater to grow. Irrigation is not needed, which makes bamboo one of the few fabrics that is self-supportive. Because of the sustainable nature of bamboo, you save 3500 liters of water per bamboo shirt! 3500 liters of water = 100 showers.

No pesticides 
Bamboo is naturally resistant against insects and fungus and can be grown without the use of pesticides. 

Quick grower 
Bamboo is the fastest growing plant on the planet and grows up to a meter per day. The production harvest of bamboo is 10 times larger than the production harvest of cotton, in the same amount of space. Bamboo stems are cut and harvested, allowing the plant to grow further without replanting. The roots of bamboo stems are holding firmly in the soil. This has a huge impact on soil stability and water drainage. 

Oxygen giver 
Bamboo forests produce 30% more oxygen and absorb more carbon dioxide than regular forests. This makes bamboo one of the best plants for the climate. 
 


 

 

Porto, Portugal.


 

 

It is all about change. Changing the fashion industry. Changing the way clothes are produced. Changing the way we feel, while wearing high quality clothes with an sustainable stamp. This is where YOU come in. NOOBOO is a young brand pushing the boundaries. Proving that bamboo is not boring, it is sexy! 

In order for us to succeed in introducing more sustainable products to you, we need enough pre-orders for us to reach the highest possible order quantity at our manufacturing partners in Portugal and Indonesia. We need to show the established fashion industry that today’s consumer votes for a more sustainable future. 

If you help us fund these batches and help us make a mark on the industry, you will be amongst the pioneers that made change possible. We depend on you, and we need you to help us to build a greener future!  

Unlimited cancellation. You are able to cancel your order at any point of time and get a full refund.

90 days size guarantee. If your size is wrong we send you a new shirt in the right size free of charge (we do not provide free return labels).

Easy and friendly priced shipping across the EU, US & Canada. We ship worldwide!
