story:
Reviews

Here's what others are saying about the Nu Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet...

Tom Davey: "...While the individual concepts in the NU are not themselves completely new, past attempts to unify them have been poorly executed and the majority of people still stuff a traditional wallet into their pocket or bag every day. That being said, the NU has been neatly designed and packs the right balance of features to perhaps make it the ‘little wallet that could’."  

Glen L - "...I'd like to sing the praises of the Nu Lifestyle Card Holder. I've had the pleasure of using one for quite some time. After the convenience of the Card holder I could never go back to a normal wallet. It addressed all the things I didn't like about the usual bulging untidy wallets, and with the added protection against credit card skimming it's ideal for everyday use and protection of your cards. I've always especially liked the fact that you can fit a few folded notes inside too! The complete solution."

Suzanne G - "...Can't say enough good things about this 'wallet'. I have the prototype versions and use them everyday... Colour coded for categories. Getting them for my kids, friends and branding them for my business as part of our promotional loyalty program."

Vicki S "...I love the fact that my credit card is safe, I use my RFID blocking card holder all the time. I find it especially good when I go out with a small handbag. I put my driver’s licence, credit card and some cash in it and it doesn’t take up so much room. I also have one I use for my business cards, which looks elegant and gets commented on often. They make a great corporate gift."

Teena M "...Actually I have had great use out of mine.....used it overseas on my last trip!!! Love the new colour range!!! Great Xmas presents!!!

Kate M "...Loving my Nu Lifestyle wallet/cardholder! It gives credit card security and is the perfect size. Check it out - a great present for friends who have everything!"

About

The NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet is about having something simple, suited for this new fast paced world. The NU helps you bring only the essentials with you, and stops you from hoarding the rest. Live a light, simple and uncluttered life!

Sometimes you want to leave your wallet or purse at home and just bring a few cards with you. For example, the beach, a music event, coffee, all those times you want to feel light and not weighed down.   

 

 

 

Thumb-slide detail for easy access of cards

Design

We believe in the elegance of simplicity, so we invested our time and money in getting this design just right. After hundreds of prototypes we have done just that.  The elegant design and subtle curve, contours the body and is designed to go unnoticed when carried. Overwhelming feedback from User Trials of prototypes, indicate that the NULifestyle Card Holder /Wallet is sensual to hold and eliminates bulk in your essential everyday life. 

Designed with a thumb slide feature that lets you easily slide out what you need, it's about being minimal. The NU also comes in pop colours with a  matching Lanyard so it can mix and match and add color to your life. It also comes in classic and timeless black and white. 

CAD & Prototypes

We have spent countless hours refining our designs and built hundreds of prototypes to engineer a curved shape that is molded into a solid one-piece design made from tough engineering grade polymers. 

 

 Very early concept sketches of the NU curved Card Holder/Wallet

3D CAD screen shot 

Some early developmental prototypes used for functional testing

The result is an elegantly constructed, quality product that will feel great in your hand and last. 

Specifications

 

 

NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallets are thin enough to hold just what you need, a few cards and some notes.

 

THE NU PRODUCT RANGE

We recognise that people’s needs and requirements are different, so we’ve developed a range of NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallets to suit everyone.

NU Uno

 

The NU Uno Card Holder/Wallet is a solid one-piece construction manufactured in the highest quality, tough engineering grade polymers with pad printed branding.

 

Choose a colour to suit your style

Unlike other card holders that are usually made from an upper and lower moulding that are welded together, our NU Uno Card Holder/Wallets are made in one piece so they are much stronger with no seams to split and crack. It sounds simple and obvious, but it’s actually quite difficult to do and more expensive to make than a two-piece moulded product. As a result NU Uno Card Holder/Wallets are durable and robust and worth the extra effort and expense.

NU Chroma

 

The NU Chroma Card Holder, like the Uno, is a solid one piece construction manufactured in highest quality, tough engineering grade polymers with pad printed branding and also comes with a hand-polished chrome trim moulding for an added touch of elegance. 

Chroma adds a touch of chrome for more formal occasions

Worried about RFID Skimming?

We have just the answer for you with our NU Persona model.

NU Persona 

 

The NU Persona RFID Blocking Card Holder/Wallet is our premium product. Careful attention to detail in the 3D CAD phase has ensured that NU Persona retains the same elegant simplicity of our NU Uno & Chroma models in a sophisticated RFID Blockingmetal construction. 

Each NU Persona is CNC machined from a solid billet of aerospace grade aluminium. It is then hand polished, glass bead blasted and then anodized  to provide an enduring luxurious finish.

Early concept sketches of the Persona model

Exploded 3D CAD views of the Persona model

Persona prototypes - CNC machined, the same process as production. Prototypes were used to test and refine RFID Blocking effectiveness

Housing your cards in a metallic Card Holder/Wallet effectively forms a Faraday Cage around them and protects them from being unlawfully skimmed. NU Persona is sophisticated, sensual to touch and elegantly simple to use while also providing the ultimate RFID Blocking protection to shield your Smart Cards from being skimmed.   It is available in a glass bead blasted natural or black anodized finish with laser engraved branding and trimmed with precision moulded bright chrome edge trim.

 

RFID Blocking Persona - security against RFID skimming in a sleek, elegant and sophisticated package.

Backer Perks

We have a great range of Backer Perks that allow you to select the NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet that is just right for you at great Indiegogo backer prices. Choose from our Uno, Chroma or premium RFID Blocking Persona models.

 

Sustainability

Our range of NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallets are durable, manufactured from premium polymers and aircraft grade aluminium which can be recycled at their end of life.

Help Us Achieve Our Goal

We love designing our own cool products that we believe you will enjoy and embrace.  Indiegogo is a great way for you to validate these product ideas and be a part of the development process. 

We have trusted manufacturers already in place in Shenzhen China that we have been working with for more than ten years. They have worked with us throughout the development and prototyping phases and are now waiting to go into full-scale production, but we need to get enough orders to meet their minimum order requirements and pay for tooling. 

If you like our NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet range, please back us so we can get these great products into your hands sooner rather than in another few years time as we can afford it.  Even if you can’t back our project personally, you can still help by spreading the word to your friends, family and social network.  Sharing this project with friends and family takes only a second, and it would mean the world to us. 

 

PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO MANUALLY ADD THE SHIPPING COST TO YOUR TOTAL WHEN CHECKING OUT!

 

Where will my money go?

Product design and development is an expensive and time consuming process. Here are some areas where the Kickstarter funding will be spent. 

• Tooling and Jigs. We need to commission and pay for tooling and jigs for each of our NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet models. 

• Minimum Order Quantities. Manufacturers require minimum quantities that must be paid for before they run the products. 

Production Timeline

We have all of our China manufacturing partners lined up. This means that once we receive the funds we are able to right away begin producing the tooling and production jigs for our NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet range.  Tooling and debugging will take approximately 6 weeks and production and despatch a further 6 weeks.  We therefore expect to start shipping towards late October 2013. We want to start simplifying your life by getting our NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallets in your pockets as soon as possible and we will make every effort to do so!

Follow Us

If you like our products, follow us on;

Website I  Facebook  I  Twitter  I  YouTube  I Vimeo 

Thank you!

Kevin Whitley + KWA Design Team.

Special Thanks To

  • Woody Meyer
  • Gianfranco Lassandro
  • Tee Smith
  • Will Godfrey
  • Anna Constantine
 
 

Risks & Challenges

We are a bunch of experienced industrial designers/problem solvers that have been developing products for more than three decades. Our ethos is all about critical attention to detail, so we enjoyed spending time testing and prototyping our NU Card Holder/Wallets to make sure that all the issues and little details are resolved prior to going into production. This project has been more than three years in the making and we have lifecycle tested hundreds of prototypes in order to make sure that they can withstand the rigours of daily use. We now have the products finely tuned and ready for production.

We also have long term relationships (more than 10 years) with vendor partners in Shenzhen China so when we say we can deliver this product on time and to the very high standards we set and you expect, you can back us with confidence.

We also believe in being transparent and open with our supporters, so, in the unlikely event there is a little hiccup, then we have the experience and know-how to resolve it and keep everyone updated and informed.
story_txt:
Reviews
Here's what others are saying about the Nu Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet...
Tom Davey: "...While the individual concepts in the NU are not themselves completely new, past attempts to unify them have been poorly executed and the majority of people still stuff a traditional wallet into their pocket or bag every day. That being said, the NU has been neatly designed and packs the right balance of features to perhaps make it the ‘little wallet that could’."  
Glen L - "...I'd like to sing the praises of the Nu Lifestyle Card Holder. I've had the pleasure of using one for quite some time. After the convenience of the Card holder I could never go back to a normal wallet. It addressed all the things I didn't like about the usual bulging untidy wallets, and with the added protection against credit card skimming it's ideal for everyday use and protection of your cards. I've always especially liked the fact that you can fit a few folded notes inside too! The complete solution."
Suzanne G - "...Can't say enough good things about this 'wallet'. I have the prototype versions and use them everyday... Colour coded for categories. Getting them for my kids, friends and branding them for my business as part of our promotional loyalty program."
Vicki S "...I love the fact that my credit card is safe, I use my RFID blocking card holder all the time. I find it especially good when I go out with a small handbag. I put my driver’s licence, credit card and some cash in it and it doesn’t take up so much room. I also have one I use for my business cards, which looks elegant and gets commented on often. They make a great corporate gift."
Teena M "...Actually I have had great use out of mine.....used it overseas on my last trip!!! Love the new colour range!!! Great Xmas presents!!!
Kate M "...Loving my Nu Lifestyle wallet/cardholder! It gives credit card security and is the perfect size. Check it out - a great present for friends who have everything!"
About
The NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet is about having something simple, suited for this new fast paced world. The NU helps you bring only the essentials with you, and stops you from hoarding the rest. Live a light, simple and uncluttered life!
Sometimes you want to leave your wallet or purse at home and just bring a few cards with you. For example, the beach, a music event, coffee, all those times you want to feel light and not weighed down.   

 

 


 

Thumb-slide detail for easy access of cards
Design
We believe in the elegance of simplicity, so we invested our time and money in getting this design just right. After hundreds of prototypes we have done just that.  The elegant design and subtle curve, contours the body and is designed to go unnoticed when carried. Overwhelming feedback from User Trials of prototypes, indicate that the NULifestyle Card Holder /Wallet is sensual to hold and eliminates bulk in your essential everyday life. 

Designed with a thumb slide feature that lets you easily slide out what you need, it's about being minimal. The NU also comes in pop colours with a  matching Lanyard so it can mix and match and add color to your life. It also comes in classic and timeless black and white. 

CAD & Prototypes
We have spent countless hours refining our designs and built hundreds of prototypes to engineer a curved shape that is molded into a solid one-piece design made from tough engineering grade polymers. 
 
 Very early concept sketches of the NU curved Card Holder/Wallet

3D CAD screen shot 

Some early developmental prototypes used for functional testing
The result is an elegantly constructed, quality product that will feel great in your hand and last. 
Specifications
 

 
NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallets are thin enough to hold just what you need, a few cards and some notes.
 
THE NU PRODUCT RANGE
We recognise that people’s needs and requirements are different, so we’ve developed a range of NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallets to suit everyone.

NU Uno


 

The NU Uno Card Holder/Wallet is a solid one-piece construction manufactured in the highest quality, tough engineering grade polymers with pad printed branding.
 
Choose a colour to suit your style
Unlike other card holders that are usually made from an upper and lower moulding that are welded together, our NU Uno Card Holder/Wallets are made in one piece so they are much stronger with no seams to split and crack. It sounds simple and obvious, but it’s actually quite difficult to do and more expensive to make than a two-piece moulded product. As a result NU Uno Card Holder/Wallets are durable and robust and worth the extra effort and expense.
NU Chroma


 
The NU Chroma Card Holder, like the Uno, is a solid one piece construction manufactured in highest quality, tough engineering grade polymers with pad printed branding and also comes with a hand-polished chrome trim moulding for an added touch of elegance. 

Chroma adds a touch of chrome for more formal occasions
Worried about RFID Skimming?
We have just the answer for you with our NU Persona model.
NU Persona 

 
The NU Persona RFID Blocking Card Holder/Wallet is our premium product. Careful attention to detail in the 3D CAD phase has ensured that NU Persona retains the same elegant simplicity of our NU Uno & Chroma models in a sophisticated RFID Blockingmetal construction. 
Each NU Persona is CNC machined from a solid billet of aerospace grade aluminium. It is then hand polished, glass bead blasted and then anodized  to provide an enduring luxurious finish.


Early concept sketches of the Persona model

Exploded 3D CAD views of the Persona model

Persona prototypes - CNC machined, the same process as production. Prototypes were used to test and refine RFID Blocking effectiveness
Housing your cards in a metallic Card Holder/Wallet effectively forms a Faraday Cage around them and protects them from being unlawfully skimmed. NU Persona is sophisticated, sensual to touch and elegantly simple to use while also providing the ultimate RFID Blocking protection to shield your Smart Cards from being skimmed.   It is available in a glass bead blasted natural or black anodized finish with laser engraved branding and trimmed with precision moulded bright chrome edge trim.
 

RFID Blocking Persona - security against RFID skimming in a sleek, elegant and sophisticated package.
Backer Perks
We have a great range of Backer Perks that allow you to select the NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet that is just right for you at great Indiegogo backer prices. Choose from our Uno, Chroma or premium RFID Blocking Persona models.





 

Sustainability
Our range of NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallets are durable, manufactured from premium polymers and aircraft grade aluminium which can be recycled at their end of life.
Help Us Achieve Our Goal
We love designing our own cool products that we believe you will enjoy and embrace.  Indiegogo is a great way for you to validate these product ideas and be a part of the development process. 
We have trusted manufacturers already in place in Shenzhen China that we have been working with for more than ten years. They have worked with us throughout the development and prototyping phases and are now waiting to go into full-scale production, but we need to get enough orders to meet their minimum order requirements and pay for tooling. 
If you like our NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet range, please back us so we can get these great products into your hands sooner rather than in another few years time as we can afford it.  Even if you can’t back our project personally, you can still help by spreading the word to your friends, family and social network.  Sharing this project with friends and family takes only a second, and it would mean the world to us. 

 
PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO MANUALLY ADD THE SHIPPING COST TO YOUR TOTAL WHEN CHECKING OUT!
 

Where will my money go?
Product design and development is an expensive and time consuming process. Here are some areas where the Kickstarter funding will be spent. 
• Tooling and Jigs. We need to commission and pay for tooling and jigs for each of our NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet models. 
• Minimum Order Quantities. Manufacturers require minimum quantities that must be paid for before they run the products. 
Production Timeline
We have all of our China manufacturing partners lined up. This means that once we receive the funds we are able to right away begin producing the tooling and production jigs for our NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallet range.  Tooling and debugging will take approximately 6 weeks and production and despatch a further 6 weeks.  We therefore expect to start shipping towards late October 2013. We want to start simplifying your life by getting our NU Lifestyle Card Holder/Wallets in your pockets as soon as possible and we will make every effort to do so!





Follow Us
If you like our products, follow us on;
Website I  Facebook  I  Twitter  I  YouTube  I Vimeo 
Thank you!
Kevin Whitley + KWA Design Team.

Woody Meyer
Gianfranco Lassandro
Tee Smith

Anna Constantine

story:
Visually Learn From Or Compete With Top Stock Traders Who Verify 100% Of Their Trades With Reputable Online Stock Brokers


TradersRater.com is a no tricks, no scams, straight up competition on the field of the market free website for all stock traders. Picture the Superbowl for stock traders in a no holds barred public competition for all level of stock traders.

To win this competition, the champion is going to have to have a playbook full of offensive plays to react to all the real life ever changing market conditions, margin calls, MACD signals, RSI values, stop setting and news events. Sites that only track recommendations or virtual money don't have to worry about capital or loses.

Tired of all the noise and empty promises of these trading platforms promising big profits IF you sign up and pay them a fee?

  1. Gambling addicts and swindlers rely on only showing winning profits to give the false appearance of making big money. How do we know who is lying and who is honest?
  2. Why do they need to take your money to support themselves if they are making so much money trading stocks??
  3. Why are there a million websites promising big returns with "their system" to choose from with no universal ratings between them??
  4. How good is the person I am trusting for advise with my hard earned money?? How do I look up how good they are compared to everyone else in the same industry and have complete confidence it was accurate??
  5. Would hedge fund firm pros win the yearly competition every year??
  6. How does a person know who to follow to learn trading skills if anyone can claim big profits??
  7. If a yearly winner repeated his performance and out performed hedge and mutal funds would those funds get an advantage by hiring them away from competition for better return for their clients??

All of these questions are game changing questions in the financial industry. Imagine if you could actually TRUST and LEARN from what a seasoned experienced trader was saying by looking at their track record and rate of return that was 100% verified by their stock broker?

This website will be a free place for everyone, including your average mom and pop day traders to top financial analysts taking home millions of dollars, to help determine who can really walk the walk and who is all talk. This will allow investors to talk with top rated users real time and learn by watching their moves instead of paying any average Joe who claims "big profits" and fees for their "system".

The difference between this site and all others is this site is a gold standard and GUARENTEED accurate. For every trade, percentage of portfolio, price entry and price sold are pushed from the broker automatically. NO, I repeat NO private data, dollar amounts or account details are pushed out from the broker. All data is pushed securely directly to the website. No flipping to another site and trying to scramble to enter your same trade as the stock moves to different price points. These are time wasters. Just sign up and we take care of the rest. All with 100% verification by reputable online stock brokers. Update: We are looking for a quote for Wiknvest.com to handle this securely and accuratly.

A firm like Google ads or Appnexus will handle all ad placement for revenue as high volume of users creates traffic. 

Websites that already use broker verification technology include:
Profit.ly - Pay site that lets users pick which trades to post
Wikinvest - Great one stop site for news and investment terminology lookup

Wrote Wikinvest.com to get a quote to start pushing my account's 100% verified percentages of gain vs markets graph to TradersRater.com live. They already have 50 some brokers linked to their bank level verification system. We are pursuing this avenue instead of trying to approach each major online stock broker. Our next hurdle is getting quotes from all major online stock brokers.

Graph from Wikinvest.com


Budget needs:

  • Immediate need for Facebook promoting for wwww.Facebook.com/TradersRater page
  • Upgrade to next level of website at GoDaddy.com 
  • Android mobile app development ($Looking for quotes)
  • Apple mobile app development ($Looking for quotes)
  • Next level of website development. ($Looking for quotes)
  • Customer service personnel for first year
  • Advertising blitz with popular stock mentor endorsement ($200,000)
  • Online broker contract agreement fees for all major online stock brokers ($Vendor Proposition submitted 10-22-14 to Scottrade). Update:  Now going to Wikinvest.com

Costs:

  • $20.14 - GoDaddy domain registration and services for www.TradersRater.com

Needs:

  • Insight from revenue projections vs user traffic from Google or Appnexus
  • Pitch Fuse on Twitter has identified a video as priority. Tweeting and posting out through social media for ideas
  • First major online brokers on board
    http://www.scottradepartners.com/marketing/proposal.asp 

Additional Website Features:

  • Ability to auto share results to Twitter, Facebook, Stocktwits, etc
  • Magnification multiplier to be able to lay small percentage moving markets to VIX level of percentage swings on the same graph for visual comparison
  • Since secure data is pushed from reputable brokerage firms, all rules of the SEC will be followed

story:
I’m Tony Klonowski with TDK Guitars.  I am a luthier (guitar maker) that has currently taken my business from a small basement operation to a full woodworking shop in Chicago, IL.  I began making custom guitars in 2008 and have slowly turned my passion into a business.  The demand for my guitars has recently grown, and the only way I will be able to fullfill my pending orders is to ask you for help.

I am taking my business to a higher level of production to build inventory, and to optimize my processes.  It is important to me because I love music, I love guitars, and I love having my own company.  I want this company to grow to what I dream it to be.

Contributors will allow me to make more efficient processes to take on more than one guitar at a time, and also allow me to get materials in larger quantities.  This ultimately would lower the materials cost by drastic amounts.  Materials are expensive, and that is why it is difficult for me to get upfront capital myself to purchase large quantities.

I would need $40,000 to take on my campaign.  This is a great start to taking the first step in the mass production stage.  The funding would go towards machines/tools to optimize my processes, and make my processes capable of handling more than 1 guitar at a time.  Another huge part of the funding would go towards materials to buy in bulk, and save money on materials.  This will help me to get guitars in the hands of guitarists all over the world.  If the entire goal isn’t met, funding could still be used similarly, but in a smaller amount.

Start up capital is the one thing that is holding my business back from getting to the next level.  There are people who want guitars, and I simply can’t afford to make them.  Funding is the single most important necessity that my business needs right now.  It would allow the business to thrive. 

 

I would greatly appreciate any amount of money you are able to contribute, however, if you can't afford to help financially, that's okay - all forms of support are appreciated! Please tweet, post, like, blog, pin and help spread the cause via social media in efforts that we meet our goal and raise the funding needed to make the dream of TDK Guitars a reality. All the best!

 

Tony & Team TDK

story:
Bref résumé

french designer the last 10 years in interior architecture, and diploma in international trade also. Actually I have the oppotunnity to create and to develop a new french garment brand. One of my collaborator have 20 years     fashion experiment.We have office contact in India for all silk furnitures,and leather.

 

You can discover my associates on the web site : www.apariska.com

I am so exciting with my collaborators to promote this label with a french touch because the design, the creativity is a good trip for me and the " parisian chic" is known to all .

We wanted, also to value women.  the feminine beauty and value of women in our society. away from the cliches of fashion where we discover the anorexic woman or female object. We made US size from 6 to 16 and we have the change to create and to have the experiment to control all the production process.

I serve the beauty  and the best and I wish to share my vision.

We have already made our first collection for the next winter 2013, our agen, the factoriest have made some mistakes , we have losed time but we are proud to show it on your web site, now. If you are a fashion professionnal, work with us, if you are a very good commercial , work with us, if you have shops, work with us !

The beginning is always difficult,  fashion is a very competitive environment . But it is a great adventure, we need to finance the next collection, the photo shooting, the designer office, the factories, the showrooms, differents exibitions and expositions etc ...in USA in first and in Asia after.More you make exibition more people know you, and we must not  miss this RDV . In March , we will have a meeting with the bigger spanish fashion distributor... 

We are a french label with international ambitions. We create , we make and we propose our collection to fashion agents or finals clients , shop where you can find your next christmas dress ...

We have intention to develop our brand with man departement, jewerely and accessories very soon ( depends on your help ). but our goal with your help is to finance the next collection , the marketing and differents exibitions, salons, fairs etc...so it is vital for us. 

generally, a exibition, participation salon cost $ 6000, more fees organisation and of movement. If we want make a very good beginner with a maximimum of chance  , ... LA, New York, Paris, Milan...So you understand that we need.  you can do the accounts. we need to have $ 60 000 rather than 40 comfortably getting started, make contacts and start up new customers. let you see. Thank to you for all , but your money is not lost.

  Your participation will be completely transformed into value. You take no risk. this is a win-win cooperation in mutual trust.

But more you participate, more we will able to develop this brand that wants to ennoble woman with our philosophy.

Our goal is to fund enough this next collection for growing well. if we do not reach our goal, we cannot to finance the design team etc...certainly need more time to promote AParis Ka .

 

 I am a man good and righteous. married and father of a family. I know the life and value of things. I will convene a meeting with all those who have had the audacity to participate in this essord. where, when, how, it is difficult to say at this instant, but I know that without the others, it does nothing .. or so little ...

If your profession or position may allow us to develop, do not hesitate, contact us

If you are multibrand store, commercial, distributor etc...

 

Warms regards 

Rank

Head Manager

But it is a great adventure, we need to finance the next collection, the photo shooting, the designer office, the factories, the showrooms, differents exibitions and expositions etc ...in USA in first and in Asia after.More you make exibition more people know you, and we must not  miss this RDV . In March , we will have a meeting with the bigger spanish fashion distributor... 
We are a french label with international ambitions. We create , we make and we propose our collection to fashion agents or finals clients , shop where you can find your next christmas dress ...
We have intention to develop our brand with man departement, jewerely and accessories very soon ( depends on your help ). but our goal with your help is to finance the next collection , the marketing and differents exibitions, salons, fairs etc...so it is vital for us. 
generally, a exibition, participation salon cost $ 6000, more fees organisation and of movement. If we want make a very good beginner with a maximimum of chance  , ... LA, New York, Paris, Milan...So you understand that we need.  you can do the accounts. we need to have $ 60 000 rather than 40 comfortably getting started, make contacts and start up new customers. let you see. Thank to you for all , but your money is not lost.
  Your participation will be completely transformed into value. You take no risk. this is a win-win cooperation in mutual trust.
But more you participate, more we will able to develop this brand that wants to ennoble woman with our philosophy.
Our goal is to fund enough this next collection for growing well. if we do not reach our goal, we cannot to finance the design team etc...certainly need more time to promote AParis Ka .
 
 I am a man good and righteous. married and father of a family. I know the life and value of things. I will convene a meeting with all those who have had the audacity to participate in this essord. where, when, how, it is difficult to say at this instant, but I know that without the others, it does nothing .. or so little ...


If your profession or position may allow us to develop, do not hesitate, contact us
If you are multibrand store, commercial, distributor etc...
 
Warms regards 
Rank
Head Manager

story:
Visit Us @ Our Store: www.LLANA.com

 

We came together to help revive the declining New Zealand Wool Industry. Our goal is to change the perception of wool and show how useful and contemporary it can be. During our process, we developed a new technology. It’s called Wool Fresh - a natural, breathable, self-cleaning fabric. We’re bringing this innovative new technology to you by placing it inside a beautifully design bag called LLANA.  

 

 

 

 

Introducing LLANA

LLANA is a collaborative effort of thoughtful design, artisan craftsmanship, and textile innovation. LLANA is a high end label that celebrates the active lifestyle. Our Bag is for the active woman on the go. 

 

LLANA  |  Everything But Basic

We designed LLANA around the NYC woman. With your busy schedule, we understand that sometimes you need to carry your life with you. Here’s how LLANA can help.  

 

LLANA  |  Features

 

 

 

Practical for the Gym. 
Professional for the Workplace. 
Fashionable for the Winebar.

 

 

 

Fast Pockets

Quick access to your phone and wallet while your while moving through the subway or getting a coffee.

 

 

Separate Storage Compartment

Keep your shoes, jacket or other items separate until you need them.

 

 

 

 

Wide Opening

 

Access your 15'' laptop, work documents and other daily essentials.

 

 

 

2 Types of Leather

 

Soft leather up top creates our iconic shape that stands out amongst the crowd.   A thicker, pebbled leather on the base gives added durability so you can place the bag on any surface.  When combined, this creates a subtle, sophisticated detail.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our Process

 

 

Designed with Passion

We have a new and exclusive design that turns an oversized bag into a sleek and   classy tote, without the bulk. We release a limited number of bags each year.

Craftsmanship

We pay more to work with the best artisan leather workers in New Zealand. Each bag has a unique story. Each bag is handcrafted in New Zealand.

Textile Innovation

We developed Wool Fresh, a new technology that works with (not against) nature. 

 

 

 

 

 

The Team

We have brought people and companies from around New Zealand together to focus on creating LLANA and Wool Fresh for the active lifestyle.
 

 

What people are saying about LLANA

 

 

 

LLANA Ships Directly to you

 

 

Timeline

 

 

 

 

Shipping  and Taxes

We ship to the US and NZ. New York State customers: please add 8.875% to your pledge to account for NY state sales taxes.

story:
Short Summary

We're funding Thomas' dream and we need your help.

The Impact

How can we refuse this generous example of artistic expression?
If we can come up with the funds for royalties, artistic consultation, and artistic time and materials, Thomas will live his dream!

story:
I’m Sarah, the founder of Bloom Edition. I started this project because   I’ve always had trouble finding clothing that matches what I want to   say to the world. Growing up without options that reflected my     personal taste and internalizing stigma about my body has taken a toll on my confidence that I work everyday to overcome.

 I remember the first time that I found a plus-size fashion blogger. It   completely opened my mind and helped me realize that fashion could  be for me. I want to create that experience for other women.

I believe that the fashion industry has the potential to empower women of all sizes to love themselves more, but as it stands right now, it’s doing quite the opposite for many women. Bloom Edition is here to change that.

Access to stylish clothing is unequally distributed across different sizes.

The average U.S. woman is a size 16 or 18, but most brands stop at a 14 or 16.

Women above a size 12 are rarely, if at all, able to find clothes they love in major retailers. When there are options, there typically aren't very many and they are priced at a premium.

What message does this send to plus-size women? It says: this isn’t for you. You don’t get to wear this and you don’t get to feel good about how you look.

It's not just about clothes. This way of thinking perpetuates the bias that overweight people already face from all angles.

Did you know that being overweight is correlated with lower earning potential? A 2011 study revealed that overweight women earned up to $9,000 a year less than their average weight counterparts.

That's why we need inclusive fashion. 

Bloom Edition is creating a space where bodies that are traditionally  underrepresented are celebrated in style.

And with the lack of  representation for different body types we see in mainstream media,  we believe an inclusive digital magazine is a perfect way to do that.

 

 

To get Bloom Edition off the ground, we have quite a bit of work to do.

The funding we raise from this campaign will be put towards launching our website and first issue. We will be investing in designing a beautiful website, paying content creators, content development and promotion for our site.

Website design and development. We’ll first need funds to create a sleek website. A large portion of the funds will go to paying design and development fees.

Content development. We believe in paying content creators for their time and expertise, and will use the funds to compensate any partners.

Promotion. Thus far, we’ve relied on word of mouth and organic buzz to build our initial audience and attract people to the campaign.

If we don’t reach the entire goal, we’ll focus the funds we do receive on building a great site and first edition. If we exceed our goal, we'll focus our funds on bringing you the best content we can and begin plans for a second issue.

The perks we’re offering range from small thank you's to getting to be permanently featured in our first issue. No contribution is too small, so if you believe in what we’re doing but can’t contribute financially, please help us spread the word. 

 

All of our higher value perks give you a chance to join our street team! Whether you want to sport our official campaign tee or rock our tote (or both!), being a part of our team is the gift that keeps on giving. 

We know that the work we're doing has the potential to change the course of the fashion industry and, more importantly, inspire women around the world to love their bodies no matter what. But we need your help.

Thanks for your time.

Follow us on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook or sign up for our email list to stay in touch with us as we make it through the campaign!

story:
Go to NuudiiSystem.com to get your Nuudii !

 

 

Give your breasts some love! 

Patent Approved

Nuudii’s unique featherlight technology hugs your natural shape with supreme comfort, while offering maximum versatility for your lifestyle and more than 12 ways to wear! 

Created by women - Made by women - For women - Made in the USA 

This movement was inspired by listening to the voices of women and tested with over 500+ women ages 16-94 eager for something new. With Nuudii they found, confidence, freedom and a smile.

We get it and we are passionate to make living with boobs or whatever you call them, so much easier. With Nuudii your boobs aren’t confined, they are cradled. Your natural shape is embraced and our super lightweight technology is so comfortable, you can wear Nuudii to bed. Did we mention no hardware? Yup, zero, nada, zilch.

Just to be clear, this product is not a bra. It is an innovation and truly, dare we say it, a straight up revolution for your breasts. 

 

Nuudii’s flexible straps adapt to clothing styles, the options are endless and so easy! 

Yep! A totally new experience for your boobs. Weighs 1½ oz, fine, yet durable, hugs your unique shape with 360° stretch for supreme comfort and hardware free (pain-free!).

Fabric Contents - Nylon / Spandex 

The only bra alternative isn’t only comforting, it has the flexibility to hold you through all your monthly phases (yup those hormones!).

Nuudii covers a multitude of sizes and boob shapes, however we realize that this technology doesn’t expand to all our fabulous sizes...yet. Nuudii allows a very flexible fit. Take a look at the size chart and reach out to us with any questions. 

We strongly believe that women of all sizes should have access to our products. We aim to be fully inclusive by expanding our size offerings, and with your help we will be able to fund this must-be-done development.  

So Nuudii is not a bra, it's an experience. Look braless with a gentle lift and if you’re lucky, a little side boob. It asks you to love your boobs as they are. Nuudii allows your girls to be themselves. 

Any Questions?

Contact us via email info@nuudiisystem.com



 

Our sheer, light-weight fabric Nuu Light, Nuu Brownz, Nuu Black lets you celebrate the skin you’re in, each color works beautifully with all skin tones. 

 

 

 

Nuudii lets life flow, from one activity to another. This one product takes you from sleep to dressing up and everything in between. 

 

Nuudii’s flex straps, paired with our accessory clip transforms your look to prop up the girls a little more (if that’s what you desire), create a racerback, or a halter look in the front

 

(1) Select the available Perk you would like to pledge at the top right side of the page  Note, you may only make one pledge. You may increase $ amount within the Perk, to increase your amount of Nuudiis

(2) Choose your Size & Color choices - use our Size chart to help you choose your Nuudii System. Majority of women do not know their true size. Size up if you question which size Nuudii System to choose.

(3) Payment - Enter your payment details and shipping information.

(4) International Backers - We are giving great rates for Shipping Internationally. Note -Some backers may have to pay local customs, import duties and taxes - We are not responsible for duties customs or taxes applicable in your country,  so please consider the possible charges before making a pledge.  Backers are responsible for covering all of their local customs duties  and taxes. Any abandoned or returned packages can not be refunded.

(5) We accept a 1 X Exchange for Size or Color - Every woman is different in Fit and Comfort,  Nuudii is not a bra and you are backing a Crowd Funding campaign - so please note that if the product does not work for you once you receive your Nuudi,  you may make an exchange only  within 10 days of your receiving your perk.There are absolutely No Refunds

(6) Addresses - we will notify you,  by Indiegogo campaign post , when addresses need to be locked. Any changes following this action, we will not be able to change shipping address and you will need need to find a way to have your package forwarded to new address.

Our highly complex Patent Approved technology took us 3 years to develop through our dedicated and experienced team of three, along with our amazing manufacturer partner here in the US. Together we are committed to re-establishing this dying industry and creating jobs for other women. Did we mention that? Yes, women make our products. 

Our goal is to bring the Nuudii experience to women everywhere. Through this campaign our goal is to raise capital to add more sizes, build production and design more products that bring boob freedom. Our vision is to expand Nuudii Systems profile to include more women. It’s a win win for all.  Join us and be a part of expanding Nuudii with your pledge of support. 

Contact us via email info@nuudiisystem.com

                                                                

Fairy Boob Mother video was created by LA based Culprit Creative. For inquiries go to CulpritCreative.com 

Photography by Tanya Malott. For inquiries go to www.tanyamalott.com

Versatility video by Diana Berdi. For inquiries go to www.berdifilms.com 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Nuudii System has been over 3 years in development and was created by 3 women from the fashion Industry who have been listening to the needs, challenges and experiences of women and their boobs! 

We have developed and Patent Approved Nuudii, and with a Design Patent pending. 

We found that by truly listening and involving women in the development process, we were able to engineer and design the best product. We aim to constantly evolve and expand our technology to include additional sizes so more women can have the Nuudii Experience. We are honored and excited to be here on Kickstarter, where we can connect directly with you (and your boobs! )

Boobs are wonderful , and complicated - just think about all sizes and shapes - and Bra Production is a highly complex industry - However, we created a 'never been done before' manufacturing process. We found an extraordinary partner in the US , that by working with Nuudii, is reviving a dying industry. This campaign will provide the much needed capital to fund the build out of our production lines, re-establish an industry and enable us to share Nuudii with women of throughout the world. 

We created a duplicate factory line in our Design studio in Brooklyn, to ensure that our designer could develop Nuudii right alongside our wear testers and ensure that Nuudii could be easily recreated in a factory environment, (always a huge challenge for any industry is moving a prototype to a proper production environment ). 

We have now successfully tested a production run in the factory. We have built the supply chain of our Eco Friendly packaging and set up fulfillment for seamless deliveries. We have planned with all of our partners to allot time for production to fulfill and deliver rewards. 

RISKS 

1. We want to make sure our customer expects a completely new experience. 

Nuudii does not feel or perform like you are wearing a bra - It is important to understand that this is different, it is not a bra and not the same experience as a bra. 

Nuudii has no hardware, fits different, with the feel and look of being braless.  

There is no constriction, it allows your real shape to remain, while it gently lifts and allows your boobs to move within Nuudii. Nuudii System does not mold your boobs and allows them be themselves. Wearing Nuudii may show side boob and some sheerness. 

2) Sizing and how to guide our customers to order the right size. 

Nuudii is a very flexible fit because of the stretch. We currently offer sizes Small, Medium and Large, which covers sizes 32B - 38DD. And Nuudii actually gets better with wear. We will expand sizes in the future when, with your help, we are able to fund this highly technical development process. 

For sizing and fit questions we have specialists on our team to connect with, as well as offering Free shipping with in the USA. Contact info@nuudiisystem.com

3) Exchanges / Refunds

Please consider these details before you pledge.

There are no refunds. We will make a 1 X time exchange for a different size. Free Shipping within the USA. This needs to be within 10 days of receiving your Nuudii - contact info@nuudiisystem if you need a different size. (Note - shipping charges both ways apply for International orders exchanges).

Important for International Backers Local Duties, Taxes, and Fees: Some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes.

story:
Logo Mondo is a company that started in March 2016. The meaning of  “Mondo” in Logo Mondo is a ‘perfection’. Insight into its perfection starts with a creative network of Logo Mondo that connects together the market (Consumer), Designers and jewelry Master Artisans.

We are a company that offers original jewelry made by Masters with unmatchable and unique skills.Thus we associate tradition and modernity, know-how and originality.The goal of our project is to create opportunities where you can fully demonstrate your capacity.

Want to give a present to your loved ones? Include your own message right inside the jewelry!

How ?  Steps are even surprisingly easier, check out the video below:

First, send us a picture and a video clip you want. We will register both in our system. Done, let your smartphone the picture and the video you send us will come out in AR View.

If you want to enjoy our exclusive "AR technology" in beautiful master-crafted jewelry,

JUST ORDER the Designed Jewelry below, they include all these fancy techs! Don't forget to send the picture and video you want to register! mondo@logomondo.co.kr  

Buy Designed Jewelry of our Masters and Specialized Designers - Indiegogo Special Price Designed by CHOI, Gye Youn

 

If you are not interested right now in the AR video you can still support us buying these products:

I. Love & Hate shirt + Email subscription for $50

II. Love & Hate necklace + Logo Mondo Hall of Fame for + Two Love & Hate shirt for $100

 

 

1° How long will take to be delivered?

From the handling of your order to delivery we will do as soon as possible so that you can enjoy our products.

2°  What about the jewelry quality?

Of course, for all products of Logo Mondo, we provide with a GIA-certified official letter of guarantee, we will put our earnest efforts to make your contribution a valuable investment. Furthermore, the unique techniques of our Masters is an added value. 

Masters

- Invincible Techniques: Jewelry Masters -

3° What does "Masters" stand for?

In our case, these are professionals of jewelry making with years of experience and precision who make the difference. There exist 11 authentic, traditional, and phenomenal masters equipped with sophisticated crafting techniques in Korea.

They have an average of 43 years of experience in jewelry craft.

Starting in Seoul, Korea, we already made an exclusive contract with government-approved jewelry craft masters.

Logo Mondo, with your contribution, is going to bring vitality for those masters, or “Unsung Heroes”.

We are looking for PEOPLE WITH DREAMS who can join our journey.

Jongmok Kim 名匠 (Master)
43 years of Jewelry making career 1978. 3rd place winning award from International Olympics 1997. Establishment of jewelry profession school 2004. 2012. Commendation of president Coal Industry Medal 

Sangmi Lee 名匠 (Master)
41 years of Jewelry making career Registered 2002 Christie Bid Hong Kong Jewelry Fare Partner.

 4° What are our advantages? 

As “Logo Mondo” embodies the meaning of “Perfection”, the goal of our company is to deliver an “Exclusive Perfection” created by jewelry maestros. The target customers of our model who can enjoy the extraordinary service of our company ranges from the age of late 20s to 50s and 60s with a fine economic stability. With a highly polished, well-qualified techniques of master artisans, we blend freedom and audacity of designers into one jewelry. At the core of “Korea Wave” leading the world stands the “Logo Mondo”, providing with delicacy, fineness, and specialness in the jewelry industry.

In addition, the strengths of Logo Mondo are its sophisticated craftsmanship of masters and diverse styles of designers.

We are now getting recognition from different aspects, This allows to show the expertise of refined jewelry experts from South Korea to the general public.

 

We are present on most of the most used social networks allowing you to contact us on several surfaces. For any time any questions we are at your disposition for more information.

story:
MASSOX are MENs dress socks that have acupressure MASSAGERs on the inside surface of the sock! Help us launch a WOMENs & SPORTs line!
 

It started as an idea and a passion. We pitched the idea to anyone that would listen! We were fortunate enough to win the Westminster College Opportunity Quest Competition and later the best Business Plan and Brand award at the Utah Entrepreneur Challenge!

MASSOX launched its first line of Men’s Acupressure Massaging Socks on 11/11/11. We have received great feedback and are now getting re-orders from customers saying "they can't go back to their old boring socks!" We have also received countless requests for both a Women’s and Sports line of MASSOX!

In order to get into retailers nationwide MASSOX will need to take its proven concept and expand its line to include both a Women’s and Sports line of socks.

We would appreciate your support and we have some GREAT PERKS!!  Also, EVERY PERK will support a great cause!!

story:
The Xeric Evergraph Automatic - Inspired by the past, designed for the future.

Nothing withstands the test of time better than great design. Ideas come and go, and trends fade, but something well-crafted will leave its mark forever.

We've launched three successful crowdfunding campaigns prior to the Evergraph. Back in 2013 with the Xeriscope, 2015 with the Halograph, and 2016 with the Soloscope. Our backers are playing an important role in shaping the future of the watch industry and design.

 

 

Those who have supported our past three crowdfunding campaigns often tell us they're tired of pretentious watches that merely express status - or- boring watches with no personality.

We are finding new ways to offer affordable, limited edition mechanical watches to fill that void. The Evergraph Automatic is our most classic-yet-modern design to date.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Although reading the time appears complex, the Evergraph is actually quite simple to read. The inner rings show the hours, and the outer rings show the minutes.

 

All Xeric watches begin with a number 2 pencil, piles of white paper, and a passion for rethinking traditional watch design. We’ve spent years and years obsessing about cool antique gadgets we collect, vintage concept cars, and telling time in unique yet stylish ways. It's an exercise of sorts for us—to take something apart and put it back together again. But our secret lies in mixing all those 'parts' up and creating something unexpected.

 

 

Our manufacturing partner has confirmed delivery can be made within this timeframe. We are confident we'll meet this expected product release of August 2017 if not beat it.

 

 


 

You may also know us as Watches.com (formerly Watchismo). Xeric is shaking up the watch world by designing limited edition mechanical timepieces like you've never seen before. After all, we are watch collectors first and foremost, and it's our passion to create unexpected timepieces. 

 

Time to be Different. That's the motto at Watches.com. Founded by brothers Mitch & Andrew Greenblatt who are modern horological enthusiasts with a passion for unique timepieces. They've been scouring the globe since 1999 discovering obscure, unusual brands that you've probably never heard of as well as carefully curating the brands you love. A watch says a lot about you and helps you stand out.

Watchismo has acquired and merged into Watches.com. We have big plans and this is just the beginning. It's been an amazing 18+ years offering the world's largest online collection of diverse & unusual watches at Watchismo and it's about to get even more fun. We believe that the modern watch represents more than just a functional mechanism to tell time. The watch is a unique form of art, design and personal expression. We've had a long-standing mission of providing unique and affordable timepieces to adventurous enthusiasts as yourself.
story_txt:
The Xeric Evergraph Automatic - Inspired by the past, designed for the future.
Nothing withstands the test of time better than great design. Ideas come and go, and trends fade, but something well-crafted will leave its mark forever.

We've launched three successful crowdfunding campaigns prior to the Evergraph. Back in 2013 with the Xeriscope, 2015 with the Halograph, and 2016 with the Soloscope. Our backers are playing an important role in shaping the future of the watch industry and design.


 


The Evergraph features the workhorse Japanese Miyota 82S0 automatic movement, American Horween leather (or solid stainless steel straps), anti-reflective sapphire crystal, and Xeric's signature time display. Production will be limited to only 999 pieces per color. 


 

To bring the Evergraph Automatic to reality, we need to know that we're on the right track with support from like-minded people like you who take pride in standing out from the crowd.
Those who have supported our past three crowdfunding campaigns often tell us they're tired of pretentious watches that merely express status - or- boring watches with no personality.
We are finding new ways to offer affordable, limited edition mechanical watches to fill that void. The Evergraph Automatic is our most classic-yet-modern design to date.

 

 




 

 

Open box with stamped black logo on herringbone wool (featured:  Rose Gold Evergraph Automatic EGA-3015-SS)
 
 
 

 

The spirit of the Evergraph comes from the city of San Francisco. This iconic city seamlessly contrasts the world of yesteryear with a modern core of technology and design. We wanted to imagine what a Xeric watch might have looked like if we designed it a hundred years ago but also maintain an aesthetic that will look just as timeless a hundred years into the future.


For those of you who love to know the details. Case Material: 316L Stainless steelCase Size: 44mm WideCase Height: 14mmMovement: Miyota 82S0 AutomaticCrystal: SapphireBand Material: American-made Horween leather, Croc Stamped Italian Leather, or 5-link, solid stainless steel metal bracelet with a double pusher, butterfly deployant claspBand Width: 20mmOverall Fit: Fits up to a 8.5” wrist (215mm)""Warranty: 12 months
Evergraph Automatic Specs
Although reading the time appears complex, the Evergraph is actually quite simple to read. The inner rings show the hours, and the outer rings show the minutes.

A skeleton arrow hand points to the two inner hour dials. The long hand points to the concave minute ring.
 
Unisex watch - case size is ideal for both men and women
 

All Xeric watches begin with a number 2 pencil, piles of white paper, and a passion for rethinking traditional watch design. We’ve spent years and years obsessing about cool antique gadgets we collect, vintage concept cars, and telling time in unique yet stylish ways. It's an exercise of sorts for us—to take something apart and put it back together again. But our secret lies in mixing all those 'parts' up and creating something unexpected.
 

 

Our manufacturing partner has confirmed delivery can be made within this timeframe. We are confident we'll meet this expected product release of August 2017 if not beat it.

 

Xeric has been featured in some of the most well-respected publications in the world. Here's just a sampling Xeric in the press.

 


 
You may also know us as Watches.com (formerly Watchismo). Xeric is shaking up the watch world by designing limited edition mechanical timepieces like you've never seen before. After all, we are watch collectors first and foremost, and it's our passion to create unexpected timepieces. 
 
 
Time to be Different. That's the motto at Watches.com. Founded by brothers Mitch & Andrew Greenblatt who are modern horological enthusiasts with a passion for unique timepieces. They've been scouring the globe since 1999 discovering obscure, unusual brands that you've probably never heard of as well as carefully curating the brands you love. A watch says a lot about you and helps you stand out.
Watchismo has acquired and merged into Watches.com. We have big plans and this is just the beginning. It's been an amazing 18+ years offering the world's largest online collection of diverse & unusual watches at Watchismo and it's about to get even more fun. We believe that the modern watch represents more than just a functional mechanism to tell time. The watch is a unique form of art, design and personal expression. We've had a long-standing mission of providing unique and affordable timepieces to adventurous enthusiasts as yourself. 
 
 
Follow XERIC Watches on Instagram!
 
 
Follow XERIC Watches on Facebook!
 
 
Help spread the word, share the Evergraph on Facebook!
 
 
Tweet the Evergraph, Please share Xeric on Twitter!
 
Xeric Campaign History of Crowdfunding - The Soloscope & Halograph Automatic Collections

story:
"What motivates me to back this is the idea that it can quickly turn into a socially impacting product for many, considering how this could fundamentally change the way 7 billion people take medicine, and everybody falls sick at some point. So, this is not just a particular demographic segment of society we’re talking about. This would be about everybody; this is for everybody."

Dr. Mohammad Waseem-ul-Islam (Former Advisor,
WHO, Mediterranean Region)

 

 

Conceptual design

 

What is a TONGUE COVER?

A cover for your tongue to protect it from bitter medicine.

The Tongue Cover is a patent-pending, revolutionary new product that acts as a disposable latex barrier between your tongue and bitter medicine. It covers & effectively protects your tongue from the bitter taste of the liquid medicine, health drinks, herbal teas, vitamin solutions, or even distasteful pills – all of which are imperative for your health, but whose taste, until now, was impossible to avoid.

Pre-production prototype

Solving the Bitter Medicine Problem

There’s no real substitute

Before now, there were hardly any options to shield yourself from the taste of bitter medicines or pills. There are ways for masking the taste or cleansing the palette after dosing, even though most people simply choose to drink water or other liquids to flush down the aftertaste of it.

Pharmaceutical companies, on the other hand, have spent a lot of time & effort in making medicines more bearable by either sugar-coating pills, or mixing liquid medicines with more palatable solutions (like kids’ medicines or adult antibiotics). What they fail to do in the course of their multi-million-dollar research efforts is actually prevent you from tasting the medicine. Rather, these measures adversely increase the number of nonessential ingredients in your medicine.

How it works

The Indiegogo campaign video posted above shows the instructions very clearly (from 1:30 to 2:05) on how to use the product

From a functional standpoint, you can think of the Tongue Cover as a condom for the tongue. 

Simply take the Tongue Cover and settle it on to your tongue, very much like the way you settle a “bubble gum” onto your tongue right before making a bubble. Then drink your medicine as usual. The salty, sweet and sour areas of your tongue that are most sensitive to the pungent, blended flavor of the medicine are covered, so it goes down easy. And you don’t have to worry about the aftertaste of the medicine either!

When you are done, simply remove and discard the Tongue Cover. We do not recommend reusing the Tongue Cover for hygiene and legal reasons.

Prototype usage demo from our supplier in China

Challenges addressed

Production challenges, Technical issues & Economic viability

It’s been a long year to get to this point. After going back and forth during technical consultations with well-respected polymer engineers in the industry as well as dentists and ENT specialists, we sorted out issues regarding the right material to be used in terms of oral usage, costs, moldability and of course, ease of availability.

Another ergonomic challenge was to make the Tongue Cover “easy to wear and discard”. Finally, finding the appropriate manufacturer with the right R&D facilities, hospital-grade standards of disinfection and requisite prototyping skills was imperative.

What we need to do now is raise sufficient funds to achieve economies of scale (by means of mass production), which is critical to the “physical distribution” component of our marketing plan.

Goal

A Tongue Cover with every bottle of medicine

With your help, our goal is to make Tongue Covers the standard. Once we begin retailing it in pharmacies, we expect eventually a few "pharmaceutical" manufacturers to get serious about it and start pre-packaging the Tongue Cover along with the bitter medicine bottles by default.

Target market

Pharmacies, Doctors’ offices, Hospitals and Distributors

We want to make Tongue Covers as accessible as condoms or band-aids, for example; make it ubiquitously available across pharmacies, doctors’ offices and hospitals. In order for the product to be as easily accessible, however, we need to raise funds sufficient enough to attain economic viability.

Perks

Every dollar counts

Right from the conceptual stage, we always knew that the key to the success of Tongue Cover would lie in mass user adoption, which can only be achieved with a realistically low price tag. We plan on selling Tongue Covers in pharmacies at prices similar to condoms, after the first production run. Moreover, once the pharmaceutical companies hop on the bandwagon, and begin considering it as a standard add-on for bitter medicines, the prices are only bound to further plummet. 

Right now, we’re offering our friends on Indiegogo a purposefully wide range of perks that would cater to people of all segments. Whether you have a family member who has to endure medicinal teas or herbal solutions from time to time, or a friend who simply can’t stand drinking medicines or stinking pills, or if you’re a distributor who foresees market opportunity in Tongue Cover - our perks on offer cater to everyone.

 

 

FAQs

What is a Tongue Cover?

The Tongue Cover is a patent-pending, revolutionary new product that acts as a disposable latex barrier between your tongue and bitter medicine. It covers & effectively protects your tongue from the bitter taste of the liquid medicine, health drinks, herbal teas, vitamin solutions, or even distasteful pills – all of which are imperative for your health, but whose taste, until now, was impossible to avoid.

How does it work?

From a functional standpoint, you can think of the Tongue Cover as a “condom for the tongue”, since it works on a similar principle. It acts as a barrier between your tongue and unpleasant medicine, so you can take medicine without having to endure its bitter taste.

Is this a patent-pending product?

Yes.

When will the Tongue Cover be available?

Now that we have partnered with our supplier in China, we are currently raising money for our first production run. We plan to ship first batch of Tongue Covers in May 2013.

What is the Tongue Cover made of?

Latex.

I’m allergic to latex, will you make Tongue Covers of other materials?

We have considered alternative materials in addition to latex for later production iterations. If we are able to successfully raise the ideal amount of $125,000, we would place first priority on producing child-size Tongue Covers, and later diversify into alternative materials.

Is the Tongue Cover meant for disposable use?

Yes. We do not recommend reusing the Tongue Cover for hygiene and legal reasons.

How much will it cost?

Low unit price is our top priority, to achieve mass adoption. The Tongue Cover would retail in pharmacies at a price range similar to condoms.

Moreover, once the pharmaceutical companies join in and begin considering it as a standard add-on for bitter medicines, the prices are only bound to further plummet.

Does this cover the entire tongue? Will I still taste anything?

The Tongue Cover in itself is tasteless. But it does not shield the entire tongue per se. Covering the entire tongue is rather impractical, as the back extends into the throat.

The Tongue Cover shields your tongue from the visible portion of the tongue, i.e. taste buds that detect the sweet, sour, and salty taste of your drinks, thus leaving only the very back exposed. While you will still taste a tad as you swallow, the aftertaste of it would be DRASTICALLY reduced, making strong medicines much more palatable. Our prototyping tests show approximately 90% reduction in taste with usage of Tongue Cover.

Isn’t the “bitter” part of the tongue in the back, where the Tongue Cover leaves the tongue exposed?

Technically, that is correct. But you may be surprised to learn that medicines are not necessarily “bitter” per se. That is not what makes their taste so unbearable. Rather, it is the blended flavor of sweet, sour and/or salty ingredients of the medicine that makes it “pungent” in taste, which is exactly what the Tongue Cover protects you from.

Does the Tongue Cover come in kids’ or teen sizes?

Not presently. The first production run is only for adult-sized tongue covers (18 years and above).

Children tongue sizes vary drastically with age, which poses a standardization problem, thus requiring larger investment. We do, however, realize the importance of child-sized Tongue Cover market (for parents & pediatricians), and it remains one of our top priorities after the initial production run of adult-sized Tongue Covers.

Are there any similar products presently available in the market?

Before now, there were hardly any options available to shield yourself from the taste of bitter medication. And there was certainly nothing like the Tongue Cover. This is a patent-pending product.

What are your future plans?

Our biggest priority remains low unit cost, which can only be achieved by mass producing the product, promoting it and making it widely available. Once we are able to successfully raise funds for our first production run, our prime focus will be on popularizing adult-sized tongue covers. We then plan to introduce teen-sized and eventually child-sized tongue covers, which also opens up a whole new potential market of flavored tongue covers.

Do you have a website?

Yes, you may visit us at www.tonguecover.com Please note that you can only pre-order the product from our Indiegogo campaign page (See perks).

I’m interested in becoming a distributor? What should I do?

We have included a range of wholesale-priced distributor packs of Tongue Cover in the listed perks, so you can test market our product. For any other queries, you may contact us at sales@tonguecover.com

What are the shipping costs?

Shipping to US, Canada, UK, Australia and New Zealand is free and included in the perks. We cannot ship to countries that restrict trade due to war, sanctions or legal reasons. Please contact us at sales@tonguecover.com for any other shipping queries.

Background

About the inventor, and the idea

After having graduated M.B.A. (Masters in Business Administration) in International Business in 2009 in Phoenix, AZ, I was awarded the D.M.D. honor title (Delta Mu Delta), for academic excellence – the highest national academic recognition for a business administration student in the United States. I was then inducted as a “lifetime member” of the Greater Phoenix Chamber of Commerce. I completed BS in Business (Marketing) back in 2006, and was awarded the M.K.T. honor title (Mu Kappa Tau) – the only marketing honor title for an undergraduate business administration student in the United States. Although I was offered a scholarship to pursue a PhD program, I decided instead to opt for the entrepreneurial route, and flew down to Dubai, U.A.E. which is where my parents have long resided.

The idea came to life when my father (a scientist) took particular interest during a discussion of “problem-solving” inventions while attending a related seminar. While the media and tech fans usually focus more on incremental changes for the relatively newer technological inventions, I have always been an ardent supporter of bringing attention toward changes in those fields that still operate pretty much the same way they did during our great grandparents’ time. The “Tongue Cover” falls in the latter category. Between him being a scientist and me being a marketing-oriented entrepreneur, we then decided to embark upon the possibility of having this concept turn into reality.

While we’ve stated $70,000 as our minimum target amount, we are ideally looking to raise $125,000 to achieve true economies of scale. 

Thank you for checking out our Indiegogo campaign. Please select a perk to pre-order Tongue Covers for your friends, family and try it out yourself. You can further help us by sharing our campaign link with whosoever you think may find it of particular benefit. Click this link to SHARE  -  http://igg.me/p/308748/x/2045669
