Right now, we’re offering our friends on Indiegogo a purposefully wide range of perks that would cater to people of all segments. Whether you have a family member who has to endure medicinal teas or herbal solutions from time to time, or a friend who simply can’t stand drinking medicines or stinking pills, or if you’re a distributor who foresees market opportunity in Tongue Cover - our perks on offer cater to everyone.

 
 

FAQs
What is a Tongue Cover?
The Tongue Cover is a patent-pending, revolutionary new product that acts as a disposable latex barrier between your tongue and bitter medicine. It covers & effectively protects your tongue from the bitter taste of the liquid medicine, health drinks, herbal teas, vitamin solutions, or even distasteful pills – all of which are imperative for your health, but whose taste, until now, was impossible to avoid.
How does it work?
From a functional standpoint, you can think of the Tongue Cover as a “condom for the tongue”, since it works on a similar principle. It acts as a barrier between your tongue and unpleasant medicine, so you can take medicine without having to endure its bitter taste.
Is this a patent-pending product?
Yes.
When will the Tongue Cover be available?
Now that we have partnered with our supplier in China, we are currently raising money for our first production run. We plan to ship first batch of Tongue Covers in May 2013.
What is the Tongue Cover made of?
Latex.
I’m allergic to latex, will you make Tongue Covers of other materials?
We have considered alternative materials in addition to latex for later production iterations. If we are able to successfully raise the ideal amount of $125,000, we would place first priority on producing child-size Tongue Covers, and later diversify into alternative materials.
Is the Tongue Cover meant for disposable use?
Yes. We do not recommend reusing the Tongue Cover for hygiene and legal reasons.
How much will it cost?
Low unit price is our top priority, to achieve mass adoption. The Tongue Cover would retail in pharmacies at a price range similar to condoms.
Moreover, once the pharmaceutical companies join in and begin considering it as a standard add-on for bitter medicines, the prices are only bound to further plummet.
Does this cover the entire tongue? Will I still taste anything?
The Tongue Cover in itself is tasteless. But it does not shield the entire tongue per se. Covering the entire tongue is rather impractical, as the back extends into the throat.
The Tongue Cover shields your tongue from the visible portion of the tongue, i.e. taste buds that detect the sweet, sour, and salty taste of your drinks, thus leaving only the very back exposed. While you will still taste a tad as you swallow, the aftertaste of it would be DRASTICALLY reduced, making strong medicines much more palatable. Our prototyping tests show approximately 90% reduction in taste with usage of Tongue Cover.
Isn’t the “bitter” part of the tongue in the back, where the Tongue Cover leaves the tongue exposed?
Technically, that is correct. But you may be surprised to learn that medicines are not necessarily “bitter” per se. That is not what makes their taste so unbearable. Rather, it is the blended flavor of sweet, sour and/or salty ingredients of the medicine that makes it “pungent” in taste, which is exactly what the Tongue Cover protects you from.
Does the Tongue Cover come in kids’ or teen sizes?
Not presently. The first production run is only for adult-sized tongue covers (18 years and above).
Children tongue sizes vary drastically with age, which poses a standardization problem, thus requiring larger investment. We do, however, realize the importance of child-sized Tongue Cover market (for parents & pediatricians), and it remains one of our top priorities after the initial production run of adult-sized Tongue Covers.
Are there any similar products presently available in the market?
Before now, there were hardly any options available to shield yourself from the taste of bitter medication. And there was certainly nothing like the Tongue Cover. This is a patent-pending product.
What are your future plans?
Our biggest priority remains low unit cost, which can only be achieved by mass producing the product, promoting it and making it widely available. Once we are able to successfully raise funds for our first production run, our prime focus will be on popularizing adult-sized tongue covers. We then plan to introduce teen-sized and eventually child-sized tongue covers, which also opens up a whole new potential market of flavored tongue covers.
Do you have a website?
Yes, you may visit us at www.tonguecover.com Please note that you can only pre-order the product from our Indiegogo campaign page (See perks).
I’m interested in becoming a distributor? What should I do?
We have included a range of wholesale-priced distributor packs of Tongue Cover in the listed perks, so you can test market our product. For any other queries, you may contact us at sales@tonguecover.com
What are the shipping costs?
Shipping to US, Canada, UK, Australia and New Zealand is free and included in the perks. We cannot ship to countries that restrict trade due to war, sanctions or legal reasons. Please contact us at sales@tonguecover.com for any other shipping queries.


Background
About the inventor, and the idea
After having graduated M.B.A. (Masters in Business Administration) in International Business in 2009 in Phoenix, AZ, I was awarded the D.M.D. honor title (Delta Mu Delta), for academic excellence – the highest national academic recognition for a business administration student in the United States. I was then inducted as a “lifetime member” of the Greater Phoenix Chamber of Commerce. I completed BS in Business (Marketing) back in 2006, and was awarded the M.K.T. honor title (Mu Kappa Tau) – the only marketing honor title for an undergraduate business administration student in the United States. Although I was offered a scholarship to pursue a PhD program, I decided instead to opt for the entrepreneurial route, and flew down to Dubai, U.A.E. which is where my parents have long resided.
The idea came to life when my father (a scientist) took particular interest during a discussion of “problem-solving” inventions while attending a related seminar. While the media and tech fans usually focus more on incremental changes for the relatively newer technological inventions, I have always been an ardent supporter of bringing attention toward changes in those fields that still operate pretty much the same way they did during our great grandparents’ time. The “Tongue Cover” falls in the latter category. Between him being a scientist and me being a marketing-oriented entrepreneur, we then decided to embark upon the possibility of having this concept turn into reality.

While we’ve stated $70,000 as our minimum target amount, we are ideally looking to raise $125,000 to achieve true economies of scale. 

Thank you for checking out our Indiegogo campaign. Please select a perk to pre-order Tongue Covers for your friends, family and try it out yourself. You can further help us by sharing our campaign link with whosoever you think may find it of particular benefit. Click this link to SHARE  -  http://igg.me/p/308748/x/2045669

story:
I want to celebrate & support strong women. I want to be a strong woman. I want to know strong women. I want women to know their strength. 

I want a cycling cap that says feminist when you flip it up & I think other folks might want one too while supporting a rad cause that supports women. You in?

I haven't found this cap out in the world & I think it should exist. But instead of just making one for myself, why not get a bunch of them made? And use some of the profits to support a worthy cause? 

Who am I?

My name is Sarah Rice and I work in speciality coffee, I used to be a librarian, I like to ride my bike. I am incredibly fortunate to have a vast community of strong women in my life, many of whom I met through the bike community in Washington, DC. Their support and encouragement is inspiring. The solidarity I feel when I am with other women gives me hope in a world where sexism and misogyny are still ever present. 

What's this all about?

It started with me wanting a cycling cap that says "feminist" when you flip it up. Pretty simple. I haven't seen this cap. It doesn't seem too terribly difficult to make happen. I mentioned it to a few friends the day after Senator Elizabeth Warren was cut off from speaking during the attorney general confirmation hearings. One friend said, "Yes! And put, 'she persisted' on the side!" This got me thinking. What if I got this cap made? And people bought it? And I put some of the proceeds towards a cause that supports women?

It's a pretty simple idea and I think I can do it. But I need your help. 

My initial goal is raise money for 150 caps. 

How much money is that? 

$4,500 will get us 150 custom caps with about $1500 to donate to a charitable organization. 

What cause will the money go toward?

HER Resiliency Center in Washington, DC. 

"HER Resiliency Center is a non-profit organization that helps vulnerable young women ages 18 to 25 with the support, skills, and resources they need to make positive decisions and thrive. Through mentoring, workshops, and the support of dedicated and highly trained staff, HER gives young women a path to independence and a better life."

How much for a dang cap?!

$30 will get you a cap! (50 available at this price)

$35 will you a cap! (50 available at this price)

$50 gets you TWO caps! (50 hats at $25 each for this category)

About $10 per hat will go toward a positive and progressive woman supporting organization. 

What happens if I don't reach the $4,500 goal?

Nothing. You get your money back, we go about our business.

story:
Introducing Groove Ring™, the worlds safest, most comfortable, and stylish silicone ring ever made. Born from need, GROOVE raises the bar on traditional ring design with its flexible material, patent pending BREATHABLE grooves, and beautiful colors.  

Groove is designed for you - the athlete, the adventurer, the professional, the trend setter.  It begs to be worn, shown and tested everyday no matter what the circumstance. 

1. It's Breathable: 

Making a basic active type ring is easy!  Find a silicone wrist band company and they will have you up and running in a week.  The problem is the material is cheap and the rings are not made to wear close to the skin like a ring.  You inevitably build moisture between the ring and your finger that cannot escape. Groove solves this problem in two ways. 

First, the inverse radius commonly known as "comfort fit" in the industry is the first step we took in mitigating moisture buildup.  Your finger will only contact 60% +- of the inner band at any given time.

The second is our unique, patent pending inner "grooves".  Unique in look and function, these grooves are an industry first and for good reason.  The design details are only achievable with expensive liquid injected molds and machines.  We suppose no one up to this point cared about perfection. We did.

2. Groove is 2 in 1: 

Groove's unique design consists of 2 separate rings permanently heat molded together for maximum comfort. The inner ring is made of firmer material that gives it a traditional feel on your finger. The outer ring in contrast is softer and smooth on your adjoining fingers. The outer ring also incorporates a non tacky finish which helps prevents Groove from catching on clothing and other objects. 

3. Groove is liquid poured and PERFECT!  

Okay, so we went a little overboard in the expense of the liquid injection molding, but it was worth it to develop a superior product. We wouldn't settle for anything less than the highest quality! 

The first of its kind, Groove ring is liquid poured which not only permanently bonds the two rings but enables its flawless design and detail. Just look at it--it's beautiful! There are no messy mold lines and leftover material commonly found on silicone and elastomer products.  

4. Groove is low profile and beautiful: 

Our goal was to allow you to put your hand in your pocket without the ring grabbing the fabric. Groove is low profile with a slightly raised outer arch giving it a pronounced look without a pronounced feel.  

5. Groove is Stylish but Rugged:

Groove is in its element in the gym, office, job site or on an adventure. 

6.  Its Safe:

 7.  Groove has a KILLER warranty:  

    When you buy Groove you are in the family!  If it breaks for any reason, if you lose it, or even if you hate your color, we will replace it.  Our warranty is for 1 year but send us a story of how it saved your finger and we will replace for a lifetime! 

.


Groove Original will initially come in Midnight Black, Storm Grey, & Moss Green with more colors coming by April 2016.    Groove Original is 8 mm wide or 5/16". 

Groove Thin will initially come in Midnight Black, Light Silver, and Lilac Purple more colors coming by April 2016.  Groove Thin is 5.5 mm wide or just under 1/4".

Our main goal with the kickstarter campaign is to build a community of like minded, active people who are excited about design and the future of Groove.    

We are seeking your investment, input, and conversation to help spread the word of how Groove ring will revolutionize the way the world wears rings.  We have BIG plans for Groove and we need your voice as we grow.  You are essential to Groove's future, helping propel Groove forward.  

 We have bootstrapped enough to produce the first aluminum soft mold but we have big plans for Groove which is where you come in. Your funding will not only help us pay for the final steel "Hard Mold" but will start the momentum on BIG plans we have for Groove. 

By you joining us on this journey, we will be able launch Groove to the next level of colors, sizes, material, and even technology.

We see you as first adopters, movers and shakers for the world and we need your conversations, input and investment.

Forever forward, you will shape our designs, choose our colors and test our beta products. We need you and that is why we are here. Support Groove and lets do this together.

After many trial-and-error steps we solved it! 

We came up with the infinity grooves on the inside of the ring. This, coupled with the inverse radius and firmer material on the inner ring, makes Groove Ring® as comfortable as it gets.

We now have the design that we want! 

The only catch is the mold is 3 times as expensive as a singular mold and only holds 1/3 of the sizes.  This meant to produce the same amount of rings per mold as originally planned, it was now going to cost 9 times the amount!  We debated, but we could not get over the superior quality of the new ring. It's perfect and you'll love yours!

 

Risks and challenges

At this point in our journey we have overcome a lot of the challenges. Mainly, in the design. It took extensive time to find a supplier for our unique idea, and we invested significantly in the two piece soft mold. This led us to work out a lot of the kinks to make this product the highest of quality and functionality. 

We do not foresee any major challenges for fulfilling our kickstarter commitments. Our largest challenge is one we hope to tackle with you, our kickstarter community. We desire to take Groove to the world in a big way and want your involvement in future Groove designs and products.

story:
To start off our collection, we have a lovely cross over bag - made to honor the skill and handcraft of our women artisans.  Help us to continue to support their art and provide them with a fair wage. Our Pompom bag is ready to be worn anywhere and carry all your stuff. 

Our 2017 Collection will be the superhero in your closet ever ready to perform every fashion category with extreme elan and ease. 19 Colors in 4 styles. And a Sandal for everyone . A mix of Classic and Contemporary 

 

Rungg is about the beauty of color; the bounty of nature; the exhilaration of energy.  We handcraft luxury shoes for women, using age-old Embroidered Art forms.  Our designs weave the rich culture and heritage of embroidery from India and display its intricacy and beauty on our shoes.

We take a lot of pride in our artisans and their amazing artwork.  Each Rungg shoe is 100% hand-embroidered.  And every one of them is unique. 

Rungg shoes perfect in its comfort, color and contour is just not any other shoe.  It is a story of skill, sweat and precision of our artisans who engage in the laborious yet beautiful creation with every piece executed to perfection.

 Our designs are Timeless, un-bound by the norms of the season and come with a vivid splash of color.  Our shoes come direct to you, with our fair profit - a $600 Handcrafted, Hand-embroidered shoe available to you under $200. 

Our shoes are made without the use of any animal materials. Project goal Animal-Free is to promote an ethical, responsible and sustainable fashion. 

Our brand values embody “Cruelty-Free”. We love animals and don't want to hurt them for fashion.

Our mission is to make shoes that people love to wear, know its made with amazing quality, and have a real human touch. We use only "premium" VEGAN materials on our shoes, without the use of any Leather.

Classic Wingtip

Classic Wingtip is inspired by the traditional Indian Jutti, reimagined to introduce a higher level of comfort and versatility. The wing detail helps hug the foot in the shoe. This is the perfect show-off shoe. Pair them with skirts, dresses, jeans or cropped pants for a classic, put-together look.

 

Inverted Wingtip

The deep V shape gives a sexy cut to the shoe and makes the legs look thinner whilst the low heel height makes them practical for casual and work wear alike. These statement shoes will give your everyday style a simple but effective fashion boost.

D’orsay

With the D’Orsay style, you get the airiness of an open shoe whilst not compromising on foot grip. The striking removable band around the ankle gives a sleek and stylish look. Be it a formal or casual affaire, these shoes will surely adorn your feet.

Slingback

With the Slingback style, you get an easy to glide on and accessible pair for the hot summer months. The easily stretchable elastic gives your foot the proper grip. Perfect for any ensemble be it casual or formal with beautiful chic embroidery on the upper and wedge heel.

 

An essential part of our design process is to source high quality vegan materials. We have continually tested numerous materials and selected the ones that are exceptionally durable, breathable, water resistant and eco friendly.

A lot of people feel that if you don't use leather, the quality may not be as good. This is far from the truth. We have spent a lot of time in research and testing to find the best leather alternatives.

The footwear market is flooded with a lot of low quality shoes. With sub par construction, these shoes are non-durable, bad for us and our environment. We wanted to ensure Rungg clearly stands out. 

We take quality seriously. We get our materials tested for reliability at the International Testing Centre in Footwear Design & Development Institute (FDDI).  This underlines our commitment in providing world-class shoes to our customers.  

Our lining is absolutely Super Dooper.  What is lining you ask?  It's the lovely stuff that goes inside the shoe, that grips your feet as a glove for a nice comfort sensation.  All the more reason for it to be kickass. 

We tested numerous linings from around the world and finally selected a partner in Italy that produces world class “leather-free” lining.   

Our lining is tested for durability, permeability and abrasion.  It gets the Seal of Acceptance from APMA - American Podiatric Medical Association.

At less than 8 oz per shoe, Rungg shoes are really light weight. And combined with our "memory" foam, your feet are ready for the lift off.

Our cushioned memory foam insole relieves stress as you walk and holds your foot for added comfort.

Our inspiration is in nature - be it color, form or pattern. Surrounded by the beauty of nature, we find inspiration all around.

Our art, color palette and even the names of our shoes are often based on nature.

 

Pongo is our brand mascot and is a part and parcel of all our creativity. He gives us company, joy, and the constant reminder of what we stand for as a brand- Making cruelty-free shoes.

Hand Embroidery

Hand embroidery is one of the traditional art forms of India. Artisans express their creativity through threads and needles. Each shoe at Rungg is hand embroidered to perfection by them.

 

It takes an artisan anywhere from 8 to 12 hours to embroider 1 pair! Great attention to detail and precision is required to handcraft each pair. The artisan has to work according to a preset pattern to ensure the embroidery lands exactly where we want it.

As our embroidery is 100% handwork, each piece is different and unique. So each shoe you get is one of its kind.

Shoe Making

Creation of each shoe requires hours of labor and hard work. From Cutting to Stitching to Lasting, everything is done by hand. Our artisans work with utmost precision to handcraft each pair. They take their time to complete every step and continually inspect the special craftsmanship. The manual process gives each pair its unique characteristics. 

We're getting ready to dress your shoes with beautiful details.  

We're still putting the final touches, but here is a preview for one of our sole designs. Rungg all the way !!

 

 

 

 

Rungg Shoes are true to size. If your feet are wider then we suggest a size up.  We will send you a survey at the end of the campaign to find out your exact size and a tip on how to size.  If they don't fit - don't worry - we'll exchange them.  

We're a Husband-Wife Duo who are extremely passionate in what we're creating and our mission.  This is a picture from our recent trip to Italy. We attended Lineapelle and MICAM - the Largest Fashion events for Footwear and also met our amazing Vegan material suppliers.  We absolutely enjoyed our daily doze of macchiato's and croissants.  

  • Ekta is a visual genius and the creative director for the brand. She takes her inspiration from nature and all things around and is constantly in the mode of creation. She is also a die-hard fitness Mom and is ready for any cross-fit challenge event.  
  • Sachin is behind the Brand strategy and a stickler for quality - all things inside and out. With traveling between continents - he brings his vast world knowledge to the brand.  
  • We've got two amazing boys and our co-conspirator Pongo - our lovely Pug.  

Having lived in the US for over 25 years, we moved to India to kickstart Rungg.  And after 3 years of significant research, development and testing, we have truly created a world class shoe that is absolutely gorgeous and gives the real human touch. 

We are a small but passionate team, spread between different regions of USA, and India.

We've spent the last 2 years developing Rungg.  Have tried multiple rounds of production and sold our shoes to lovely customers all across the globe. 

 

 

Our team brings you some beautiful new designs with our Rungg 2.0 product line, with a world class shoe construction.

By supporting our Indiegogo campaign, you will help fully bring our designs to life and help us launch our new round of production.

Your pledge today will help us create direct employment opportunities for artisans who are striving to revive and keep alive this age old art form and will sustain ongoing jobs for many.

Our deep gratitude for spending your valuable time to review our project and we look forward to receiving your generous support to make our vision a reality.

Risks and challenges

After 2 years of manufacturing great looking shoes, and learning what can go wrong in small batch shoe production, we feel pretty positive to meet our timelines. We have the relevant experience having gone thru numerous successful rounds of design, embroidery, manufacturing, and shipment of our existing shoes to customers.

We are confident in our team, our suppliers and artisans ability to keep up with our schedule and deliver on time.

Having said that, we cannot always control everything life throws at us , especially if the demand is greater than expected.

Our promise, regardless of the situation, is to keep you thoroughly informed with frequent updates if not personal notes. Thank you for your support.
story_txt:
To start off our collection, we have a lovely cross over bag - made to honor the skill and handcraft of our women artisans.  Help us to continue to support their art and provide them with a fair wage. Our Pompom bag is ready to be worn anywhere and carry all your stuff. Our 2017 Collection will be the superhero in your closet ever ready to perform every fashion category with extreme elan and ease. 19 Colors in 4 styles. And a Sandal for everyone . A mix of Classic and Contemporary  Rungg is about the beauty of color; the bounty of nature; the exhilaration of energy.  We handcraft luxury shoes for women, using age-old Embroidered Art forms.  Our designs weave the rich culture and heritage of embroidery from India and display its intricacy and beauty on our shoes.We take a lot of pride in our artisans and their amazing artwork.  Each Rungg shoe is 100% hand-embroidered.  And every one of them is unique. Rungg shoes perfect in its comfort, color and contour is just not any other shoe.  It is a story of skill, sweat and precision of our artisans who engage in the laborious yet beautiful creation with every piece executed to perfection. Our designs are Timeless, un-bound by the norms of the season and come with a vivid splash of color.  Our shoes come direct to you, with our fair profit - a $600 Handcrafted, Hand-embroidered shoe available to you under $200. Our shoes are made without the use of any animal materials. Project goal Animal-Free is to promote an ethical, responsible and sustainable fashion. Our brand values embody “Cruelty-Free”. We love animals and don't want to hurt them for fashion.Our mission is to make shoes that people love to wear, know its made with amazing quality, and have a real human touch. We use only "premium" VEGAN materials on our shoes, without the use of any Leather.Classic WingtipClassic Wingtip is inspired by the traditional Indian Jutti, reimagined to introduce a higher level of comfort and versatility. The wing detail helps hug the foot in the shoe. This is the perfect show-off shoe. Pair them with skirts, dresses, jeans or cropped pants for a classic, put-together look. Inverted WingtipThe deep V shape gives a sexy cut to the shoe and makes the legs look thinner whilst the low heel height makes them practical for casual and work wear alike. These statement shoes will give your everyday style a simple but effective fashion boost.D’orsayWith the D’Orsay style, you get the airiness of an open shoe whilst not compromising on foot grip. The striking removable band around the ankle gives a sleek and stylish look. Be it a formal or casual affaire, these shoes will surely adorn your feet.SlingbackWith the Slingback style, you get an easy to glide on and accessible pair for the hot summer months. The easily stretchable elastic gives your foot the proper grip. Perfect for any ensemble be it casual or formal with beautiful chic embroidery on the upper and wedge heel. An essential part of our design process is to source high quality vegan materials. We have continually tested numerous materials and selected the ones that are exceptionally durable, breathable, water resistant and eco friendly.A lot of people feel that if you don't use leather, the quality may not be as good. This is far from the truth. We have spent a lot of time in research and testing to find the best leather alternatives.The footwear market is flooded with a lot of low quality shoes. With sub par construction, these shoes are non-durable, bad for us and our environment. We wanted to ensure Rungg clearly stands out. We take quality seriously. We get our materials tested for reliability at the International Testing Centre in Footwear Design & Development Institute (FDDI).  This underlines our commitment in providing world-class shoes to our customers.  Our lining is absolutely Super Dooper.  What is lining you ask?  It's the lovely stuff that goes inside the shoe, that grips your feet as a glove for a nice comfort sensation.  All the more reason for it to be kickass. We tested numerous linings from around the world and finally selected a partner in Italy that produces world class “leather-free” lining.   Our lining is tested for durability, permeability and abrasion.  It gets the Seal of Acceptance from APMA - American Podiatric Medical Association.At less than 8 oz per shoe, Rungg shoes are really light weight. And combined with our "memory" foam, your feet are ready for the lift off.Our cushioned memory foam insole relieves stress as you walk and holds your foot for added comfort.Our inspiration is in nature - be it color, form or pattern. Surrounded by the beauty of nature, we find inspiration all around.Our art, color palette and even the names of our shoes are often based on nature. Pongo is our brand mascot and is a part and parcel of all our creativity. He gives us company, joy, and the constant reminder of what we stand for as a brand- Making cruelty-free shoes.Hand EmbroideryHand embroidery is one of the traditional art forms of India. Artisans express their creativity through threads and needles. Each shoe at Rungg is hand embroidered to perfection by them. It takes an artisan anywhere from 8 to 12 hours to embroider 1 pair! Great attention to detail and precision is required to handcraft each pair. The artisan has to work according to a preset pattern to ensure the embroidery lands exactly where we want it.As our embroidery is 100% handwork, each piece is different and unique. So each shoe you get is one of its kind.Shoe MakingCreation of each shoe requires hours of labor and hard work. From Cutting to Stitching to Lasting, everything is done by hand. Our artisans work with utmost precision to handcraft each pair. They take their time to complete every step and continually inspect the special craftsmanship. The manual process gives each pair its unique characteristics. We're getting ready to dress your shoes with beautiful details.  We're still putting the final touches, but here is a preview for one of our sole designs. Rungg all the way !!    Rungg Shoes are true to size. If your feet are wider then we suggest a size up.  We will send you a survey at the end of the campaign to find out your exact size and a tip on how to size.  If they don't fit - don't worry - we'll exchange them.  We're a Husband-Wife Duo who are extremely passionate in what we're creating and our mission.  This is a picture from our recent trip to Italy. We attended Lineapelle and MICAM - the Largest Fashion events for Footwear and also met our amazing Vegan material suppliers.  We absolutely enjoyed our daily doze of macchiato's and croissants.  
Ekta is a visual genius and the creative director for the brand. She takes her inspiration from nature and all things around and is constantly in the mode of creation. She is also a die-hard fitness Mom and is ready for any cross-fit challenge event.  
Sachin is behind the Brand strategy and a stickler for quality - all things inside and out. With traveling between continents - he brings his vast world knowledge to the brand.  
We've got two amazing boys and our co-conspirator Pongo - our lovely Pug.  
Having lived in the US for over 25 years, we moved to India to kickstart Rungg.  And after 3 years of significant research, development and testing, we have truly created a world class shoe that is absolutely gorgeous and gives the real human touch. We are a small but passionate team, spread between different regions of USA, and India.We've spent the last 2 years developing Rungg.  Have tried multiple rounds of production and sold our shoes to lovely customers all across the globe.   Our team brings you some beautiful new designs with our Rungg 2.0 product line, with a world class shoe construction.By supporting our Indiegogo campaign, you will help fully bring our designs to life and help us launch our new round of production.Your pledge today will help us create direct employment opportunities for artisans who are striving to revive and keep alive this age old art form and will sustain ongoing jobs for many.Our deep gratitude for spending your valuable time to review our project and we look forward to receiving your generous support to make our vision a reality.Risks and challengesAfter 2 years of manufacturing great looking shoes, and learning what can go wrong in small batch shoe production, we feel pretty positive to meet our timelines. We have the relevant experience having gone thru numerous successful rounds of design, embroidery, manufacturing, and shipment of our existing shoes to customers.We are confident in our team, our suppliers and artisans ability to keep up with our schedule and deliver on time.Having said that, we cannot always control everything life throws at us , especially if the demand is greater than expected.Our promise, regardless of the situation, is to keep you thoroughly informed with frequent updates if not personal notes. Thank you for your support.

story:
E’ POSSIBILE MONTARE CON PANTALONI TECNICI DI ALTA QUALITA’ SENZA PAGARNE LA MARCA?

 

Siamo un gruppo di giovani amazzoni che vogliono fare la differenza, che hanno il desiderio di imporsi sulla tradizione che vuole la moda primeggiare sullo sport.


Nasce così M Breeches – Only for Riders. Solo per vere amazzoni!

 

 

Si può indossare materiale tecnico performante e di alto livello anche senza pagare la firma.

 


Ideale per le gare di Concorso, ma anche per gli allenamenti di ogni giorno.
Praticità e resistenza, senza rinunciare allo stile!

 

 


Questa è la M Breeches Difference! Solo per amazzoni che vogliono fare la differenza, che desiderano rompere con la tradizione e che mettono la performance prima della moda.

 

 

I nostri pantaloni tecnici per equitazione inglese sono realizzati con i materiali migliori del settore e sono disegnati con uno stile italiano elegante ed essenziale.

 

 

Realizzati in micro nylon, offrono performance di altissimo livello. Grazie alla qualità di questo tessuto abbiamo ottenuto risultati incredibili in fase di test. Leggeri e resistenti, si adattano molto bene alla pelle con un comfort garantito anche per un programma di allenamento intenso. Il grip, inserito nell' interno coscia dei pantaloni, permette la corretta aderenza delle gambe sulla sella.

 

 

 

Abbiamo scelto un design fresco e tradizionale, in perfetta armonia tra lo stile italiano e la grinta che vogliamo ricreare quando si affrontano gli ostacoli in sella. I nostri colori spiccano per eleganza ed armonia, studiati per esaltare il gesto atletico delle amazzoni.


 

 

 

 

Per creare dei pantaloni tecnici di qualità dovevamo scegliere il tessuto migliore sul mercato. Un materiale resistente ed elastico in grado di reggere i carichi di lavoro in sella più intensi.

 

 

L'unico che poteva darci tutto questo è il micro nylon. Tessuto artificiale ancora più sottile della seta stessa che diventa la chiave per ottenere il top nel settore.

 

 

Grazie a questa scelta i pantaloni tecnici M Breeches si adattano alla pelle ed al movimento dando tono, elasticità e soprattutto resistenza. Spicca poi la sensibilità sulle gambe che garantisce un feeling perfetto col cavallo e la massima aderenza in sella grazie al grip inserito nell'interno coscia. 

 

 

Tessuto tecnico resistente, elastico e traspirante


Nuovo grip in silicone con azione magnetica


Materiale antibatterico facile che protegge la pelle dallo sporco


Facile da pulire e che si asciuga velocemente!

 

 

 

SU EQUESTRIAN INSIGHTS PARLANO DI M BREECHES

 

 

La nostra linea di colori nasce da uno studio approfondito di mercato. Grazie ai sondaggi ed al confronto continuo con tantissime amazzoni italiane, abbiamo creato dei colori accattivanti, eleganti e capaci di seguire le tendenze più in voga.

 

 

Ogni colore è caratterizzato dai bordi delle tasche in contrasto con il colore del pantalone sulle tasche anteriori e posteriori. Il Logo M Breeches è ricamato sul lato destro, sempre con colori in contrasto. Presente anche la calzetta in Lycra elastica sulla caviglia.
 

 

 

La linea M Breeches vuole vestire tutte le amazzoni. 

 

Le misure dei nostri pantaloni tecnici vestono le bambine dagli 8 fino ai 14 anni e le donne dalla misura 38 alla 46.

 

La misura non va bene quando ricevi i tuoi pantaloni a casa ? Niente paura, puoi rimandarli indietro e verranno sostituiti 

Il feeling con la pelle e le forme femminili sono state al centro del nostro studio. I nostri pantaloni tecnici vogliono essere perfetti per tutte le misure che mettiamo a disposizione.

 

 

Grazie alla qualità del tessuto elastico, leggero e resistente il pantalone tecnico M Breeches veste come una seconda pelle. La tua pelle.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

Il team M Breeches è formato da

 

 

Ragazze che amano i cavalli e che anno messo a disposizione la loro esperienza ventennale nel campo equestre e nel settore commerciale dell'equitazione per creare il progetto M Breeches - Only 4 riders.

Questa combinazione ci ha permesso di avere sin da subito vantaggi enormi nel disegnare ed ideare i pantaloni tecnici M Breeches.

 

 

Siamo amazzoni e quindi sappiamo cosa deve darci in sella un pantalone tecnico, ma siamo anche esperte nel settore commerciale e questo ci ha permesso di trovare il materiale migliore e di modellarlo con un design di tendenza.

story:
https://www.contemp.us/

The campaign is over! Please visit our website to get the new Contempus watches! 

 

 

A little bit more than a year ago, the crowdfunding community supported us, backed our dream. The dream of making a beautiful conceptual watch that clearly reflects our point of view on good design, thus forging the CONTEMPUS heritage. A lot has happened this year: we learned the full production path for a designer product; walked that path from the conceptual stage to manufacturing; hundreds of people adorned their wrists with our timepieces; we received positive feedback from all over the world, found new friends and partners and our own place in the designer watch industry, we hope :) 

All of this became real only because of you lending us a hand and believing in our idea. Thank you for that, dear backers, supporters and all those who believed in us during our first run! But we're not going to stop now. Our first success has inspired us to move forward with our philosophy and concept, so here we are. Today we want to introduce you the second watch project by CONTEMPUS!



This time we dig deeper, not wider. The collection is dedicated to the history and development of architecture throughout the years and ages, drawing its vibe from ancient artisan masonry, contemporary shapes, designer trends and architectural objects.

We're the visionaries, and CONTEMPUS was born through studying and observing design marvels of the past. We see a beautiful thing, a stylish, functional gear, a monumental construction, a glorious memento of the past or a herald of progress — and want to imprint the feeling, to give it a corporeal body, to bring it into existence. Everything that catches our eye in designer and architectural areas is used in the creation of new designs.

The central motives in the new CONTEMPUS watches are still the same — we make pure, minimal dials with a fresh, contemporary look that’s stripped of unnecessary details.

With this new series, we want to find more wrists to adorn with CONTEMPUS! There are two different models available: Amfiteatro, with a 36 mm diameter dial and Kupolo, the more universal and larger model with a 42 mm dial.

CONTEMPUS is always about seeking the most beautiful, stylish and ergonomically approved concepts for creating a designer object. We love design and architecture, and if you do too, then you'll definitely like our fresh series of timepieces!

Are you ready to descend into a search for pure minimal shapes and forms embodied in a wristwatch? Do you seek a truly remarkable designer object that you can wear to add a spark of joy to your day? If the answer is yes, then let's continue :)

 

The Dua series by CONTEMPUS features two different models in six colorways, in a regular unisex size, and also in more sophisticated ladies’ measurements. All you need is to pick the style and size you want to spoil your wrist with this exemplary designer object.

 

The first model in the series is Kupolo — a unisex, universal timepiece that’s offering a convex dial structure with a more straightforward ergonomic shape, a reference to the latest architectural trends and up-to-date city line. 

The overall look of the Kupolo watch is based on and is a reference to the ever-changing design and architectural trends of contemporary craftsmanship, which tend to grow in height each generation, bringing humans closer to the skies, as well as turning modern minimal shapes into smooth aerodynamic objects. 

The domed structures are the point of interest here, created as a reference to the unnatural limit of how far each person and humanity can climb, the limit that we'll break one day :) The industrial beauty of the Kupolo watch is the result of inspiration from modern monumental structures.

 

The second watch in the collection is Amfiteatro — debuting as the first CONTEMPUS watch crafted specifically for ladies in a sophisticated manner. The dial of Amfiteatro has a concave form traditional to the CONTEMPUS style.

The rough and edgy shape is inspired by ancient Greek amphitheaters and concave areas that had a similar structure and physical properties. This way we commemorate the practical purpose of this ancient architecture that was discovered by humanity to serve its needs.  

 

 

KUPOLO STALO

The first available special edition added to the initial line is the Kupolo Stalo unisex watch. This timepiece brings back the stylish cold monochrome look of our Stalo standard with a dial surface fully made of brushed stainless steel and smoke grey leather strap. 

This model serves as a reference to the practical side of designer and architectural craft that serves their purpose with moderate expressions. The Kupolo Stalo watch can be included in any multiple reward as well.

 

AMFITEATRO ORA

The second special edition is the reworked version of our feminine Amfiteatro model in Ora colorway. This version bears the unique blend of antique patina with a golden case color to support the connection to the days long gone. A bright crimson strap turns it into a worthy contemporary timepiece for ladies with good taste. 

The model is also available as a standalone reward or in a multiple bundle.

Interested in learning more about the new CONTEMPUS series? 

 

As we planned from the beginning, each watch series by CONTEMPUS is not merely a physical product, but also a study of the ever-changing nature of architecture and design. This time is no different.

For a moment, close your eyes, gather your thoughts and imagine how the architectural landscape has changed through the years. From bold structures and a low line, the cities grew, and cozy buildings turned into skyscrapers, forging the contemporary industrial look.

This collection reflects the changes in a sophisticated architectural landscape throughout the past thousands of years of humanity’s creativity. From ancient monumental structures to futuristic constructions born from continual progress. Preserving the uniqueness of the landscape with artisan features and unique traits, given to it by people, who bring a spark of life to the object with their own vision and character.

For example, the idea to give more color to Amfiteatro, contrary to our usual palette and designs, was born during our transition to Amsterdam — the city in the Netherlands with a rich architectural heritage and history.

The colorful streets full of classic houses and buildings serve not only as a tourist magnet, but they also show just what attracts us so much in good old-fashioned creativity — that such individually characteristic objects can last throughout the years without losing their initial purpose. A design that will survive over decades — that's what we're aiming to create.

Color. Minimalism. Ergonomics. Traditions. Progress. That's quite enough perks to describe what inspired us for this series. Each model will take you closer to the integrity of creative vibes, assembled into something solid to represent our take on pure design.

Now that you’re acquainted with our concept, vision, philosophy and both new models, let’s view them in detail.

 

Here at CONTEMPUS, we have two simple rules: stay minimal, and the design is everything. Each collection involves a challenge to enhance the concept we chose, to extend our philosophy beyond a simple designer object. Having signature design motifs in the CONTEMPUS product line, we always try to add nice details and design features to make all design enthusiasts worldwide find something they’ll love and to stand out among the others. 

The new designs offer a wide variety of strap colorways, in a purposeful color selection, that perfectly work with each other. We conducted research to get the perfect color combinations, being guided by history's most notable examples. Even small details such as color coordination matters to CONTEMPUS!

Each watch is traditionally named in the Esperanto language, referring to the structure it’s inspired by — Amfiteatro means “amphitheater” and Kupolo means “dome.” The colorways are traditionally called Nokte and Nego for black and white models, subsequently adding Ora and Stalo, meaning “golden" and "steel" to the list.

The watch case has been polished to perfection and offers a slim construction that's so light-weight, sometimes you may wonder if the watch accidentally slipped off your wrist! The ladies' version offers even more exquisite elegance with its finer measurements.  

The dial of the Kupolo watch leaves no space for smooth edges. Being topped on the flat surface, it serves as a reference to a modern skyline and the tendency to grow a city toward the clouds.  

We decided to stay true to watchmaking traditions and offer easily readable, two-handed dials, stressing the design itself. The Amfiteatro model features a universal clear dial with a concave center, a nod to ancient Greek and Roman structures.

So it's up to you to choose your favorite style! Want to know how we did it?

 

This is our second series, so we were confident in resuming the research process, seeking the ultimate design. Our new attempt is the next step for our concept, deriving from the architectural motives of the first series. We tried tons of different variations depicting the monumental might and ergonomics of iconic architecture types in the form of a minimalist, universal watch that will suit every wrist on every occasion. Not the simplest thing to do. But we think we’re moving in the right direction!

This time we decided to leave no wrist untouched and went for men’s and women’s styles. Another difficult choice was finding the perfect colorways for our new series. We had a lot of discussions about the most fitting options, deciding finally to keep the initial "Esperanto" black and white colors, while adding new extravaganza colorways to the line. The Kupolo model offers a choice of vintage-inspired straps. The Amfiteatro model has the more contemporary color options.  

 

 

Besides the design, we're happy to support it with an affordable price, too. Our primary goal is to bring each CONTEMPUS watch to life and make as many people happy with the new pieces as we can. That's why we offer such an attractive price on any CONTEMPUS timepiece, which is only $95 USD! There are several factors that affect the price.

With no retail margin at all, you'll get your watches directly from the manufacturer, avoiding any middlemen and their commissions on the way to your wrist. We’re also transparent and honest about our production costs. There’s a graph below showing how we can achieve such an affordable price, including every stage of manufacturing and every piece of the watch itself, as well as company profit.

Below is a graph showing the estimated production period — from the crowdfunding campaign to final shipping. It's not our first campaign, so we're confident in our estimates and that each stage will be completed on time because of our past successful experience. And don't forget that the initial stages are past us already, and the production has started!

Another vital thing worth mentioning is about the shipping itself. We understand that there are watch enthusiasts and design lovers all across our planet, so you may be interested in getting a watch or two but at the same time afraid of taxes and additional customs fees that may come with the package, ruining the mood. You don't need to worry about that with CONTEMPUS! We distribute our watches through different regional postal hubs (US, HK, Germany) in order to let every backer to avoid getting undesirable extra payments sending it with the carrier fitting for the specific country. So, no taxes and extras for CONTEMPUS worldwide!

Working directly with the manufacturer and leaving all other stages of distribution behind allows us to offer you a much lower price than it'll be at retail. You'll be saving from €60 for a single watch and even more with multiple rewards! The amount of all rewards with such special prices is limited, so don't miss the chance to grab one!

If you're looking for a little proof, please, review the feedback from our previous backers. We hope this will be enough to prove that with CONTEMPUS, you'll get a smooth watch crowdfunding experience and a great quality timepiece with an interesting design concept in the end :)

The second CONTEMPUS series is offering two size options: 36 and 42 mm in diameter. Their ultra slim cases are made of stainless steel and PVD-coated, which makes it weigh almost nothing. The Amfiteatro and Kupolo straps are made of suede. The watches run on Japanese-made Miyota GL26 movement designed specifically for slim cases. The case is protected with solid crystal mineral glass and has 5 ATM water resistance.

Case Diameter: Kupolo - 42 mm | Amfiteatro - 36 mm 
Case Thickness: Kupolo - 9 mm | Amfiteatro - 7 mm
Band Material: Suede 
Band Width: Kupolo - 20 mm | Amfiteatro - 16 mm 
Total Weight: 50 gram (Kupolo) / 35 gram (Amfiteatro)
Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel 
Crystal: Mineral Glass
Movement: Miyota Quartz Movement GL26 Slim
Water Resistant: 5 ATM

 

Social media is a great tool to influence the outcome of the final success. If you dig our concept, share our vision, support our philosophy and like our watches, please, tell your friends by sharing it with them on your social pages. Together, we'll be able to extend the reach of the CONTEMPUS design to every corner of the world, letting more people know about our watches!

INSTAGRAM: instagram.com/contemp.us
FACEBOOK: facebook.com/contempus.watches 
TWITTER: twitter.com/contemp_us 

 

Hi-Hi-res images of CONTEMPUS' second series are always available on our Dropbox page. Feel free to use them if you're a journalist, blogger or just like our watches! If you have any press inquiries or any other questions, feel free to contact us: hello@contemp.us
story_txt: https://www.contemp.us/The campaign is over! Please visit our website to get the new Contempus watches!   A little bit more than a year ago, the crowdfunding community supported us, backed our dream. The dream of making a beautiful conceptual watch that clearly reflects our point of view on good design, thus forging the CONTEMPUS heritage. A lot has happened this year: we learned the full production path for a designer product; walked that path from the conceptual stage to manufacturing; hundreds of people adorned their wrists with our timepieces; we received positive feedback from all over the world, found new friends and partners and our own place in the designer watch industry, we hope :) All of this became real only because of you lending us a hand and believing in our idea. Thank you for that, dear backers, supporters and all those who believed in us during our first run! But we're not going to stop now. Our first success has inspired us to move forward with our philosophy and concept, so here we are. Today we want to introduce you the second watch project by CONTEMPUS!This time we dig deeper, not wider. The collection is dedicated to the history and development of architecture throughout the years and ages, drawing its vibe from ancient artisan masonry, contemporary shapes, designer trends and architectural objects.We're the visionaries, and CONTEMPUS was born through studying and observing design marvels of the past. We see a beautiful thing, a stylish, functional gear, a monumental construction, a glorious memento of the past or a herald of progress — and want to imprint the feeling, to give it a corporeal body, to bring it into existence. Everything that catches our eye in designer and architectural areas is used in the creation of new designs.The central motives in the new CONTEMPUS watches are still the same — we make pure, minimal dials with a fresh, contemporary look that’s stripped of unnecessary details.With this new series, we want to find more wrists to adorn with CONTEMPUS! There are two different models available: Amfiteatro, with a 36 mm diameter dial and Kupolo, the more universal and larger model with a 42 mm dial.CONTEMPUS is always about seeking the most beautiful, stylish and ergonomically approved concepts for creating a designer object. We love design and architecture, and if you do too, then you'll definitely like our fresh series of timepieces!Are you ready to descend into a search for pure minimal shapes and forms embodied in a wristwatch? Do you seek a truly remarkable designer object that you can wear to add a spark of joy to your day? If the answer is yes, then let's continue :) The Dua series by CONTEMPUS features two different models in six colorways, in a regular unisex size, and also in more sophisticated ladies’ measurements. All you need is to pick the style and size you want to spoil your wrist with this exemplary designer object. The first model in the series is Kupolo — a unisex, universal timepiece that’s offering a convex dial structure with a more straightforward ergonomic shape, a reference to the latest architectural trends and up-to-date city line. The overall look of the Kupolo watch is based on and is a reference to the ever-changing design and architectural trends of contemporary craftsmanship, which tend to grow in height each generation, bringing humans closer to the skies, as well as turning modern minimal shapes into smooth aerodynamic objects. The domed structures are the point of interest here, created as a reference to the unnatural limit of how far each person and humanity can climb, the limit that we'll break one day :) The industrial beauty of the Kupolo watch is the result of inspiration from modern monumental structures. The second watch in the collection is Amfiteatro — debuting as the first CONTEMPUS watch crafted specifically for ladies in a sophisticated manner. The dial of Amfiteatro has a concave form traditional to the CONTEMPUS style.The rough and edgy shape is inspired by ancient Greek amphitheaters and concave areas that had a similar structure and physical properties. This way we commemorate the practical purpose of this ancient architecture that was discovered by humanity to serve its needs.    KUPOLO STALOThe first available special edition added to the initial line is the Kupolo Stalo unisex watch. This timepiece brings back the stylish cold monochrome look of our Stalo standard with a dial surface fully made of brushed stainless steel and smoke grey leather strap. This model serves as a reference to the practical side of designer and architectural craft that serves their purpose with moderate expressions. The Kupolo Stalo watch can be included in any multiple reward as well. AMFITEATRO ORAThe second special edition is the reworked version of our feminine Amfiteatro model in Ora colorway. This version bears the unique blend of antique patina with a golden case color to support the connection to the days long gone. A bright crimson strap turns it into a worthy contemporary timepiece for ladies with good taste. The model is also available as a standalone reward or in a multiple bundle.Interested in learning more about the new CONTEMPUS series?  As we planned from the beginning, each watch series by CONTEMPUS is not merely a physical product, but also a study of the ever-changing nature of architecture and design. This time is no different.For a moment, close your eyes, gather your thoughts and imagine how the architectural landscape has changed through the years. From bold structures and a low line, the cities grew, and cozy buildings turned into skyscrapers, forging the contemporary industrial look.This collection reflects the changes in a sophisticated architectural landscape throughout the past thousands of years of humanity’s creativity. From ancient monumental structures to futuristic constructions born from continual progress. Preserving the uniqueness of the landscape with artisan features and unique traits, given to it by people, who bring a spark of life to the object with their own vision and character.For example, the idea to give more color to Amfiteatro, contrary to our usual palette and designs, was born during our transition to Amsterdam — the city in the Netherlands with a rich architectural heritage and history.The colorful streets full of classic houses and buildings serve not only as a tourist magnet, but they also show just what attracts us so much in good old-fashioned creativity — that such individually characteristic objects can last throughout the years without losing their initial purpose. A design that will survive over decades — that's what we're aiming to create.Color. Minimalism. Ergonomics. Traditions. Progress. That's quite enough perks to describe what inspired us for this series. Each model will take you closer to the integrity of creative vibes, assembled into something solid to represent our take on pure design.Now that you’re acquainted with our concept, vision, philosophy and both new models, let’s view them in detail. Here at CONTEMPUS, we have two simple rules: stay minimal, and the design is everything. Each collection involves a challenge to enhance the concept we chose, to extend our philosophy beyond a simple designer object. Having signature design motifs in the CONTEMPUS product line, we always try to add nice details and design features to make all design enthusiasts worldwide find something they’ll love and to stand out among the others. The new designs offer a wide variety of strap colorways, in a purposeful color selection, that perfectly work with each other. We conducted research to get the perfect color combinations, being guided by history's most notable examples. Even small details such as color coordination matters to CONTEMPUS!Each watch is traditionally named in the Esperanto language, referring to the structure it’s inspired by — Amfiteatro means “amphitheater” and Kupolo means “dome.” The colorways are traditionally called Nokte and Nego for black and white models, subsequently adding Ora and Stalo, meaning “golden" and "steel" to the list.The watch case has been polished to perfection and offers a slim construction that's so light-weight, sometimes you may wonder if the watch accidentally slipped off your wrist! The ladies' version offers even more exquisite elegance with its finer measurements.  The dial of the Kupolo watch leaves no space for smooth edges. Being topped on the flat surface, it serves as a reference to a modern skyline and the tendency to grow a city toward the clouds.  We decided to stay true to watchmaking traditions and offer easily readable, two-handed dials, stressing the design itself. The Amfiteatro model features a universal clear dial with a concave center, a nod to ancient Greek and Roman structures.So it's up to you to choose your favorite style! Want to know how we did it? This is our second series, so we were confident in resuming the research process, seeking the ultimate design. Our new attempt is the next step for our concept, deriving from the architectural motives of the first series. We tried tons of different variations depicting the monumental might and ergonomics of iconic architecture types in the form of a minimalist, universal watch that will suit every wrist on every occasion. Not the simplest thing to do. But we think we’re moving in the right direction!This time we decided to leave no wrist untouched and went for men’s and women’s styles. Another difficult choice was finding the perfect colorways for our new series. We had a lot of discussions about the most fitting options, deciding finally to keep the initial "Esperanto" black and white colors, while adding new extravaganza colorways to the line. The Kupolo model offers a choice of vintage-inspired straps. The Amfiteatro model has the more contemporary color options.    Besides the design, we're happy to support it with an affordable price, too. Our primary goal is to bring each CONTEMPUS watch to life and make as many people happy with the new pieces as we can. That's why we offer such an attractive price on any CONTEMPUS timepiece, which is only $95 USD! There are several factors that affect the price.With no retail margin at all, you'll get your watches directly from the manufacturer, avoiding any middlemen and their commissions on the way to your wrist. We’re also transparent and honest about our production costs. There’s a graph below showing how we can achieve such an affordable price, including every stage of manufacturing and every piece of the watch itself, as well as company profit.Below is a graph showing the estimated production period — from the crowdfunding campaign to final shipping. It's not our first campaign, so we're confident in our estimates and that each stage will be completed on time because of our past successful experience. And don't forget that the initial stages are past us already, and the production has started!Another vital thing worth mentioning is about the shipping itself. We understand that there are watch enthusiasts and design lovers all across our planet, so you may be interested in getting a watch or two but at the same time afraid of taxes and additional customs fees that may come with the package, ruining the mood. You don't need to worry about that with CONTEMPUS! We distribute our watches through different regional postal hubs (US, HK, Germany) in order to let every backer to avoid getting undesirable extra payments sending it with the carrier fitting for the specific country. So, no taxes and extras for CONTEMPUS worldwide!Working directly with the manufacturer and leaving all other stages of distribution behind allows us to offer you a much lower price than it'll be at retail. You'll be saving from €60 for a single watch and even more with multiple rewards! The amount of all rewards with such special prices is limited, so don't miss the chance to grab one!If you're looking for a little proof, please, review the feedback from our previous backers. We hope this will be enough to prove that with CONTEMPUS, you'll get a smooth watch crowdfunding experience and a great quality timepiece with an interesting design concept in the end :)The second CONTEMPUS series is offering two size options: 36 and 42 mm in diameter. Their ultra slim cases are made of stainless steel and PVD-coated, which makes it weigh almost nothing. The Amfiteatro and Kupolo straps are made of suede. The watches run on Japanese-made Miyota GL26 movement designed specifically for slim cases. The case is protected with solid crystal mineral glass and has 5 ATM water resistance.Case Diameter: Kupolo - 42 mm | Amfiteatro - 36 mm Case Thickness: Kupolo - 9 mm | Amfiteatro - 7 mmBand Material: Suede Band Width: Kupolo - 20 mm | Amfiteatro - 16 mm Total Weight: 50 gram (Kupolo) / 35 gram (Amfiteatro)Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel Crystal: Mineral GlassMovement: Miyota Quartz Movement GL26 SlimWater Resistant: 5 ATM Social media is a great tool to influence the outcome of the final success. If you dig our concept, share our vision, support our philosophy and like our watches, please, tell your friends by sharing it with them on your social pages. Together, we'll be able to extend the reach of the CONTEMPUS design to every corner of the world, letting more people know about our watches!INSTAGRAM: instagram.com/contemp.usFACEBOOK: facebook.com/contempus.watches TWITTER: twitter.com/contemp_us  Hi-Hi-res images of CONTEMPUS' second series are always available on our Dropbox page. Feel free to use them if you're a journalist, blogger or just like our watches! If you have any press inquiries or any other questions, feel free to contact us: hello@contemp.us

story:
What I am doing…

Hey there! You know me, but for those of you who don’t, I am Natalie, and I am the founder of The Crybaby Club. I am just going to be honest with you, I am attempting to raise funds so I can continue doing what I love, and as a result of that, I get to continue making quality products that you want to buy which in turns, helps me continue doing what I love.
It is a circle y’all, it is a circle. :)

Right now, as far as the business aspect of the club goes, I operate alone, and I front any costs for sustaining The Club upfront. That is extremely nerve-wracking, as you can imagine, so I wanted to switch it up this time and ask for some support up front.

I want to make new pins, and I also want to be able to branch out and offer some new products like water bottles, tees, etc. These things have a higher front cost, and that is why I am here.
Will you help me do this?
GREAT!!! I knew I could count on you.


What I Need…

Plain and simple, I need donations in order to make new products.
 

What You Get…

Any and all donations are so welcome and appreciated, but to show our appreciation…
If you donate $15 you will get a free pin
If you donate $25 you will get a free pin and a tee
If you donate $30+, you will get a pin, a tee, an a small thank you package on top of my undying love and gratitude.
 

The Impact...

The business/financial side of this has never been the main factor in what I do, but in order for me to be able to keep the community/giving back/making a difference side going, I cannot act like it isn't important. The Crybaby Club started as a small side passion project on my living room floor, hand drawing membership cards until my fingers cramped. I wanted sensitive people to know that it was ok to be sensitive. I wanted to talk about mental illness, emotions, women’s rights and more in an open, honest, non judgmental space. I wanted to stand against the stigmas attached to being a “crybaby”. I just wanted to make a difference. As I type this right now, we have 20,000 members worldwide. I receive emails daily about how what I am doing has helped someone feel better about themselves, more secure in who they are, braver and less afraid to emote. That is the impact. That is why I do this.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

TELL PEOPLE!
Tell your mama, tell daddy, tell that cool kid on the bus, tell your friends, tell their friends, tell that rich guy your BFF dated for 3 weeks.
You can help by spreading the word.

 

Thank you for stopping by.
You are cute and capable and loved.
xo Natalie c/o The Crybaby Club

story:
How to attach Rhevon Flash wallet:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

Risks & Challenges

This is our second run of manufacturing a product. We have planned as best we could about order fulfillment, shipping, and production timeline, but ultimately we have not experienced these things on a large scale. For most of these challenges, our small but dedicated team will simply have to work through them as they come. We've come this far and will not quit until everyone who wants a Rhevon Flash has one!

In terms of production and timing, we already have everything lined up. We are simply a phone call away from having thousands of parts on our doorstep in a three to six month timeframe. From there, we assemble and test every wallet ourselves. However, there are always unplanned barriers and we recognize that we depend our manufacturers' and suppliers' schedules.

In the event that we get an overwhelming amount of orders and cannot possibly assemble them all in time, we have identified a few services capable of helping us with assembly and shipping. We already completed a small product run. The total production time from order to finished products was roughly 2.5 months. We are confident that we can match or improve on this time, so our delivery date of October 2019 is absolutely within reach.

story:
The ocean is our planet’s life support system. It is the provider of food, recreation, transport and even the oxygen we breathe – and to lose this is too big of a cost. The Ocean relies on nature and we want to do all we can to help protect it.

 

Over a few years now I was wondering what I can do in order to help our oceans?

Together with my team we've developed an idea to use clothing with simple designs and engaging messages as a medium to raise the awareness of the threats to the ocean marine life. That’s how the idea of Esprit Profond was born. In French it means “deep spirit”.

Every design we use, has a story behind. We want to inspire global community to become ocean aware by increasing its understanding, wonder and appreciation for our oceans.

 

Starting our project on the World Whale day, we devoted our first collection to the giants of the abyss.

For adults we have prepared 3 designs; "Sleeping Giants" has an educational goal, providing knowledge about resting position of Sperm Whales. "Ocean Plastic" is demonstrating plastic pollution and its effect on marine animals. "Life confinement" is bringing into light the problem of Orcas in captivity.

Sleeping Giants

Sperm whales rest by drifting vertically under the sea surface. They sleep only about 2h a day—much less than any other mammal. They begin their sleep at around 20 meters depth, turning their giant bodies up towards the surface. Slowly drifting while sleeping, they reach the surface for the next breath of air. During the day they do several 10 to 15 minute naps like this. Whales are voluntary breathers, which means that they need to think about every breath they take, 24/7.

 

Plastic Ocean

Plastic accumulating in our oceans and on our beaches has become a global crisis. At current rates plastic is expected to outweigh all the fish in the sea by 2050. Hundreds of thousands of marine animals swallow plastic every year. Plastic ingestion reduces the storage volume of the stomach, causing starvation. Dead animals are often found with stomachs full of plastic. Micro plastic is found broadly in fish meat, ending up in our plates. What is the solution? Recycling and reuse of plastic products, together with support for research and innovation to develop new products to replace single-use plastics.

 

Life confinement

Multiple Orcas are held in aquariums for amusement shows. Not having enough space they need, their life expectancy is 2-3 times shorter than in the wilderness. Living in captivity causes Orca’s impressive dorsal fin to collapse and induces a lot of stress, which increases their aggression and creates health problems. Help them with signing one of the petitions against aquarium shows!

 

100% NATURAL MATERIALS

Our t-shirts are made of 100% natural materials, from organic-certified soft cotton. As the world's fashion industry is dominated by synthetic fibres (up to 60%), this is pretty unique.

BASIC, LONG LASTING DESIGN

These t-shirts are made to last.

6 COLOURS, 7 SIZES FOR ADULTS

Esprit Profond t-shirt is light and smart, which makes it suitable for many occasions. Both female and male models are available in 6 colours (Vintage White, Grey, Sky Blue, Royal Blue, Indigo, Burgundy) and 7 sizes: XXS,XS,S,M,L,XL,XXL.

Check the size table (image gallery at the top of the page) to be sure which size to chose.

 

A specialised youth line will help children and young people to understand what makes our ocean so incredible.

Our first kids collection is presented in two designs: "Whales", which shows different whales with a comparison by size, and "Ocean message", speaking about the problematic of marine life distinction.

Whales

Do you know all the whales on your t-shirt? Here are some quick facts about them. Narwhal whale; size: 5.1m, living up to 50 years, where to find: Arctic, Greenland, Canada, Russia. Minke whale; size: 5.5m, living up to 30-50 years, where to find: Antarctic. Killer Whale (Orca); size: 6-8m, living up to 50-80 years, where to find: Iceland, Norway, New Zealand, North-East Pacific. Humpback whale; size: 15-16m, living up to 45-50 years, where to find: North Pacific, Atlantic, Antarctic, Indian Ocean. Sperm Whale; size: 16m, living up to 60-70 years, where to find: Azores, Dominica, Mediterranean sea, Asia.

 

Ocean Message

Our planet is experiencing a mass extinction — sixth time in Earth's history. Habitat loss, hotter oceans, and climate change drive animal populations down at unprecedented rates. Human activities are to blame: pollution, farming and deforestation are destroying natural habitats, while carbon emissions are causing the oceans to warm. Our hopes lie on next generation. We have to educate our kids to be aware of these issues and try to make a difference for our planet.

 

4 COLOURS, 5 SIZES FOR KIDS

Esprit Profond youth line is presented in kids t-shirts and baby bodysuits. Both girls and boys models are available in 4 colours (Cream, Caribbean, Sage, Serene Blue) and 5 sizes: 3-4 years, 5-6 years, 7-8 years, 9-11 years, 12-14 years.

Baby bodysuits are available in 4 colours (Natural, Mint, Lavender, Grey) and 4 sizes: 0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 12-18 months.

Check the size table (image gallery at the top of the page) to be sure which size to chose.

 

Having a goal to protect marine animals and environment, a percentage from our sales will go towards supporting marine conservation organizations.

Be the first to order your Esprit Profond t-shirt, at a great discovery price! Delivery will be in May 2021 at the latest.

All money received from your pre-orders will be used to cover part of the production costs, estimated at 3'000€.

If you cannot support us financially, you can still help us and our project by sharing this on facebook or by email with your friends and by simply talking about Esprit Profond around you!

Huge thanks for your support!!!

Together we can make a difference for our oceans!

See you in the blue!
