story:
Americans purchase nearly 20 billion items of clothing per year.

That’s 68 garments and 7 pairs of shoes per person!

But out of all of that clothing, 98 percent of it is made overseas.


My name is Kathryn Hilderbrand and I’m a designer, tailor and entrepreneur who has seen the entire landscape of apparel manufacturing change. This campaign is my way of combating the negative effects of fast fashion by supporting independent designers and local job creation.



Since the early 1990’s I have owned tailoring shops on Cape Cod and in Northern Virginia. Early on, business was booming and my customers knew the value of getting their clothes mended. Rarely was a garment thrown away simply because of a hole or a ripped hem.



Then, between 1996 and 2011, I watched more than half a million American garment manufacturing jobs vanish. The “fast fashion” phenomenon began to sweep the industry as clothing production was outsourced to cheaper labor overseas.


Fast forward to today and we’re seeing a revival. The Made in the USA movement is slowly but surely gaining momentum thanks to industry pioneers and consumers who value quality, ethics and voting with their dollars.


To further spark this movement, I’m opening a state-of-the-art apparel manufacturing facility in Massachusetts.


As a tailor with high standards and as the designer of an emerging eco-fashion label, I understand the need for quality craftsmanship that is available locally. The option of small production runs is crucial to the success of startup clothing companies and those facilities are hard to come by. As I looked for a place to manufacture my own label, I realized I could create what I was unable to find.


Enter Good Clothing Company.


At Good Clothing Company, we’ll be offering small runs for new designers, creating local jobs and practicing ethical, sustainable and green production methods in our facility.



Our goal is to help change the face of manufacturing on a local level, but we need your help.


So far, we have three industrial machines, a large work/cutting table, racks and shelves, tailoring tools, and office furniture, but we need to raise additional funds for six more industrial sewing machines so we can hire four more stitchers. We are also in need of an industrial cutter to help us speed up the production process, thus bringing the cost down for our clients and new designers.


Good Clothing Company:


  • Provides an alternative to overseas manufacturing

  • Helps small, independent designers grow their businesses

  • Creates well paid jobs in the U.S.

  • Supports local and national economic growth

  • Reinvigorates a historically American industry

  • Commits to sustainability and ethics


The truth is, whether you’re a designer, an activist or a concerned citizen, we’re all consumers. The way our clothing is made affects all of us. By supporting ethical clothing production you are additionally supporting:


  • job creation

  • local economies

  • entrepreneurship

  • innovation in green production methods

  • recycling and waste reduction initiatives

  • small batch production

  • business transparency


I’m sure you’ve heard it before, but when it comes to fundraising every single dollar makes a difference.

Each dollar brings us closer to our goal - building a strong sustainable facility, creating opportunities for designers and stitchers, changing the industry on a grassroots level and keeping this trade alive!


And as a token of our appreciation for supporting this venture, we’re offering some awesome perks!





The last thing I’ll ask of you…


Please share! We’re going to raise our goal through people like you who spread the word about our campaign.


Here are a few simple tweets and Facebook posts that you can copy and paste right onto your own page:


Facebook:


The way clothing is made affects all of us. I support Kathryn Hilderbrand’s campaign for ethical and sustainable manufacturing with Good Clothing Company. http://bit.ly/1IzlF7D


Voting with my dollars by supporting Kathryn Hilderbrand and Good Clothing Company. Here’s to changing the fashion industry with ethical manufacturing. http://bit.ly/1IzlF7D


As an independent designer, I depend on ethical and sustainable manufacturing in the U.S. Please join me in supporting Good Clothing Company towards the positive future of fashion. http://bit.ly/1IzlF7D


Twitter: 


We’re all consumers. We can do it better. Support ethical apparel production with @GDClothingCo. http://bit.ly/1IzlF7D #madeinusa


I support the #madeinusa movement by backing @GDClothingCo’s campaign for a better fashion industry. http://bit.ly/1IzlF7D #ethicalfashion


---


Thank you for your time, for your support, and for caring about a better future for fashion.


Gratefully,

Kathryn

story:
*Duties, taxes or any collection fees not included.








Calfskin is one of the finest materials available. That's why it's mainly used by luxury brands. We use it because we believe in top quality products.




We believe every wallet should be special and should be different from each other. That's why we keep our leather with a natural finish, that gives each wallet a uniqueness only nature can make. It's like each wallet has its own fingerprint. 
































































Two years ago, my brother and I were looking for a wallet we couldn't find. We decided to join forces and our passion for quality goods to make what we believed to be the best wallets on the market.






Bring comfort and increased productivity into your lives by offering super functional top quality leather goods you can be proud to use.



FAQ:


  • How do I select multiple products?

    To select more than one item please go to https://www.thefrenchieco.com/


  • How do I select a color?

    To select your color please go to https://www.thefrenchieco.com/pages/indiegogo-c... (keep in mind you have to wait about 5 days to do so).


  • Do bills get stuck together in the Frenchie Wallet?

    Bills won't get stuck together as long as you use the wallet properly. We'll post a tutorial showing how to use the wallet.


  • Are colors exactly as they appear here?

    It's very hard to represent the exact color of the real product, specially considering that every screen shows colors differently. However, we tried to show the colors as accurate as possible.


  • Can The Card Holder take cash?

       It can hold up to 10 folded bills. However we think of it as a card holder, not a wallet. We think it shouldn't replace your wallet, it should be a complement (some people barely use cash and might find The Card Holder more convenient than a wallet). It's great for holding business cards or any type of card you need to access quickly.


  • If the Frenchie Wallet, the Card Holder and the Frenchie key are RFID blocking can I still use an access card without having to take it out?

Yes you can!    
    The Frenchie Wallet and the Frenchie Key are RFID blocking on just one side, so you can keep your information secure but still use an access card when needed.
    The Card Holder is RFID blocking on just the middle pocket, so you can use up to two access cards (one on each outer pocket).

  • How long would it take to get my products?

    Since we are working with top quality manufacturers and because all our products are hand made by artisans who put a lot of effort to their work, manufacturing takes more time than regular mass production. For that reason, we estimate 1 to 6 weeks of shipping time. However, if everything goes according to plan we'll be able to ship sooner than that.

  • Do you cover import fees as well as shipping costs?

    We only cover the shipping costs. Import fees and other customs fees are not covered by us.

story:
We’ve worked with the best sock designers, state-of-the-art manufacturers, using the world’s highest quality materials... to make the toughest, snuggest, no-show, no-slip socks EVER.

Our signature Titan Thread makes the sock 100x stronger while still feeling silky smooth. Titan Thread is 15x stronger than steel - so strong, you can lift a 20lb dumbbell with just one strand.

Silicone Heel Webbing is specifically designed to cradle your foot and keep your sock firmly anchored to your heel.  No more slipping socks down your heel.

Our Silver Ionized Antimicrobial Thread blocks 99.95% of odor causing bacteria - minimizing foot odor.

At William Painter, we were tired of all the compromises made in the products we used on daily basis. While other companies are racing to the bottom, we stand for something more. 

We believe everyone deserves to have the best products, with solid customer service that treats you like family.

You live an active life, we make products that can keep up with your adventures. That's why we use the most durable materials and back it up with a lifetime guarantee.

We truly believe that having trusted everyday essentials will enhance your life and inspire you to be more. 

The Titan Sock differentiates itself by combining the best materials, design, and fit to create a sock that you can wear with anything... for any occasion.

“If you are wondering if William Painter creates durable products…check out this video made by Inc. Magazine"

Reaction to  the Titan Thread 

People Who Already Trust William Painter  

You are a person who needs your socks to keep up with both your life and your style. The Titan Sock was re-imagined and re-engineered using state of the art materials and designs. And with our lifetime guarantee, you never have to worry about them during your adventures.

This thread is made from the same materials used in military body armour, cargo nets, and military grade tents. Titan thread is extremely strong (15x stronger than steel), but also deceptively light, pliable, and soft.  

We’ve even tested them to last over 10,000 wears and washes without any holes, frays, or tears. Our socks will last you for life. 

We hate slipping heels. It’s one of those uncomfortable things that can just ruin your day.

That’s why we made sure to make a heel that STICKS to your foot.   

Our special silicone heel webbing won’t leave your foot - making sure you’ll never experience heel slip again.

Silver is a natural antimicrobial agent - meaning it naturally blocks bacteria and fungus. By incorporating ionized silver thread into our socks, we promote better foot health and hygiene.

The socks fight against harmful (and smelly) bacteria and fungal growth in your foot and  even helps lower the risk of athlete’s foot. 

Most “no-show” socks are not truly no-show. They’re created as an afterthought and end up sticking out above your shoe, defeating the purpose of wearing a no-show sock.

We paid extra attention to detail to ensure we created a no-show sock that is absolutely invisible when wearing ANY shoe. 

Our secure stitch technology ensures the sock keeps its shape - even after countless washes. This ensures an optimal fit no matter what.

The Titan Sock is the first no-show sock to feature arch support. The sock forms to the natural curves of your foot - giving you a skin-tight performance fit. Get ready for no-show socks you can run in! 

Our Titan Thread toe cap reinforcement is specifically designed to prevent holes from forming by using thread that is 15X stronger than steel! The toe cap is still supple and soft as silk making it incredibly comfortable to wear. 

Don’t worry about sweaty feet. Our silver antimicrobial thread not only prevents bacteria, but helps regulate temperature by wicking away moisture and heat.   This makes clammy toes a thing of the past.

Our ultra-elastic fit lets our socks stretch to almost any size - making them nearly one size fits all.  Your feet are good to go!

We like to keep things minimal.

So we made sure every pair of Titan Socks match -- no random colors, weird designs, or left and right specific socks. Just clean, minimal, black or white socks.

Just like our all products, we back these socks for life! If they fail you in any way, send them back and we’ll get you a fresh pair! 

 Choose your favorite reward, upgrade your whole closet, and help us bring these amazing socks to life. As a VERY SPECIAL THANK YOU... we will give you the BEST possible price!  Not to mention, you will have The Titan Sock before anyone else. Join the family today! #FamilyPorVida 

OUR JOURNEY

We have built our business on making trusted products, and we back them up with a lifetime guarantee. We want the best of everything and making quality products that you can trust is our mission. We pride ourselves on making the best products, using the best materials, while having the best customer service that treats you like family.

It all started with sunglasses and we turned the sunglass industry upside down by making and offering premium quality, nearly indestructible, lifetime guaranteed sunglasses. They are darn good sunglasses and are trusted and worn by celebrities, adventurers, and people just like you all around the world. People who truly care about looking great while maintaining quality, durability, and reliability. 

Our sock closet was a total disaster. Almost none of the socks matched (the dogs and washing machines keep stealing our socks). In addition, many of the socks have holes in the toes.  

This bothered us so much, so we set out to design the perfect sock. We teamed up with the best sock designers in the world, sourced the best materials, and have created the best no-show sock in the world. We built William Painter to deliver truly the best products, and we back up our amazing quality with a lifetime guarantee. We are absolutely 100% confident that these are the best socks in the world. 


  Each pair we make has a classic style with rugged durability to be able to handle life’s adventures. Our socks are uncompromising in build quality are backed up by the best customer service on the planet. Guaranteed.

We teamed up with the best sock designers in the world, sourced the best materials, and have created the best no-show sock in the world. story:
My Story

My name is Danesha Anglin and I am first generation Jamaican-American. I am the youngest of 11 children and out of all of us I have always been the one to take "risks" and just do whatever my heart desires because I do not believe in failure, only lessons, hence this new adventure.

I attended the University of Florida (Go Gators) where I earned my Bachelors in Special Education and Masters in Early Childhood Education. After graduating I taught kindergarten for 5.5 years and in January 2020 I made a huge leap of faith and closed that door and started a new journey. I am currently a Flight Attendant-- as of today I am now furloughed along with 8,099 others and will have to wait on my company to do recalls, whenever that may be. I had already been saving slowly but surely to start this business. After finding out that I was indeed going to be looking at a possible furlough a couple months ago I decided that I would reach out to my community for some support. I was nervous, but after I told some of my close friends they encouraged me and reassured me that there were others out there like them who would love to support my next journey-- my OWN CLOTHING LINE! 

Back in January 2014 I bought my very first sewing machine. My friend kept hearing me mention how I thought it would be “cool” to make my own clothes and I was certain I could teach myself. He then encouraged me to purchase a “starter” machine and give it a try. I got it and I just went for it. YouTube, Google and eventually a sewing community on IG helped me to learn a lot. I made my first full matching athletic set in 2019 as I got serious about my fitness, being cute while getting fit became a priority. I noticed that when I loved the way my workout clothes fit and looked I felt more confident in the gym. After buying lots of athletic sets from different brands I noticed things that I loved about certain sets and things I wish others had so I started with a pattern and tweaked it to make something I loved.

After I made that set and shared it I had countless people ask me to make them a set but I knew that sewing for hire doesn't bring me joy however seeing others in something I made does! So here we are, I am finally doing it, sharing my work with others just in a different way. Receiving support from all of you will make it possible for me to hire a project manager who I have already found. She will connect me with a pattern designer who will bring my designs to life in paper form. Then I will have a grader who will turn my patterns into multiple sizes and after that I will get samples made then take pre-orders! Once the campaign is complete and fully funded this project I will keep you all updated via a weekly newsletter that you will be able to opt into. Thank you for taking the time to support me in this next chapter.

 

Funding

  • Business LLC
  • Project Manager (Stellar Fashion Consulting) 
  • Pattern Designer 
  • Pattern Grader
  • Samples
  • Production
  • Marketing/ Promo shoot 
  • Website Design 

I will be releasing pre-orders to my backers first before the general public. I appreciate every single one of you for supporting me in this new endeavour. 

Risks & Challenges

Since this is a new venture for me I will hire an expert who knows how to navigate any challenges and risks that may appear during this process. Here are just a few of the services that will be included when I hire Stellar Fashion Consulting:

SFC will manage the development, merchandising and production managment for the 6 activewear styles.

Collaborate with me as a designer to establish brand identity.

Create a merchandising matrix.

Financial Plan – establish budget, target margin range and retail pricing.

Source raw materials including fabrics, trims, labels and packaging.

Oversee pattern and sample making.

 A Time & Action Calendar will be created to establish key product development and production milestones and dates to ensure on time delivery.

Facilitate and manage all pre-production activities including fittings and raw material ordering.

Management of production process - daily communication with factories and visits as needed.

Weekly calls with me to review development and production status.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for taking the time to read my proposal because that in itself is an investment in me. I do want to ask one more favor of you-- please please please share share share! I would love to reach those who are willing to support simply based off of my story and their relationship with you all. Thank you for assisting me in making my dreams become reality!

Once the campaign is complete and fully funded this project I will keep you all updated via a weekly newsletter that you will be able to opt into. Thank you for taking the time to support me in this next chapter. Funding

Business LLC
Project Manager (Stellar Fashion Consulting) 
Pattern Designer 
Pattern Grader
Samples
Production
Marketing/ Promo shoot 
Website Design 

I will be releasing pre-orders to my backers first before the general public. I appreciate every single one of you for supporting me in this new endeavour. 
Risks & Challenges
Since this is a new venture for me I will hire an expert who knows how to navigate any challenges and risks that may appear during this process. Here are just a few of the services that will be included when I hire Stellar Fashion Consulting:
SFC will manage the development, merchandising and production managment for the 6 activewear styles.
Collaborate with me as a designer to establish brand identity.
Create a merchandising matrix.
Financial Plan – establish budget, target margin range and retail pricing.
Source raw materials including fabrics, trims, labels and packaging.
Oversee pattern and sample making.
 A Time & Action Calendar will be created to establish key product development and production milestones and dates to ensure on time delivery.
Facilitate and manage all pre-production activities including fittings and raw material ordering.
Management of production process - daily communication with factories and visits as needed.
Weekly calls with me to review development and production status.
Other Ways You Can Help
Thank you for taking the time to read my proposal because that in itself is an investment in me. I do want to ask one more favor of you-- please please please share share share! I would love to reach those who are willing to support simply based off of my story and their relationship with you all. Thank you for assisting me in making my dreams become reality!

Materials

  •  Leather Type: Full Grain 
  •  Sourced From: Florence, Italy
  •  Tanning Process: Vegetable Tanned
  •  Clasp Material: Stainless Steel
  •  Watch Connector Material: Stainless Steel
 

Small Wrist Compatibility

  •  38mm: Apple Watch Series 1, Series 2 and Series 3
  •  40mm: Apple Watch Series 4

Large Wrist Compatibility

  •  42mm: Apple Watch Series 1, Series 2 and Series 3
  •  44mm: Apple Watch Series 4
 

Main Features

  •  Custom Hardware: Works with any Apple Watch
  •  Band Retainer: Single loop to hold down the strap
  •  Classic Clasp: Symmetrical oval shaped comfort clasp
  •  Burnished Edges: Leather sealed and strengthened from all sides 
 

Colour Combinations

  •  Black - Black Strap

Frequently Asked Questions

story:
The 10x10 Mud Challenge is hosted by the Nka Foundation’s design-build series, which offers an exchange between young creative practitioners who want to think about their work as it relates to our interconnected world and the local residents of an underdeveloped region. The goal of the challenge is to design and build a shelter to suggest a relationship between art and architecture by maximum use of local materials. The built environment should prove to be durable and serve as an example for the village that an earthen building can be both contemporary and withstand the natural elements over time. 

The local perception is that mud buildings are only for the very poor. However, their belief is not unfounded. The local community has many examples of cob constructions which have eroded over time due to poor construction and water damage. My design, the Modern Mud Hut seeks to solve this problem by combining modern construction techniques with local materials and building practices to create a unique and durable blend of art and architecture.  

The construction of the project will last from four weeks to six weeks, during which time my design team will work side-by-side with local artisans to experience how a design problem, budget and site-specific dynamics such as materials, indigenous technologies and community can provoke resourceful thinking and hybridization. 


Although there are many risks involved in the construction of a project of this type, the benefits of the outcome far outweigh them.  We will be faced with challenges as simple as communication all the way to technical and construction delays, such as injuries, inclement weather and tool malfunctions.  However, as we can foresee such difficulties ahead of time as a natural part of the process, we have prepared some fail-safes to keep the project moving.  One such example is a pre-translated construction manual that diagrammatically illustrates the process, and translates some key steps into the native language of the villagers, Twi.  This will ensure that lack of proper communication is not a hindrance in the future.

story:
Short Summery

Since I was the age of 4 years old, my dad put me on a motorcycle and I never wanted to get off. At the age of 6, I moved from Enduro Racing to Motocross and from that day on, I knew this was my dream. I went to school during the week, and races every weekend, that I can remember, in places all over the state of Arkansas. Over the years, I was lucky enough to have a family that took me to surrounding states for races in Oklahoma and Texas, Louisiana, Georgia, Alabama, you name it as the list goes on. I’ve also got to race in Las Vegas for the US Open at the age of 8. That was an experience of a lifetime to be surrounded by professional motorcross riders I only dreamt of meeting.

Lots of broken bones and bruises later, I was given the nickname Crashton. I then began to believe I was indestructible. 

In 2005, I then went on to race my first Loretta Lynn’s Amateur Motocross Championship. I finally saw a future for myself. I believed I could reach my dreams as I was heading in the right direction. 

However, shortly after my first Championship race, I was to have a crash in which led to my first collar bone brake, the right one to be exact. Little did I know, this would be the crash that was only the beginning of a string of bad injuries, one after the other. This one in particular left me unable to ride for about 3 months. Once I recovered, I was back to riding and had a crash that left me with a broken hand. I attempted to race with a broken hand as I was determined to qualify for the 2007 Loretta Lynn race. Unfortunately, I could not get the start I hoped for to make it as a top 6 competitor, which is the last position they will take from each race class to go to the championships.

Following, I was to upgrade to a bigger bike. I trained for the next year or so, entering all of the local races I could. In January 2010, I had the opportunity to train with Chris Brennan in California for a month. This was to prepare me for the Spring Nationals in March. During my first warm up race back in Texas, and some bad luck, I wrecked which left me with another broken collar bone, my left side this time. My collar bone was shattered, I required a plate and 8 screws be put in. This left me unable to ride for about 4 months. However, once I was given the green light to ride again, I did. 

I was offered a Sponsorship from the team, Aldridge motorsports. My first race took place at the Freestone Raceway in Texas. I ended up getting hit from behind and broke my right collar bone for the second time, this time getting another plate and 6 screws put in. I also had someone else’s bone marrow put in to spark the dead bone. At a check up with the doctor for this injury, I was told I may not be able to ride ever again. Hearing those words broke my heart, I was devastated. My bone did not start growing until 4 months after the surgery I had. Leaving me unable to race for a year, I could not get motocross off my mind. I was not done yet, despite what the doctor said. From 2011 to 2012, I rode for fun while training hard core a bit here and there however I was 18 by then and could not expect my parents to financially support me any longer. My parents have already given up to much for my dreams so I wanted to find a way to do it on my own. I moved to Australia with my sister for a couple of months to work and clear my head. I found a good job to make money whilst finding my own way. I then decided it was time to go back to the states and give it another try as I don’t believe I should give up just yet no matter my age. I have been working for my father ever since, riding as much as I can. 

I am still chasing my dream no matter what it takes, however, I am finding it hard to do so financially on my own. I am now asking for donations from my friends and family to sponsor my racing career so I can get to where I have always wanted. I am currently training harder than ever as I believe 2015 can be my year. I promise to every person that donates towards my dreams, I will remember always and think of you as my sponsor no matter how little the donation as I believe every little bit can help. 

Once I make it, I will send you an autographed picture ;) 

Thank you for taking the time to read my story, and please if you could share this with your family and friends as well as keep me in your prayers, I would be very grateful for this.

Sincerely,

Ashton (Crashton) FitzGibbon, # 42

“I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.”

2 Timothy 4:7

story:
What Is Nightshift Clothing?

Nightshift Clothing was created to give people a unique style that portrays their nightlife mentality and expresses our passion and creativity in designing clothing that represents our brand.

To put it simply, we are a couple of college students looking to take our love for fashion and music and combine them into one. We have a great passion for the movement we have started and we strongly want to continue to build it as much as we can.

Your contributions towards pre-ordering greatly assist our efforts and put us on the right path to spread our brand and gain more exposure as a small business.

Why Take Part & Pre-Order?

All funding for this project will go straight into printing the shirts. This is your quick and easy opportunity to pre-order our new collection of nightlife-oriented apparel. 

The four winning designs, pictured above, were voted on by our growing community.

Already cheaper than your standard price of shirts at a store like Pacsun or Zumiez, you get your own selection of much higher quality-made t-shirts! Printed on American Apparel, you are sure to get the best of the best.

FREE SHIPPING INCLUDED IN ALL PERK PACKAGES

Our good friends at AIRIA are a brand new company that create completely custom, hand-painted sunglasses. You can receive your very own pair of the above model, called the "Tux" ($25 value), when you purchase the OnTheNightshift Pack.

The Impact of Your Participation

Thus far, all customers have had complete satisfaction with Nightshift Clothing products. We look to continue that reputation.

Being college students, your participation keeps us going and opens doors for us to extend the movement and pursue greater opportunities. 

FAQ: Located Below Images

A collection of some recognized electronic artists currently supporting Nightshift:

              NIGHTSHIFT CLOTHING - REINVENTING YOUR NIGHTLIFE EXPERIENCE

FAQ:

1) When can I expect to see my perk packages?

Once the funding campaign ends (February 16) we will instantly have the shirts printed. Normal turnaround is 8-12 days (due to the American Apparel quality). Once this process is completed, we will immediately ship out all perk packages and you can expect them within 3-5 days after that if you live in the U.S.

2) What designs will I be able to chose from if I invest?

Once the funding campaign ends (February 16) we will contact you and ask you which design(s) you would like.

3) Do you ship outside the U.S.?

Yes. A large amount of past orders have come from Canada and Europe. We would like to spread to as many people as possible!

4) What happens if you don't reach your goal?

Should our goal of $2500 not be reached, all pre-orders will still be honored.

Additional/Other Assistance

Any and all support we receive with this campaign is greatly appreciated. Please forward and share this with as many people as you can! We have a good start on things and see great potential to make Nightshift Clothing a very respectable clothing line.

Also, for those interested, Nightshift is a quickly growing EDM (Electronic Dance Music) blog that has become a reliable source for all the newest tracks from some of the biggest names in the business. What sets Nightshift apart from the rest of the blogs is the fact that a large amount of up-and-coming artists that are otherwise difficult to locate also make it onto the pages of our site so that exposure towards their talent can be recognized as well.

Click Here to Visit Our Website :: http://www.nightshiftclothing.com

#OwnTheNight - #OnTheNightshift - Rep It Well, Rep It Often

story:
What is the Angel Hair Technique?

Angel Hair is an innovative new technique for decorating surfaces with precious and semi-precious metals. Every angel hair design begins with an individual strand of precious metal about one-third the thickness of the average human hair. The metal is a highly polished perfectly round surface and 24k in purity.

Each delicate strand of precious metal angel hair is intricately ‘woven’ with extremely high precision and accuracy. The assembly process consists of metal forming and direct metal connections in the form of precisely shaped loops. The image is fabricated on top of another precious metal surface (either 24K gold or silver) and built up one strand at a time into a sophisticated final image.

The Angel Hair technique enables the creation of an unlimited variety of beautifully sculptured surfaces that capture and illuminate the intricate detail of each design, by using 24K pure gold or other precious metals. This results in more surface area that is exposed to light, increasing the reflective luminance vs. traditional techniques such as embossing or gold leaf.

Current available angel hair metal strand types are:

  • 24K Gold
  • 24K Silver
  • 24K Copper

* Optional: 24K Palladium anti-tarnish coating on copper or silver.

Current available base plate types

    • 24K gold plated surface
    • 24K silver plated surface

over a variety of base metal (ex. stainless steel, copper, nickel )

This technique can be applied to any kind of picture or vision (eg. watch faces, framed artworks, pendants, trophy's, paper-weights etc.) We encourage you to glance at our image gallery to see examples of how this fantastic quality art-form can be customized.

Our Company

Our company name is Angel Hair Gold, and we have full access to the above mentioned angel hair technique; as well as a generous supply of available product(s).

Our company vision is to expand, and make this unique product and technique available to the general public. Through the advanced innovative angel hair technique high quality metals are woven into high quality designs. Due to the unique almost string like nature of these woven metals, their actual physical weights remain low. Thus, leaving a stunning high quality product at a very lucrative price point (wholesale & retail.)

There is no limit, any picture, any symbol, any form of art can be uniquely integrated with high quality 24k gold, silver or copper; creating unique one of a kind visuals. We envision not only an array of Angel Hair Gold products and designs; but also wholesale and partnership opportunities on an international scale.


Why are we on Indiegogo?

Angel Hair Gold is going public, in order to facilitate this process; we have made our products and services available to customers through Indiegogo. Providing us a platform in which we can generate additional capital to meet all the neccessary costs of hitting the main stream market. We currently have the resources and supplies to meet consumer demand for high quality custom designs (see Perks.) However we would like to take it to the next level, this of course requires more funding and more resources.

We have placed this campaign on Indiegogo to accomplish three main goals:

1) Generate funding:

We would like to generate some additional capital in order to invest in the essential tools necessary to make our business and products public (e.g.  precious metals, company website development, online store, full color catalogue, marketing campaigns etc.)

2) Advertise our product:

While the purpose of this campaign is of course to generate profits, the Perks are simply our products for sale. Priced to encourage your investment and riddled with bonus goodies such as the blanket 10% off code included with most product Perks. Our products are not yet in stores, and are not available under our brand name anywhere else. Take this opportunity to be one of the first to possess a unique Angel Hair Gold product.

3) Inform/generate potential wholesalers and partnership opportunities:

That is correct, because we have been able to establish such a lucrative price point for these high quality goods; we have decided to offer wholesale and partnership opportunities. Whether you are interested in carrying our brand name, or creating/integrating your own; our resources, supplies and innovative techniques are at your disposal.

We want to offer this unique process as a money making opportunity for all, offering high, realistic retail profit gains. We intend to offer a very lucrative wholesale platform that extends the purchaser an opportunity to become their own business owners; or partner up with us for meaningful gain. Best part is we do all the heavy work, individuals can easily sell our products in store, online, or from home. We also intend to team up with charitable organizations and causes, providing them with special non-profit pricing; allowing charities to sell high quality products for high volume profits, furthering their respective cause.

 

What next? (What will we do with your contributions?)

We are a unique Indiegogo campaign, because our Perks are not just related trinkets. They are in fact our actual products, fully customizable and of very high quality. Contributing to our campaign not only grants you great quality product(s); it also helps to facilitate our future growth.

At the end of our campaign depending on how well we have reached (or hopefully exceeded) our goal, our first company action will be to fully develop our public website and virtual catalog(s). We will contact all individuals who believed in our cause and our product here in these beginning stages, not only to inform them that we are up and running; but to extend an extra surprise gift for believing in us!

Creating an intricate smooth flowing business model, allowing for wholesale, partnership and retail opportunities requires a variety of different resources and services. Angel Hair Gold, has already put most of what it has into acquiring the access to these unique products and techniques. Now we are asking for your help, not only with being one of the first to enjoy and cherish our products; but to help us continue to expand our dream!

How do the Perks work?

The Perks are pretty simple; for the most part they are our products for sale. Simply choose your desired product, pay the associated Perk price and we will contact you immediately. At this point we will ask you a few style related questions in regards to color and layout depending on the product. We will then proceed to request that you send us the image you would like woven into your design as 24k gold or silver. We will draft a final design and send it back for your approval; following this your product will be shipped

Here are the important factors to note relating to our Perk products:

Shipping & Policies

  • Your product(s) will be shipped out immediately after image confirmation
  • Regular mail shipping (worldwide) is included in Perk costs (express shipping available at an additional cost)
  • Angel Hair Gold has a full damaged goods and product defect return policy (contact us to make arrangements)
  • It is important to note all plates should remain in designated casing; removal of plate from casing voids return policy
  • Discount cards cannot be combined, and can not be applied to Perk orders (no expiry date, no purchase minimums applied to cards )
  • All 10% discount codes will be emailed out within 48 hours of Perk purchase (cannot be used on Perk purchases)
  • Every Angel Hair Gold product will include a certificate of authenticity (precious metal quality)

  Perks Process

  • Customer may choose any image of any complexity for face plate design (Indiegogo campaign special)
  • Customization and precious metal changes are simple (choose your Perk and simply attach a message request for special customization or precious metal change; if any additional costs are involved we will advise shortly)
  • All items are available in bigger sizes and alternative materials, simply request after Perk purchase and we will advise of availability and cost
  • If an individual would like to make a non-perk related order simply contact us

Each delicate strand of precious metal angel hair is intricately ‘woven’ with extremely high precision and accuracy. The assembly process consists of metal forming and direct metal connections in the form of precisely shaped loops. The image is fabricated on top of another precious metal surface (either 24K gold or silver) and built up one strand at a time into a sophisticated final image.
The Angel Hair technique enables the creation of an unlimited variety of beautifully sculptured surfaces that capture and illuminate the intricate detail of each design, by using 24K pure gold or other precious metals. This results in more surface area that is exposed to light, increasing the reflective luminance vs. traditional techniques such as embossing or gold leaf.
Current available angel hair metal strand types are: 

24K Gold
24K Silver
24K Copper
* Optional: 24K Palladium anti-tarnish coating on copper or silver.
Current available base plate types

24K gold plated surface
24K silver plated surface
over a variety of base metal (ex. stainless steel, copper, nickel )
This technique can be applied to any kind of picture or vision (eg. watch faces, framed artworks, pendants, trophy's, paper-weights etc.) We encourage you to glance at our image gallery to see examples of how this fantastic quality art-form can be customized.
Our Company
Our company name is Angel Hair Gold, and we have full access to the above mentioned angel hair technique; as well as a generous supply of available product(s).
Our company vision is to expand, and make this unique product and technique available to the general public. Through the advanced innovative angel hair technique high quality metals are woven into high quality designs. Due to the unique almost string like nature of these woven metals, their actual physical weights remain low. Thus, leaving a stunning high quality product at a very lucrative price point (wholesale & retail.)
There is no limit, any picture, any symbol, any form of art can be uniquely integrated with high quality 24k gold, silver or copper; creating unique one of a kind visuals. We envision not only an array of Angel Hair Gold products and designs; but also wholesale and partnership opportunities on an international scale.
Why are we on Indiegogo?
Angel Hair Gold is going public, in order to facilitate this process; we have made our products and services available to customers through Indiegogo. Providing us a platform in which we can generate additional capital to meet all the neccessary costs of hitting the main stream market. We currently have the resources and supplies to meet consumer demand for high quality custom designs (see Perks.) However we would like to take it to the next level, this of course requires more funding and more resources.
We have placed this campaign on Indiegogo to accomplish three main goals:
1) Generate funding:
We would like to generate some additional capital in order to invest in the essential tools necessary to make our business and products public (e.g.  precious metals, company website development, online store, full color catalogue, marketing campaigns etc.)
2) Advertise our product:
While the purpose of this campaign is of course to generate profits, the Perks are simply our products for sale. Priced to encourage your investment and riddled with bonus goodies such as the blanket 10% off code included with most product Perks. Our products are not yet in stores, and are not available under our brand name anywhere else. Take this opportunity to be one of the first to possess a unique Angel Hair Gold product.
3) Inform/generate potential wholesalers and partnership opportunities:
That is correct, because we have been able to establish such a lucrative price point for these high quality goods; we have decided to offer wholesale and partnership opportunities. Whether you are interested in carrying our brand name, or creating/integrating your own; our resources, supplies and innovative techniques are at your disposal.
We want to offer this unique process as a money making opportunity for all, offering high, realistic retail profit gains. We intend to offer a very lucrative wholesale platform that extends the purchaser an opportunity to become their own business owners; or partner up with us for meaningful gain. Best part is we do all the heavy work, individuals can easily sell our products in store, online, or from home. We also intend to team up with charitable organizations and causes, providing them with special non-profit pricing; allowing charities to sell high quality products for high volume profits, furthering their respective cause.
 
What next? (What will we do with your contributions?)
We are a unique Indiegogo campaign, because our Perks are not just related trinkets. They are in fact our actual products, fully customizable and of very high quality. Contributing to our campaign not only grants you great quality product(s); it also helps to facilitate our future growth.
At the end of our campaign depending on how well we have reached (or hopefully exceeded) our goal, our first company action will be to fully develop our public website and virtual catalog(s). We will contact all individuals who believed in our cause and our product here in these beginning stages, not only to inform them that we are up and running; but to extend an extra surprise gift for believing in us!
Creating an intricate smooth flowing business model, allowing for wholesale, partnership and retail opportunities requires a variety of different resources and services. Angel Hair Gold, has already put most of what it has into acquiring the access to these unique products and techniques. Now we are asking for your help, not only with being one of the first to enjoy and cherish our products; but to help us continue to expand our dream!
How do the Perks work?
The Perks are pretty simple; for the most part they are our products for sale. Simply choose your desired product, pay the associated Perk price and we will contact you immediately. At this point we will ask you a few style related questions in regards to color and layout depending on the product. We will then proceed to request that you send us the image you would like woven into your design as 24k gold or silver. We will draft a final design and send it back for your approval; following this your product will be shipped
Here are the important factors to note relating to our Perk products:
Shipping & Policies

Your product(s) will be shipped out immediately after image confirmation
Regular mail shipping (worldwide) is included in Perk costs (express shipping available at an additional cost)
Angel Hair Gold has a full damaged goods and product defect return policy (contact us to make arrangements)
It is important to note all plates should remain in designated casing; removal of plate from casing voids return policy
Discount cards cannot be combined, and can not be applied to Perk orders (no expiry date, no purchase minimums applied to cards )
All 10% discount codes will be emailed out within 48 hours of Perk purchase (cannot be used on Perk purchases)
Every Angel Hair Gold product will include a certificate of authenticity (precious metal quality)
  Perks Process

Customer may choose any image of any complexity for face plate design (Indiegogo campaign special)
Customization and precious metal changes are simple (choose your Perk and simply attach a message request for special customization or precious metal change; if any additional costs are involved we will advise shortly)
All items are available in bigger sizes and alternative materials, simply request after Perk purchase and we will advise of availability and cost
If an individual would like to make a non-perk related order simply contact us

story:
Green solution with the ultimate portable sound

Few years ago when smart phone and tablet change the way of people listening the music, we found out the sound is just terrible with those devices. Even though there are some plastic speakers may slightly improve the sound, those are just not perfect solutions to us.


 Hence , we have these ideal products!




     

Moso bamboo handcrafted  


Super portable size and Hi-Fi sound that never have before!

              

                         




Hi-Fi Wireless Audio via Bluetooth                   

             



Link to the second Bamboom to extend double booming  

         

            * Of course you can also link to your existing speaker to sing together *


Did I mention that only one cable can do both charging and line-in audio playback?


Overview

  • Taiwanese Moso bamboo handcrafted cabinet
  • 5 cm cube size and 85g weight
  • Outstanding speaker with neodymium magnet
  • High fidelity sound and booming bass combined
  • Hi-Fi wireless sound via Bluetooth
  • Double booming - Link to second speaker
  • Rechargeable built-in battery ( approximately 7 hours playback time )
  • Fully compatible with smart phone, tablet and laptop

What’s in the box

  • Bamboom
  • USB charging cable
  • Exclusive pouch
  • Quick start guide


Testimonial- 2014 OTOP award




                             

      

 Maple handcrafted   


Super portable size and powerful sound.

       




Pure sound via line-in mode

One cable can do both charging and line-in audio playback



Overview

  • Maple handcrafted cabinet
  • 5 cm circular , 5.2 cm height and 75g weight
  • Outstanding speaker with neodymium magnet
  • High fidelity sound and powerful bass combined
  • Rechargeable built-in battery ( approximately 8 hours playback time )
  • Fully compatible with most smart phone, tablet, and laptop

What’s in the box

  • Cannon
  • USB charging cable
  • Exclusive pouch
  • Quick start guide


                                   


 

                       

A DIY speaker 


To assemble your own speaker just easy and fun 

We would to share with you the joy of assembling your own speaker. CANVAS contains everything you need to build a speaker. 
Assembly Cabinet Kits

           and            and     

then

done


It's not just a speaker but also a canvas, 

paint your very own speaker to make it unique.


Overview

  • Maple handcrafted assembly cabinet
  • 5 cm cube size and 65g weight
  • Outstanding speaker with neodymium magnet
  • High fidelity sound and warm bass combined

What’s in the box

  • Cabinet assembly kits
  • Circuit board
  • USB power cable
  • White glue
  • Fixing band
  • Sandpaper
  • Exclusive pouch
  • Quick start guide

  

      

                                     



Premium Quilt Maple handcrafted   

The limited edition - Mapleboom

High figure and luscious quilted maple combines sound with art.

Its rare wave grain pattern

give you even more deluxe cabinet and quality sound. 


 Featuring one touch Bluetooth pairing via NFC                     

              

                              

mapleboom also featuring double booming 

     

             * Of course you can also link to your existing speaker to sing together *


Simple concept always lead to convenience 

Overview

  • High figure and intense quilted maple 
  • Handcrafted cabinet
  • 5cm cube size and 85g weight
  • Outstanding speaker with neodymium magnet
  • High fidelity sound and booming bass combined
  • Hi-Fi wireless sound via Bluetooth
  • One touch pairing power by NFC
  • Double booming - Link to second speaker
  • Rechargeable built-in battery ( approximately 7 hours playback time )
  • Fully compatible with most smart phone, tablet, and laptop

What’s in the box

  • Mapleboom
  • USB charging cable
  • Exclusive pouch
  • Quick start guide



                              



How can you help us ?

To thanks for beckers we have very good deal of these products, with your help we'll be able to ship the products to you before the big holiday by the end of the year.

 



We are under mass production at Nov, 2014 and doing our best to deliver these ideas to you before the big holiday by the end of this year , even though the project is always full of surprise. Thank you very much for your becking and wish you have a excellent listening experience with acousdea products.

    We bring you the acoustic idea on the go. 

    acousdea LLC. based in Nantou, Taiwan , a small town in the small island 

    with beautiful environment and good people. 

    We focused on delivering both beautiful sound and rich music by using Earth's recyclable resources, eliminating up to 90% plastic. 

    We believe music comes from life and culture, that is how acousdea began.

    support us and find us on facebook and twitter right away.

    Visit acoudea website on www.acousdea.com 


                        Facebook      

                  Twitter

story:
Our Story

         We are two sisters born and raised in the Midwest. We spent our high school and college education focusing on arts, film, photography and printing. We have a love of nature, animals, vintage and the environment. 

       I have been passionate about creating and making tee-shirts to express our style. I have been making tee-shirts for myself for year and I want to share my designs with you.

       We are here to help with the cost of the equipment for screen printing. We are designing and printing graphic tee-shirts inspired by animals, nature, vintage, vegetarianism and car-racing.

 

We need your help and you want our shirts!

 

    We are seeking funding for the equipment needed to start screen printing. We will use the funds to get screens, emulation, ink and shirts. Our racing shirt is for a local race team called 3rd Gear Pulls and a portion of that shirt will be going to the race team. 

    If you help support Bees Knees Beewitching Tees with $5 or more you will receive a thank you card send to you from us. With your support of $20 or more you get to be one of the first people to receive one of our graphic shirts or tank tops. All designs are available in  women's or men's sizes in tee-shirts or tank tops.

 

With every journey they are challenges

 

      Throughout our journey we have hit a few challanegs with learning how to screen print. Trying to work with different types of screen-printing ink and to understand which kind will work best for our process. We take each challenge one step at a time to understand what we need to do differently to get the desired outcome.

 

Sharing is Caring

 

      If you like what we do and our amazing tee-sheets and tanks, please share our Indiegogo Campaign! Please like us on FaceBook and follow us on Instagram.

 

Thank you so much for taking the time to check out Bees Knees Beewitching Tees!

story:
PEFORMANCE

The Slope Pants feature the Orsden High Performance System, which is engineered to keep you dry and comfortable regardless of the conditions.

The Slope Pants are also constructed to be a rugged piece of clothing you won't soon replace. 

  • Adjustable waistband
  • Stretchable snow gaiters
  • Front closure with 2 buttons, zipper, and hook
  • Reinforced knee insert

Additionally, specific details on the Slope Pants were developed with the needs of female and male skiers in mind.

Women's Pant Details

 Men's Pant Details


FIT

We’ve worked with top activewear designers to get this right. The result is a clean, streamlined design that's responsive on the slopes due to the ultra premium stretch construction of both the shell and lining fabrics. 


A key motivator for this project is helping you find your perfect fit, so we are offering 30 unique sizes. 


We're starting with black as the only color for both styles. However, we may introduce more colors as we get closer to production and will update backers with the final color options prior to shipping.
 

VALUE

A comparable ski pant sold in a traditional retail model would be at least 50% more than our retail price of $200. Some high performance pants currently in market even cross the $500 mark. It’s time to stop overpaying for quality.
 

The Orsden Story

Orsden delivers high performance skiwear to all those who embrace the alpine life—from the slopes to après and beyond.

Our co-founders, Sara & Steven Segall, were shopping for new ski jackets at their home mountain in Vermont. Shocked by the price tags and uninspired by the outdated or unflattering designs, they saw an opportunity to make premium skiwear a more affordable luxury.

The result is Orsden. Our direct-to-consumer approach allows you to stop overpaying for quality skiwear. We believe 100% that our products deliver on our founding goal and hope you’ll agree.

Orsden's debut Winter 2016/2017 collection featured ski jackets for men & women and now we're expanding the product line with pants.
 

Production Plan

Slope Pants will ship Oct '17 in plenty of time for ski season


 

The Orsden Team

Sara and Steven Segall, Orsden's co-founders, are avid skiers who have combined their love of the mountains with their extensive business backgrounds to create Orsden.

Steven is a lifelong skier from a family of skiers. Having raced on ski teams through college, he brings a technical, performance-based perspective on skiing to the brand. He also has over 10 years of finance and strategy experience.

Sara has the other side of the business covered, having worked in marketing for iconic fashion and consumer brands. She knows the labor and love it takes to bring a product through the entire lifecycle from idea to development to market. She represents the style-conscious, recreational skier.
 

Our Supplier & Manufacturer

To produce high quality, technical products, we work with a trusted activewear manufacturer in Asia audited by the Fair Wear Foundation and Ethical Trading Initiative. We worked with the same manufacturer for our ski jackets, which were delivered on time and in excellent condition for the current ski season. We’ve also visited the factory where the garments are produced and seen the process first-hand as well as had it independently audited.
 

Our Rewards


Details on the Orsden Lift and Slope Jackets, including available colors and specs, can be found at orsden.com. 

Free US shipping on all perks. International shipping is $40 + any additional VATs or duties. 
 

Risks and challenges

At this stage, we don't foresee any major production issues, risks or challenges that would jeopardize the pant availability on or before October 2017, in time for the 2017/2018 ski season. However, we recognize that unexpected issues can arise, so we promise to be transparent and to keep our backers updated on any potential delays.

story:
My name is Ilan Srulovicz. I designed my first timepiece for my father years ago as a Tribute to him for all the things he did for me growing up. Timepieces are far more important than just being functional jewelry. They serve as markers of the most important memories and people in our lives. They can be carried on for generations among family members. My father and I both are both the team behind this new timepiece entitled the "V1-Gent" under our new brand Gentleman Warfare. We have years of experience in all aspects of watch design in production and are truly proud of the quality and look of this piece.

Choose your perk on the right:

Classic - Steel Case, White Dial, Brown Strap

Aqua - Steel Case, Blue Dial, Blue Strap

Stealth - Black case, Black Dial, Black Strap

Allure - Black and Rose gold Case, Black and Rose gold Dial, Black Strap

Bronze - Bronze Case, Brown Dial, Brown Strap

There are key elements that make a timepiece a worthwhile investment. Craftsmanship, Quality and Uniqueness. All of the above were carried out in the creation of the V1-Gent. 

A masculine luxury timepiece, attractive enough for both men and women. Ladies if you are looking for a cool masculine watch this is it. 

Each component of this watch has been thought out to the greatest extent. From the case construction to the dial design.

Prototype after prototype allowed us to obsessively craft a meticulous piece that feels incredibly sturdy in the hand and on the wrist. No element was left unchecked. The V1-Gent come with a 2 year warranty to ensure your confidence in knowing these pieces are of the highest quality.

Dimensions:

Case Diameter: 45mm

Case Thickness: 11mm

Total Watch Length with Strap: 245mm

Strap at Lug: 24mm

Strap at Pinhole: 22mm

Go Automatic or Go home! 

The V1-Gent is an Automatic timepiece. It is equipped with a Miyota 82S7 Japanese Automatic Movement which winds off the movement of your wrist. No batteries needed! 

The Miyota 82S7 is a versatile stable movement that was slightly modify to create a look that was outside the framework of normal timepieces. The Subdials were switched for disks which gives the V1-Gent a slick and high end appearance often not seen. The movement also shows the beating heart of the movement on the dial and through the caseback. 

 
Why we chose Sapphire Crystals with Anti Reflective Coating!!!

The V1 Gent finds a happy medium of case size by maintaining wrist presence and yet still feeling comfortable and classy on the wrist.

We use AA grade plating which is far higher quality than the standard method of plating. This will protect the watch from the plating wearing off over time or from impact.

The case size itself is 45m, and with it's Lugless design the timepiece fit beautiful on the wrist. The case is slightly curved on the bottom to conform to your wrist. 

The caseback displays the automatic movement’s beating heart as well as information along with your individual serial number marking your piece as yours and yours alone. 

NOTE: The caseback shown in the video is not the final edition caseback. Here we show the First Edition Caseback which is only offered to the first 600 sold (only 280 of this first edition caseback left at time of this campaign launch)

The Dial is a multi Layered, Multi Textured Masterpiece which allows the timepiece to do what it was meant to do… STAND OUT. The subdial disks along with the three dimensional quality of the dial allow it to be unique while still being easy to read and clear. 

Pre-sale pricing is $295 for the collection - Retail will be $395

The Engraved limited edition V1-Gent is pre-selling for $345 USD - Retail is $495

Select which V1-Gent suits your personality. There are 5 different choices all drastically different in both plating and dial choices. Each one is listed as a Reward for pledging. Retail value of $400 USD.

His & Hers level 2- Early Bird Pricing $525. 

Get any two V1-Gent Watches of your choice (except the limited edition version) for only $425 USD. 


Ilan Srulovicz design and built his first timepiece for his father. That creation would spawn in to Égard Watch Company which has focused on creating unique limited production luxury timepieces. The same craftsmanship and  dedication that went in to Égard timepieces goes in to Gentleman Warfare Timepieces. Gentleman Warfare is a new passion project to design pieces that fit a different model and look that can appeal to those who appreciate unique design, incredible quality all at an affordable price.

Be a part of the Gentleman Warfare family and help make this watch a reality!
story_txt: My name is Ilan Srulovicz. I designed my first timepiece for my father years ago as a Tribute to him for all the things he did for me growing up. Timepieces are far more important than just being functional jewelry. They serve as markers of the most important memories and people in our lives. They can be carried on for generations among family members. My father and I both are both the team behind this new timepiece entitled the "V1-Gent" under our new brand Gentleman Warfare. We have years of experience in all aspects of watch design in production and are truly proud of the quality and look of this piece.Choose your perk on the right:Classic - Steel Case, White Dial, Brown StrapAqua - Steel Case, Blue Dial, Blue StrapStealth - Black case, Black Dial, Black StrapAllure - Black and Rose gold Case, Black and Rose gold Dial, Black StrapBronze - Bronze Case, Brown Dial, Brown StrapThere are key elements that make a timepiece a worthwhile investment. Craftsmanship, Quality and Uniqueness. All of the above were carried out in the creation of the V1-Gent. A masculine luxury timepiece, attractive enough for both men and women. Ladies if you are looking for a cool masculine watch this is it. Each component of this watch has been thought out to the greatest extent. From the case construction to the dial design.Prototype after prototype allowed us to obsessively craft a meticulous piece that feels incredibly sturdy in the hand and on the wrist. No element was left unchecked. The V1-Gent come with a 2 year warranty to ensure your confidence in knowing these pieces are of the highest quality.Dimensions:Case Diameter: 45mmCase Thickness: 11mmTotal Watch Length with Strap: 245mmStrap at Lug: 24mmStrap at Pinhole: 22mmGo Automatic or Go home! The V1-Gent is an Automatic timepiece. It is equipped with a Miyota 82S7 Japanese Automatic Movement which winds off the movement of your wrist. No batteries needed! The Miyota 82S7 is a versatile stable movement that was slightly modify to create a look that was outside the framework of normal timepieces. The Subdials were switched for disks which gives the V1-Gent a slick and high end appearance often not seen. The movement also shows the beating heart of the movement on the dial and through the caseback.  Why we chose Sapphire Crystals with Anti Reflective Coating!!!The V1 Gent finds a happy medium of case size by maintaining wrist presence and yet still feeling comfortable and classy on the wrist.We use AA grade plating which is far higher quality than the standard method of plating. This will protect the watch from the plating wearing off over time or from impact.The case size itself is 45m, and with it's Lugless design the timepiece fit beautiful on the wrist. The case is slightly curved on the bottom to conform to your wrist. The caseback displays the automatic movement’s beating heart as well as information along with your individual serial number marking your piece as yours and yours alone. NOTE: The caseback shown in the video is not the final edition caseback. Here we show the First Edition Caseback which is only offered to the first 600 sold (only 280 of this first edition caseback left at time of this campaign launch)The Dial is a multi Layered, Multi Textured Masterpiece which allows the timepiece to do what it was meant to do… STAND OUT. The subdial disks along with the three dimensional quality of the dial allow it to be unique while still being easy to read and clear. Pre-sale pricing is $295 for the collection - Retail will be $395The Engraved limited edition V1-Gent is pre-selling for $345 USD - Retail is $495Select which V1-Gent suits your personality. There are 5 different choices all drastically different in both plating and dial choices. Each one is listed as a Reward for pledging. Retail value of $400 USD.His & Hers level 2- Early Bird Pricing $525. Get any two V1-Gent Watches of your choice (except the limited edition version) for only $425 USD. Ilan Srulovicz design and built his first timepiece for his father. That creation would spawn in to Égard Watch Company which has focused on creating unique limited production luxury timepieces. The same craftsmanship and  dedication that went in to Égard timepieces goes in to Gentleman Warfare Timepieces. Gentleman Warfare is a new passion project to design pieces that fit a different model and look that can appeal to those who appreciate unique design, incredible quality all at an affordable price.Be a part of the Gentleman Warfare family and help make this watch a reality!

story:
The slimmest electric massager in the market. Cardlax is a device that will allow you to have the relaxation you desire and need anywhere you are.

  •  With its 4.7 mm, it becomes the world’s thinnest electrical massager.
  •  An easy design for comprehensive operation.
  •  With a double battery layout it gives you, the user the ability to enjoy relaxation for long periods of time. 
  •  Take it in your wallet, purse, pocket and enjoy a relaxing time, no need for those big bulky machines

 Frequency is significant for most EMS applications and is given in Hertz (Hz). When choosing the frequency you should take into account that there are individual differences.  

Low frequencies (no higher than about 18 Hz) will mainly activate the slower reacting red muscle fibers. Power and endurance athletes will thus benefit from electrical muscle stimulation in this frequency range to build up muscle.  

When applied, it will cause a distinct contraction of the muscle. Higher frequencies between 30 and 50 Hz stimulate the fast contracting white muscle fibers.  

With frequencies of over 50 Hz, the muscle is deliberately overtaxed and can thus be forced into muscle hypertrophy (muscle build-up). To avoid overtraining, the interval between the sessions must be correctly chosen so that the muscle has enough time to regenerate.

3 modes for you specific satisfaction, use them separately or in a continues loop of all modes.

 A 4 button layout makes it easy for just about anyone to use it. Simple power button, a mode button so you can select the style of massage you would like to receive, and finally the plus and minus buttons that allows you to change the intensity of the massages.

Small and slim enough to just put it on your purse and take it with you anywhere and use it at anytime.

How about those muscles pains after training, use Cardlax to relax your muscles and recover faster, and be ready for your next training.

Don't let those stressful days get the best of you, with Cardlax just sit back and enjoy a relaxing moment even in your stressful office.

             

 With our gel pads you can give them new life by washing them, just use warm water and your pads will be available for longer uses. 

Product Specs: 

 Dimentions: 8.5cm x5.1cm x4.7mm

 Battery: 140mH up to 10 hours of usage.

 Bluethooth version: 4.0 Charging port: Micro-USB

             

 A simple and user friendly app, has been designed with the intention of giving our users a more seamless experience between the app and the device, but even though the app has been designed, the cost of the Bluetooth chip is expensive; therefore, we need your help to reach 300k to make our app available. 

 A small team of designers, engineers and dreamers, based off Delaware and Hong Kong, with huge hopes to bring you a new way to be relaxed in this crazy stressful world. Our goal in this, is to get people involved in the development and final manufacturing of Cardlax.

By sharing this project with your friends and family you give us the opportunity to make Cardlax into a reality. We want to count with your support in this adventure. 

  If you are looking to buy Cardlax in bulk, please feel free to contact us at Cardlax@hotmail.com  

 This project is promoted by Jellop , a direct response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google Adwords.

FAQ:  

Q. How long does the battery last? A. The rechargeable battery keeps Cardlax going for 7+ days.  

Q. How does it charge? A. We include a special micro-USB cable. You can charge Cardlax using your computer or any wall USB charger.  

Q. How does it take to fully charge? A. 4 hours to fully charge, we have decided to make it this way, so that the battery will have a longer life period.  

Q. When will I get the survey? Usually, you will get the survey a week or two after the campaign ends, where you can input your name and your address for delivery.  

Q. What is your refund policy? A. Due to the nature of Kickstarter, we cannot offer refunds to backers once the project ends, with the exception of the unlikely instance of a defective reward being shipped out. Once the campaign ends, your pledges are put to use immediately to ensure that Cardlax, enters into production as soon as possible. Therefore, we cannot offer refunds once the campaign has ended.  

Q. I live outside the United States. Will I have to pay duties/VAT to receive my reward? A. This depends on your local tax code. Any applicable duties/VAT are the sole responsibility of the backer, and not our team. We have absolutely no control over charging each backer additional duties/VAT at the time the pledge is made, and so these fees (if applicable) may be imposed at the time of receiving the package. If you are unsure whether or not you will be charged duties/VAT at the time of receiving your reward, please get in touch with your local post office.

story:
We are a group of entrepreneurs produce handmade jewelry and accessories include "earring, necklace, ring… ect" .Rose products are a combination of traditional and modernity. It is also a unique design with manual to embroidery. Rose has a good team consists of four girls from different fields. They can work with high quality. Rose products will be sold through Facebook page as the beginning, then they will set up a specialized site for Rose products. Rose targets the women who love embroidery and have a unique accessory. Rose will start its work from Palestine territories and the products will sent to outside Palestine by Delivery Company.




What We Need & What You Get

Rose team needs to be supported to survive it its work and to continue with their products, then expansion for our products and our catalog which has many varieties and different designs. With your support we can own a special Website for sale embroidery jewelry and accessories and we can make extensive advertising campaigns for Rose Company, so we can expand on our work and send our products to many countries abroad.



Risks & Challenges

The repeated closure of crossings in the Gaza Strip makes some of necessary raw materials missing, so we need your support to have a small stock of some basic resources necessary for the handmade of embroidery jewelry and accessories



Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, rose team asks you to help us by telling your family and friends about us and share this campaign with friends by using social media networks Facebook, Twitter, YouTube,…. etc. With a lot of thanks for supporting rose campaign.



Note :
This campaign was launched as a part of an academic course on “E-Business” from Gaza. For more information, please refer to this link:
