story:
It is not a rendering project and prototype developed by 3D printers, but a real product that needs your help!! 


FASHION WITH HEALTH. 

Fashion A watch is more than a functional item that tells the time, over the years it has become a must have fashion accessory, a statement of your own individuality. Beauty is close related to personal physical conditions, we are focus on using technology to monitor your condition. Selecting your watch for your chosen Lifestyle, is like choosing  an expensive suit or handbag, it's a fashion choice that will become part of your everyday lifestyle. 

You may need something smart for the office, durable for outdoor activities or perhaps just a style that's fun and fashionable. Any fashion decisions you make are not only personal, but express your lifestyle choice to others. 

After careful research, we took the most ideal smart function, fun features and crafted them into Hej! Watch! by i-Spirit production Ltd, 

iSpirit production Ltd is made up of a group of design engineers whose have been in product development for over 15 years. Our talented team members are expert in product design, software and hardware development.  All the team members come from Europe, Taiwan and HK whose existing or former jobs have been working for Philips, Motorola, Oregon Scientific, Toshiba, Monster etc.




That’s why we decided to develop our own smartwatch: Hej! Watch! the connected independent smartwatch for daily use.

The Design started with sketches

The Finalized Design Concept 


DESIGN PROCESS

A wrist watch must foremost be water-resistant, for daily use. You might be washing your hands or doing the dishes - simple tasks that you don't think much about, Unlike a smartphone, a wrist watch has to be with wherever you go. A wrist watch has to be able to withstand daily wear & tear. We started with stylish watch face that has never been seen in any other watch.




Stylish casing and a silicone belt

Protective and durable. In the final product, these elements stood the test of time and remain unchanged.



Hardware design 


Hej! Watch! automatically tracks your calories burned, steps taken, and distance traveled. The displays is on your wrist for easy viewing. No extra parts or charging required! 


Always On

Hej!Watch! follows your progress 24/7, and it stays charge for 6 months for upto 6 months.

Glance-able Information, automatically.

Captures walking running and biking, provides info about caloric burn, duration and steps. When you start walking, the pedometer information kicks in, all without pressing a button.

Water-resistance

It is water-resistant with 50 meters, so you can shower or get caught in the rain or fall in a very deep puddle, worry-free.

Get Connected

With the touch of one button, you can wirelessly sync Hej!Watch! with iOS & Android App to see a complete picture of your progress.

Temperature Sensing

It monitors the surrounding temperature during exercise

Comfortable Wearable Technology.

A lightweight watch that you can enjoy every day, an all-weather, soft strap.

Features

  • High resolution 1.54" epaper display with 200 *200 resolution
  • Sunlight Readable for sport/ outdoor activities
  • Temperature sensing
  • Bluetooth Smart Connectivity (compatible with iPhone 4S, 5, 5S, 5C, iPad 3, 4, iPad Mini, iPad Touch 5th generation running on iOS 6 and up) - Transfer and keep data to smartphones
  • Automatic Tracking - All-Day Calorie Burn - All-Day Steps - Auto-Calibrated Distance
  • Advanced Calorie Tracking - Proprietary calorie algorithm integrates activity data to provide a full day's record of calories burned
  • 7-Day and Hourly Records - Review your results from the past seven days - See your progress throughout the day
  • No Charging - Long-lasting coin cell battery CR2450 for 6 months 
  • Waterproof - Fully submersible 50 meters
  • Watch weight: 70g
  • Soft silicon strap


Where we are

Over the last 12 months we have designed and built dozens of prototypes. The final Hej!Watch! design and prototype has been established and we’re ready to start manufacturing to meet international demand.

We have issued our working prototypes to various fitness communities and are actively testing and collecting and analyzing data to further improve the software.

White

Black

Yellow

Grey

Red


Plan for Shipment

Mid Jan 2014:

Working prototypes have been done for fine turning 

Mid July 2014: 

- Tooling ready

End July 2014: 

- Pilot run sample production

- Purchase of reserved components, Certification. 

- Complete User Interface Skinning & Home Launcher Software

- Complete Key Apps Development & Testing

- Complete all software and firmware quality assurance

Sep 2014: 

- First Volume Production and Shipping

With the planned Retail Price of $109, we have created attractive Pledge packages starting from $59 to thank our supporters and developers for supporting us in bringing the Hej!Watch! to market. The early adopter batches of deliveries in Aug are reserved as rewards for you!

Support us and click on a Perks package on the right now! Thank you!


Our Team

iSpirit Production Ltd is a truly international team. Founded and registered in HK for lower tax reason and close proximity to manufacturing site for project managing. Our team  features experts in different fields, located in UK, France, Nederlands, HK, Taiwan and China.

Over the last 15 years years, our team has worked for world-class companies, including Philips, Motorola, Oregon Scientific, Toshiba, Monster and others.

We are 100% passionate about building unique consumer products and enjoy life, and sharing with others our love of a stylish and easy to use Smartwatch. This includes family and friends



Risks and challenges

We need you Indiegogo because...


Many (not just one) concept designs have been done, including early prototypes that have been tested of different key components (like selecting epaper instead of OLED/ TFT/ Memory display for readability outdoors) before the outlook design was finalized.  Most of the electronics module has been tested and qualified like Bluetooth 4.0, 

We need public investment to start enable the injection moulds, tooling costs investment, material delivered to us for production. We also want to create even better apps with creative graphics. Part of the funds will be committed to App development support and improve new app ideas for wearables.

Our partnership with EMS Manufacture- We have long history with well-known watch factories (who made a lot of watches for Tier-1 brand). the partnership ensure production is quality control and all difficulties are well anticipate . Testing and quality control are followed the same as other watches like Tier-1 brand. Thus, we are high confident that we won't have "unforeseen" issues during mass production manufacturing and assembly.    

Yes, we are more ready than other crowd-funding projects you have seen. What this means is that we can deliver almost immediately once the project goals are reached and the project ends, one of the faster deliveries and assurance in crowd-funding. We are committing to a production schedule and delivering to you in August.

We decided on Indiegogo. Key reason being this is one connected lifestyle product that needs to connect with the community, and made for the users - you / us.

Stretch Goals

Our 1st stretch goal of $60,000

We would start fund raising at almost cost so that we can manufacture and ship Hej Watch to you worldwide. This is one of the reason we set up in HK so that can deliver to you in speedy to anywhere worldwide. I-Spirit Production Ltd is a registered company in HK (The same legal system as United Kingdom) that with the teams will bear all the Fulfillment, Resources, Efforts and Liability to all our Perks. 

Hej! Thank you for reading this far. We will be doing OUR BEST to deliver the best Hej Watch! Smartwatch to you. Once fulfill the goal ! We promise! :)

We promise! (Instruction manual already done)

English

Nederlands


Francais


Referral Bonus and Contest


Referral Bonus:If you refer Lucky Seven (7) or more friends who contribute to our Indiegogo campaign, we will ship you a free Hej !Watch! to share to your friend and family (same as the $59 perk) if we reach our funding goal. The minimum contribution of all your referrals combined must be at least $400.

Referral Contest : Here is how the referral contest works:

  • Referral contest starts on 04 May 2014 and will run until we achieve our goal of $60,000.
  • To start referring your friends, you must be on this campaign page and logged in to Indiegogo. Then simply use the personalized "Share This Campaign" link under the video.
  • The contest prize will be awarded only if we are successful in reaching our goal.

Thus, we are high confident that we won't have "unforeseen" issues during mass production manufacturing and assembly.    Yes, we are more ready than other crowd-funding projects you have seen. What this means is that we can deliver almost immediately once the project goals are reached and the project ends, one of the faster deliveries and assurance in crowd-funding. We are committing to a production schedule and delivering to you in August.We decided on Indiegogo. Key reason being this is one connected lifestyle product that needs to connect with the community, and made for the users - you / us.Stretch GoalsOur 1st stretch goal of $60,000We would start fund raising at almost cost so that we can manufacture and ship Hej Watch to you worldwide. This is one of the reason we set up in HK so that can deliver to you in speedy to anywhere worldwide. I-Spirit Production Ltd is a registered company in HK (The same legal system as United Kingdom) that with the teams will bear all the Fulfillment, Resources, Efforts and Liability to all our Perks. Hej!
 Thank you for reading this far. We will be doing OUR BEST to deliver the best Hej Watch! Smartwatch to you. Once fulfill the goal ! We promise! :)We promise! (Instruction manual already done)EnglishNederlandsFrancaisReferral Bonus and ContestReferral Bonus:If you refer Lucky Seven (7) or more
friends who contribute to our Indiegogo campaign, we will ship you a free Hej
!Watch! to share to your friend and family (same as the $59 perk) if we reach
our funding goal. The minimum contribution of all your referrals combined must
be at least $400.Referral Contest : Here is how the referral contest
works:

Referral contest starts
     on 04 May 2014 and will run until we achieve our goal of $60,000.
To start referring your
     friends, you must be on this campaign page and logged in to Indiegogo.
     Then simply use the personalized "Share This Campaign"
     link under the video.
The contest prize will
     be awarded only if we are successful in reaching our goal.

story:
We are friends of the libertairans and fans of Gary Johnson and his show "Live and Let Live". 

Gary and his team did that show on public access television in Austin Texas, it ran for a number of years, starting in 2001.  He interviewed 100s of people on libertarian issues.  The shows were recorded on tape using professional studio equipment.  There are a lot of tapes.

We want to get the shows digitized and put up on the Internet.  This is important both to preserve them, as tape has a shelf life, and to make them accessible to others.

A studio has given us a price break for getting them all digitized.  All the money for this campaign will go to digitizing the tapes.

If we don't raise enough money to digitize them all, then we will start selecting among them.  We sure hope not have to do that.

We accept donations in any amount the site will let you post.

As for the perks!  Just imagine people anywhere in the country being able to go on the Internet and just clicking and watch the libertarian interviews!  Sweet!

story:
Wind energy can power the world 100 times over, but more methods are needed to harness this power. Ocean shipping is the life line of the global economy, but ships emit over 20 million tons of greenhouse gas annually. Conventional freighters burn extremely polluting fuel and are not inclined to make transformation unless an outside entity leads the way. Pacific Sky Power Sustainable Shipping is focused on innovation. It is our mission to implement sustainable methods for clean environmentally friendly shipping.  

On the high seas, wind is the most abundant energy source, but commercial freighters no longer harness this power. Fuel burning freighter ships are currently used because they are the most cost effective way to transport goods across the ocean. Shipping ports have developed to service these vessels which are proportionally long and narrow. Our ships will be compatible with existing port facilities, but at the same time have the ability to deploy and retract industrial sized sails. Catamaran ships under sail power can carry heavy loads efficiently but their wide stance would be problematic at most shipping ports. To achieve high efficiency ocean transportation and port compatibility, ships will use telescoping members to expand for sailing performance at sea and retract for hassle free port maneuvering. Some conventional methods may be needed but with the combined use of cleaner fuels, sleeker hull shapes, and sails, a tremendous reduction in fossil fuel consumption is possible. 

Global Wind Map


Project Timeline

Phase 1.  Prototype Development - Feasibility Studies,  2014 - 2015 

Phase 2.  Engineer Full Size Ships,  2015 - 2016

Phase 3.  Ship Construction,  2016 - 2017                          

Phase 4.  Pilot Projects,  2018 - 2020

___________________________________________________

Project Milestones

Construct Cat 30 Prototype Ship                                 Completed

Cat 30 Trials                                                                  Oct - Dec 2014

Construct Cat 60 Prototype Ship          Dec 2014 - March 2015

Feasibility Studies                                                       Jan- June 2015

Cat 60 Trials                                                               April - May 2015

Ship Engineering                                           April 2015 - April 2016

Ship Construction                                           May 2016 - Dec 2017

Bellingham - Seattle Pilot Project                                             2018

Seattle - San Francisco Pilot Project                         2019 - 2020

Prototype Development

The Cat 30 is a 30 inch long prototype ship and it needs steering control to conduct more sail power trials. This will involve fabricating rudders and installing a radio controlled servo. The Cat 60 will be a fully operational 60 inch long prototype with all actions operable through radio control. This will enable us to conduct realistic ocean trials and calculate fuel use on different sailing courses and wind conditions.

Cat 60 Construction - The main portion of hulls will be shaped out of foam. The top level of hulls will house cross members along with expand and contract drives. A custom telescoping mast will be developed along with the boom and other sail rigging. A rudder system and propulsion motors will be installed to complete the Cat 60 prototype. 

Cat 60 Ocean Trials - Using radio control the ship operator will control all ship actions. The ship will be loaded to simulate real shipping and we will test in different wind conditions and sailing courses.  Motorized drives will expand the ship for increased stability. After locking into a wide stance, sail rigging will be deployed and tested on all courses.

Feasibility Studies

Some feasibility studies will be conducted in phase 1 to investigate ship and sail designs. We will work with naval engineers on this detailed investigation. The outcome of these studies will set our course for engineering full size ships.

Ship Engineering

  • Finite Element Analysis

  • Basic & Advanced Structural Analysis

  • Propulsion System Analysis

  • Stability Support

  • Waterborne Transportation Analysis

  • Maintenance Management Studies

  • Failure Modes & Effects Analysis

  • Operational & Capital Cost Analysis

    Electrical Engineering - Electrical engineering will include: expand and contract drives, sail rigging drives, rudder system drives, and all other electronics.

  • Preliminary & Detailed Design

  • Fault Current Analysis

  • Protective Device Coordination Studies

  • Integrated System Design

  • Power System Analysis

    Naval Architectural - Naval architectural will include: hull, sails, rudders and cross member supports.

  • Hull Development, Definition & Fairing

  • Structural Design & Advanced Analysis including FEA

  • Developing 3D Models

  • Construction Cost Estimating                              

  • Phase 3. Ship Construction - After completing detailed ship engineering, ship construction will start. The outcome of ship engineering will determine construction methods. After locating and securing a suitable base yard, ship construction will begin with the hulls and cross members. After competing these, a crane will be used to aid in assembly. With the hulls and cross members together, a hydraulic system will be installed and expand and retract performance will be tested. The mast and other sail rigging will be fabricated and connected with hydraulics. The bridge tower and living quarters will constructed and installed. The rudder and all other systems will be installed to complete ship construction.            

  • Phase 4. Pilot Projects - After conducting initial ocean trials, pilot projects will begin. One between Bellingham - Seattle and the other between Seattle - San Francisco. This will start Sustainable Shipping and eliminating trucks from our highways.    


  • Project Funding - The 1st $10,000 raised in this campaign will go to prototype development. Any additional funds over $10,000 will go to conducting feasibility studies. The development budget for Pacific Sky Power Sustainable Shipping is over $10 million. As we progress forward,  funds will be raised through more crowd funding campaigns, grants and traditional bank financing.

    Innovative Approach to An Old Idea - Since the industrial revolution, burning fossil fuel has become the most cost effective way to transport goods across the ocean. Today, with fuel costs rising and the threats of global warming, it is our primary objective to make wind powered shipping economically viable once again. Developing sail powered shipping is a massive undertaking, but every project needs a beginning and Indiegogo provides opportunity for all. After validating our technology, a large segment of other shipping companies may follow to reduce costs, fuel consumption and greenhouse gas emissions. This will help stabilize costs for everyone and promote stability worldwide.

  • End Goal - The end goal of this project is to operate a fleet of sustainable freighter ships and grow the business based on available wind energy. Industrial sized sails will be used on primarily downwind courses and with sleek hull shapes, our ships will travel efficiently to pre-determined port destinations. After pilot projects are compete, open ocean shipping will begin to take advantage of stronger more consistent wind energy. The West Coast to Hawaii and other outlying islands, Hawaii to Asia and back to the US. When using a fleet of ships, delivery could be as steady as conventional shipping. Launch a ship a day and unload a ship a day at the destination.

Perks 

Join our team for $1 to $5 and receive project updates and a honorable mention on our Pacific Sky Power website. For $10 you receive a nice die cut Pacific Sky Power logo sticker. For $15 help us spread the word about Pacific Sky Power Sustainable Shipping with 22 label stickers that can be used on your shipping packages. $20 gets you a small DC generator that is great for projects. Join the team for $25 and receive the project patch, $35 a hat and $45 a T-shirt. For $50 you will receive a kiting adventure from a small boat in Seattle Washington, San Francisco or Bar Harbor Maine. Pledge $55 and receive a Small Wind Turbine Generator or $75 for the upgraded turbine with a fiberglass reinforced blade. Join our team for $100 and receive a framed picture of our Cat 30 prototype. For $145, celebrate the holidays with two upgraded Small Wind Turbine Generators. $150 gets you a framed picture of our Cat 30 prototype, project patch, hat and T-shirt. For $225 you will receive 2 Small Wind Turbine Generators with fiberglass reinforced blades and a tower kit. For $250, receive a 6 inch long desk top demonstration unit. Our exclusive package for $1,000 includes a 6 inch long sustainable freighter demonstration unit, a 10X12 framed picture of the Cat 30 prototype, the project patch, T-Shirt and a hat. And for backers wanting to experience the thrill of kitesurfing from a small boat we have an exclusive perk to come to you anywhere in the US. 

Team

Dan Tracy, Dan Tracy founded Pacific Sky Power in 2011 to innovate clean energy solutions. Today, Pacific Sky Power wind turbines are popular for charging batteries and learning about wind power. Dan's passion for alternative kite powered ocean transportation, earned an innovation award from the state of Hawaii and today a similar system is available for small boats. 

John D. Selleck, Consultant, former Director of Strategic Development for Matson and consultant with the Maritime Group (Honolulu), is a visionary executive with extensive experience in maritime, alternative energy, Hawai’i operations, finance, strategy, and business development. He holds Bachelors and Masters Degrees in Economics from UC Berkeley and Columbia University, respectively.

Chris Tracy, Mechanical Engineer/ Project Adviser, worked for NASA designing tools for astronauts for 8 years, He currently works with the US Department of Transportation helping to improve fuel efficiency for air traffic. Masters degree in Mechanical Engineering from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

Early R&D - In the last 5 years our R&D has been featured on Hawaii Public Radio, Alaska Fish Radio, KMRE-LP 102.3 FM,  KITV4 News, KGMB9 News,  and written up in Three Sheet Northwest, Bangor Daily, Mount Desert Islander, Maui Times, Molokai Times, Gizmag and the Seattle Times.

 Internship Opportunities

We are planning continued work with university students and will have a number of different internship opportunities including engineering design, fabrication and crew for Sustainable Shipping trials. All inquiries can email dan@pacificskypower.com 


Small Wind Turbine Generator ( Featured Perk )

                                                          Seattle  Kiteboating

story:
Who says working out isn’t fun?

For us, it sure is, but we’re fun people in general – and we never understood why our workout gear couldn’t be too.

We make gear for all athletes and personalities – not just the cookie-cutter commercial-types that some brands box us into being. We don’t want designs and logos that shout louder than us, clothing that talks more trash than we do, or a “fit” that feels like it doesn’t.

We workout to feel good – and we feel best when we’re ourselves.


A good workout starts with feeling good – set the mood with Whiptail.

Our first wave of designs finds creative ways to express the inside jokes of the workout world. We’re sure there’s a fun-pun in here you can relate to.

So, go on, add some levity to your lift.

Flip It, Flip It Real Good...


Stop Sucking, Russian Style


Swedish Meatballs, Anyone?  (It reads "I run so I don't turn into a meatball")

We don’t want designs and logos that shout louder than us, clothing that talks more trash than we do, or a “fit” that feels like it doesn’t.We workout to feel good – and we feel best when we’re ourselves.A good workout starts with feeling good – set the mood with Whiptail.Our first wave of designs finds creative ways to express the inside jokes of the workout world. story:
à la mode

  /,ä lȧ `mōd/

  in fashion; up to date

Geek a la Mode

  fashionably geeky

Hello all my nerdy darlings! I'm Sarah Macklin a seamstress and all around geeky girl looking to start a little company called Geek a la Mode. First, let me tell you a little bit about myself. I'm a seamstress of nearly twenty years who's always wanted to enter in world of fashion design. I'm also a lifelong comic, gaming, and animation fan who's sought to combine my love of fashion and my love of pop culture.

This brought me to the idea of Geek a la Mode. I've come to realize than all of my geeky clothing was restricted to a collection of t-shirts (however cool they may be). However, my job, where I spend most of my day, doesn't exactly look kindly on such casual dress. I knew I couldn't be the only one going through this dilemma. And if I couldn't find clothes that I could wear to work and show my geek side then I would have to make them.


What Is This Campaign For Exactly?

I'm glad you asked! My goal for starting up is $8000. Everything raised will go directly to purchasing the equipment and materials needed to bring you the best geeky clothing I can provide. Even if we don't reach the goal, know that every dollar raised will still go to getting Geek a la Mode off the ground.

Your contributions will help purchase:

  • start-up fabric, for the first year's designs
  • a serger, for more professional finishing
  • an embroidery machine, to help bring you future designs like this:


  • screen printing suplies, to produce more designs like this:


  • basic business supplies, i.e. shipping boxes, bags, website hosting, etc.

Some of the rewards you could receive for contributing are a Geek a la Mode logo tote, accessories, clothing, or even a custom outfit designed just for you.


Let Your Geek Flag Fly

I know personally how your true, geeky life and your work life may seem incompatible. But with the start of Geek a la Mode it doesn't have to be that way any longer. You shouldn't have to hide parts of your personality. You should be able to express your geekdom freely. With the start of Geek a la Mode I want to help you let your geek flag fly!

No Moolah? No Problem!

If you aren't able to contribute financially, no problem! I totally understand. You can still help out the campaign by boosting the hell out of it! Share it on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, in your coffee shop and your comic shop. The more people that can be a part of this the better.

To the Fashionably Geeky!

life may seem incompatible. But with the start of Geek a la Mode it doesn't
have to be that way any longer. You shouldn't have to hide parts of your
personality. You should be able to express your geekdom freely. With the start
of Geek a la Mode I want to help you let your geek flag fly!
No Moolah? No Problem!
If you aren't able to contribute financially, no problem! I
totally understand. You can still help out the campaign by boosting the hell
out of it! Share it on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, in your coffee shop and your
comic shop. The more people that can be a part of this the better.
To the Fashionably Geeky!

story:
You're invited to be a part of creating JLINSNIDER SPRING/SUMMER 2016-a bohemian inspired collection with fabrics and beadwork techniques from around the world, in a way never seen before.

Presenting my work on runways over the past ten years has been a dream come true. Each collection represents a new stage in my life. Being exposed to new cultures and landscapes allows me to grow as an artist. Through this process I have been able to cultivate my vision as a designer. I have been very fortunate to have gained titles such as Best of Charleston: Best Local Designer and Best Risk-Taking Designer and Charlie Magazine: Charleston's 50 Most Progressive People. My work has been featured in New York Magazine, NY Times Style, Los Angeles Magazine, Cigar Snob Magazine, Socialite Russia, Charleston Magazine and several others.  I have often been asked what inspires every collection. With your help, I hope to create a collection inspired by the bohemian way of life in the west.

(self-portrait with huss, mount charleston, nevada,  2015)


(with my fellow charleston designers, charleston magazine, 2013)


Travel is my passion; Design is my medium

I have found that every experience and everyone I have met have shaped my collections. Each garment, each piece of jewelry, each bag has been inspired by someplace or someone. Each JLINSNIDER piece tells a story without speaking a word. Over the next few months I plan to expose myself to communes all over California. The first being a place I left my heart a few years back, Topanga Canyon. From there I will travel north to San Francisco, stopping many times along the way, including touching the waves in Big Sur and a special flea market with African beads. I will carry nothing with me except my sewing machine, dress form, my dog Huss and materials I gather along the way. I will create garments and jewelry at every place I stop. I am very excited to begin this journey and hope you can be a part of my inspirational travels.

                                                                                          (JLINSNIDER for spanish moss, 2011)


                                                                                   (topanga canyon, intentional community)


The Impact

With this IndieGoGo campaign I will be able to produce my best work by being immersed in different ways of life and learning from fellow designers along the way. I will work diligently to create pieces that truly reflect the bohemian lifestyle and bring them home for a presentation in the spring of 2016. While I have produced several successful runway shows in the past, this collection will be like none other. I want you to see what I've seen and feel what I've felt by viewing my ss2016 collection. 

                                                        (JLINSNIDER SS2015 runway show,  las vegas, nevada)


Risks & Challenges

I have put together a secure route for my travels and have prepared as much as possible to reach my destinations, in order for this to run smoothly. From this campaign, through the design process and production, to shipping orders, I know my next steps and the deadlines I must meet. You have asked for more JLINSNIDER pieces and I am ready to gain the inspiration I need to satisfy you.

I do not have an advertising budget, so I'm relying on grassroots word-of-mouth, I hope this campaign will grow organically. Please tell your friends to visit and share my IndieGoGo campaign and www.jlinsnider.net

THANK YOU FOR ALL YOUR CONTINUED SUPPORT AND MAKING MY VISION A REALITY.

story:
Specteecular is a brand-new apparel company that guarantees a very awesome and unique t-shirt buying experience :

  • The designs we print are not only unique and original, but are the work of independent artists from around the world.
  • Design concepts are pretty much "everything goes," which means they may be anything from artistic to humorous.

  • Artist and designers submit their original designs to Specteecular.
  • Designs are put on our website for you, the customer, to vote on your favorites.
  • The top eight designs are then put on the Specteecular website for sale…

BUT HERE’S THE TWIST:

  • Shirts sold in the first 10 days ( Pre Order ) of any one design will come with a label that says VIP Owner, First Print Edition and the designer's name, all printed in GOLD or SILVER!
  • The owners of the VIP Owner edition shirts will have their Facebook profile displayed on our Wall Of Fame, specially dedicated to them!

We mentioned a special webpage dedicated to VIP Owners earlier… Well, here it is, the Wall Of Fame! (Also known as the WOF.)

Here’s an artist’s mock-up of what the WOF will look like:

  • If you are someone who appreciates creativity and art, you should embark on this beautiful journey with us and help make it happen.
  • Support up-and-coming designers, and help us discover some amazing talent out there.
  • Be one of the first to own a Specteecular VIP First-Print Edition, which (for now!) can only be done by being our backer on Indiegogo.
  • You deserve something awesome!

Most of the funds that we raise with this campaign will go towards turning those awesome designs into t shirts. The funds also would be spend on tech cost :
  • Creating the best website we can, with user-friendly features and an interface that’s easy to navigate.
  • Organizing designing contest to attract more talented designers.

As an endeavor that will exist primarily online, there are challenges to getting the right kind of exposure so that we can make Specteecular a top-notch service. However, we’re confident that as long as this campaign is successful, we’ll be able to offer the world amazing, wearable art for a long time to come!

  • So many of the elements and design work for Specteecular are already underway. We have the experience, knowledge, and idealism to make this dream a reality.
  • That being said, there are always potential issues that can arise from things that are, unfortunately, out of our hands. Time frame and logistic issues are the most common, since there are some things that we simply have to rely on outside influences for.
  • But fear not! We’re already hard at work, and we have our hearts and minds set on making Specteecular a success.

Q: I’ve backed your project, what now?

A: We ask for your patience to wait for our campaign to end and then we will proceed to work on delivering your perks to you. In the meantime help us get more exposure and check out for possible updates.

Q: I am really excited and would like to know an estimation when I will receive my perk?

A: You will receive your perks between 30 to 45 days after the end of our campaign.

Q: I love all the perks being offered now, can I get them all?

A: Go knock yourself out champ!

A: Are the designs sold for only 10 days?

Q: No, but only shirts sold in the first 10 days ( Pre-Order )of any one design will have the VIP Owner, First Print Edition gold label on it. After that, you’re still welcome to purchase that design on our website—it just won’t have the special `label.

A: I see only 8 designs are  being offered as the Perks, are they more designs?

Q: There are already lots of designs submitted to us, but we chose the best 8 designs to be offered to our backers. For more future designs, click here.

A : What is your t shirt size specifications?

Q: Check out the image below for a detailed size specification.

A: I have more questions! Where can I get my answers?

Q: If you still have questions, shoot us an email at yo@specteecular.com

AND THANKS FOR YOUR PLEDGE!

story:
Mission
  • We are Kulturpon Incorporated. Our focus is international unity through cultural
acceptance and equality. The world and all of its citizens are truly remarkable, and 
nothing exemplifies this fact better than the incredible regional diversity and
craftsmanship that its designers exhibit. We tirelessly scour the globe, searching
for new products and artisans to feature in our international look book and 
Kulturblend World Store. True creativity transcends racial boundaries, and our 
mission is to construct a global stage for these talents to be witnessed and enjoyed.
The Kulturblend World Store is located at shop.kulturpon.com and the look book 
can be perused at kulturpon.com.
  • We are starting a new initiative called The International Fashion Olympics. This
is an international product design competition, open to all designers and brands.
Using the original Olympics as a template, we will award designs attaining the most
votes with the Gold, Silver and Bronze medals respectively. We believe this to be a
grand opportunity for unknown designers and brands to burst onto the world stage,
impressing consumers, investors and potential partners. The 2014-2015 Winter
International Fashion Olympics has started, and votes can be cast on 
fashionolympics.com. The voting infrastructure will always take place online so that
the world may vote, regardless of location. However, we are seeking funding in 
order to expand this initiative, Twice a year, The International Fashion Olympics
will be held in various cities around the globe. These events will include fashion
shows and vendor areas where patrons can purchase international products. We
will also invite guest speakers to present their inside knowledge in regards to 
fashion, design, and globalization. The premise is simple.  The world comes 
together every four years for The Olympics. There is no reason why the world can't 
come together in honor of its rich artisans and their extraordinary creations. 

The magnitude of your contributions can't accurately be placed into words. 
You are one of the visionaries, embarking on a journey that will revolutionize how
the world views fashion and product design. Together, we will carve out a new 
platform of equality for all of the unknown geniuses in remote locales. They will 
have an opportunity to compete against brands with storied histories. These 
individuals will have a chance to garner support from enthusiasts, eager to see
them prosper and grow.
Goal
  • We are trying to raise 500,000  for this endeavor. These funds will be 
allocated for Summer International Fashion Olympics in Atlanta, Ga (SIFO-2015),
and the Summer International Fashion Olympics in Brazil (SIFO-2016). Our 
expenditures will include venue rentals, speaker and artists salaries, voting 
infrastructure, and advertisements. A large portion of these funds will be used to 
bring financially challenged designers to the events. We will assist them in making 
their travel arrangements and other incidentals. 
Perks
  • There are several investment levels that you may choose from. 
Complimentary tickets to all events will be given- along with discounts to The Kulturblend World Store. 

We understand that this is a lofty goal, but rest assured. The International
Fashion Olympics will still commence on the aforementioned dates, regardless
of our goal attainment. As stated earlier, the Winter International Fashion Olympics 
is ongoing, and over 6,000 judges have already visited fashionolympics.com. We
consider this response as confirmation that our initiative is important being that
the competition started in late November.
The voting infrastructure is already in place, so all funds will be allocated to the 
planned physical events.
Impact
  • The International Fashion Olympics offers the world another opportunity to 
put aside cultural differences and regional disagreements. There is more than
enough division on Earth. It is our hope that through fashion and product design,
individuals from various backgrounds will establish common grounds upon 
which future relationships can be forged and maintained. This initiative may also
help foster trade and other collaborations between countries or regions with 
strained relations.
  • We at Kulturpon are confident that this project will be successful. Thousands
of "international judges" have already visited fashionolympics.com, and this 
number will only increase as awareness spreads. In addition, our look book,
kulturpon.com, has had over 55,000 visitors from every continent on Earth!
When viewing these accomplishments in connection with our Kulturblend World
Store, our positive outlook is well placed and warranted.
  • Kulturpon Inc. has forged relationships with hundreds of international brands
from countless countries. Many of these artisans operate in small workshops- 
laboring diligently, producing masterpieces. Our online store boasts over 5000
unique products, and it is an honor to be associated with such talent. As we grow,
our unique collection of products will increase. Help us uncover these new items,
and the artists that create them.
Risks and Challenges
  • As with all new endeavors, the main hurdle we have to conquer is funding.
In order to sponsor an event worthy of its name, we will need the ability to hire
additional talent and consultants. We will also need comprehensive facilities; 
venues capable of holding multiple events simultaneously. However, in addition to
the funding raised on Indiegogo, Kulturpon Inc. will help subsidize the costs through
profits earned from The Kulturblend World Store. (kulturblend.com) We are also
in the process of selling vendor spots for the international exhibitor's event. The
pre-sale of these vendor reservations will assist in covering expenditures
associated with the SIFO in Atlanta, Ga.

story:
Savannah is need of a universal brand. In many places there's often an athletic team or brand that the city is proud to wear, this is what Savannah Cache & Clothes will bring to Savannah. Savannah shops are filled with overdone, thick, itchy shirts; We're creating a brand that local people and visitors will really want to wear. This will be a clothing line and extend into a multifaceted range of clothing and soft goods. The fundraising for this campaign will fund the first production run of shirts. After that I will be taking the reigns and building the rest of Savannah Cache & Clothes. Once funded, you can expect a website for online orders and more details to follow on how to get your hands on these fine shirts!


The shirt available for pre-order is our 2-color blue and red logo on the suuuuuper comfortable American Apparel, Athletic Grey Tri-blend shirt which are (50% cotton / 25% polyester / 25% rayon) these shirts run a little slimmer fit, so if you're not sure on a size, it's best to order a size up.

story: Leanne & Stephen Sadly Lost Their Baby Back In April 2013 Due to Complications After Brain Surgery And Their Pain Is Still Raw Two Years On. But Now The Young Derry Couple is Being Forced To Fork Out £8,000 To Pay For An Inquest To Find Out Exactly What Happened. Its A Bill Understandably They Cant Afford !!! Baby Sophie Passed Away Following Complications After Surgery @ London's Great Ormond Street Hospital. More Than A year Later A Chief Coroner Ordered An Investigation Into The Death And It Was After Those Wheel's We're Set In Motion That Leanne & Stephen Found They Weren't Entitled To Legal Aid As Their Baby Died In London ( Out Of Their DURISTITION) !!! The Inquest News Came As A Surprise To Them. It Seems The Doctor's Didn't Wait The Correct Length Of Time For The Test Results To Come In And Baby Sophie Developed Clots. Now An Inquest Has Been Ordered And Full Reports Will Be Delivered This July To Finally Give This Poor Family Answers That They Deserve !!! The Couple Are Trying To Arrange A Charity Night On The 1st Of May @ Pitcher's To Raise Some Funds Towards The Cost Of Their Travel To London For The Inquest & To Pay The legal Fee's For The Inquest. It Will Be Money Well Spent So This Family Can Finally Have time To Grieve Properly & And Have The Answer's For Them And Their Other Daughter Katie. Baby Sophie Had A Rare Health Condition Called VGM, Vein of Galen Malformation Which Effect's Blood Flow To The Brain.

story:
We are introducing a REFERRAL PROGRAM. Check out our latest update for details!

This is CarVi.

 

The most advanced driving safety technology in the world.

Introducing a system that helps monitor the road for you. CarVi is small, easy to install, and with the most advanced camera technology in the world you can feel safe knowing there's an extra set of eyes on the road.

CarVi uses cameras to monitor the road and keep you safe. 

CarVi - Drive safe. Monitor your driving habits. Offers peace of mind for parents of teenage drivers.

Meet CarVi: Versatile, Affordable and Easy to Install Driver’s Assistant

CarVi employs the vision based safety tools to gather data, using a small dashboard camera installed in your car that “talks” to your smart phone. The camera captures video which CarVi analyzes in real time. If it senses potential trouble, it issues audible and visual warnings.

It monitors:

Safe Lane Changes – CarVi adds an extra set of “eyes” to your driving, monitoring your position in the lane and the location of the car ahead.

Front End Collision Danger – CarVi monitors your distance from the driver in front of you. Not only will it warn you if you come too close, but it will also help you practice maintaining a safe distance if you’re prone to tailgating.

CarVi as a Dash Cam – CarVi has different options for recording video while you drive.  These video will be recorded on the memory card which you can transfer to your smartphone for later viewing.


Reckless Driving and Hard Braking –CarVi learns your driving patterns and helps you adjust.

Jackrabbit Starts – You may not even notice certain driving habits once you get used to them. CarVi helps you learn to give your car just enough gas to efficiently ease into the flow of traffic.

But CarVi doesn’t stop working when you turn off your engine. The smartphone interface displays your driving data, providing your driving “SKOR” for the day, and showing you the areas where you did well, and where you might need some work. With the data it collects, CarVi gives you suggestions on how to improve your driving skills.

Who Needs CarVi

Distracted driving due to smartphone use is one of the major reasons for car accidents. With CarVi, your smartphone will transform from an enemy on the road into your guardian.

Features of CarVi

How To Install

Perks

In the Press

      


Why did we design it

Some time ago, 3 close friends of mine died in a car accident. I will never forget their funeral. I still see in my mind their young children and felt sad and empty inside. I was looking at them, and couldn’t stop thinking about my own family. On that day I decided to commit all my time and effort to making our roads safer to drive on. I want to protect my family and yours from the pain of losing loved ones. And  I want to help every parent to sleep better, knowing that their child has help during the most dangerous time as a new driver.


Timeline



Specifications

Budget


The Team of Experts You Can Trust

CarVi, a Silicon Valley technology company, was started by trailblazing driver assist engineers whose goal was to make top-of-the-line driving safety features available to everyone. CarVi’s team members have more than 20 years of experience in design and development of value-added technology products for the automobile industry.

Kevin Eunsu Lee is a developer of a computer vision-based technology to detect lanes and cars on the road. He worked with these products from concept through implementation and brought them to the market by 2006. It was the first LDWS safety product to market in Korea, and perhaps the world.He continued his product development, creating the Forward Collision Warning System, driving state monitoring and other image conversion and transformation technologies. He has developed new and various LCD display versions of LDWS, FCWS and car driver recorders. Kevin is currently working on Big Data solutions, utilizing OBD-II data, 3G/4G mobile networks and Smartphone applications.

Automobile industry expert, Dr. Nack Y. Cho, has been involved in international business for more than 30 years. He helped Hyundai Electroncs Industries to build its new satellite business unit. Later on, Dr. Cho organized the Globalstar business, teaming up with Space Systems Loral, Alenia Spazio and international telecommunication companies for technology transfer, sub-contracts for delivery of space qualified hardware. In 2002, he worked with Cisco Systems to guide its merger with Exio. Dr. Cho has founded new telecommunications and electronics start-ups in Seoul, Korea, Tokyo, Japan, and Silicon Valley, U.S.


Risks and challenges

We will make a best effort to provide the perk but delivery is not guaranteed.



Providing real-time hazard warnings and collecting key data on your driving skills, CarVi will take you and your family to the next level of safety on the road.

The software is developed, and the dashboard device is done. With your help, we will take these fantastic driving advances to market for you and your loved ones and ensure people everywhere have a way to make each and every drive as safe as possible.

www.getcarvi.com

story:
De mult timp visai să porți o ie de la Valentina Vidrașcu?

Acum ai șansa să te alegi cu una! Sprijină această campanie  cu o donație de 200 euro și află mai jos ce vei primi în schimb.


 

Valentina Vidrașcu este unul dintre cei mai valoroși și apreciați creatori de modă din Moldova. 

De-a lungul timpul, ținutele ce i-au purtat numele au defilat pe covorul roșu de la Cannes,  la mari reuniuni de stat, la televizor și pe scenă. Având o dragoste nemărginită pentru patrimoniul cultural românesc, în special pentru costumul tradițional, Valentina a reușit să valorifice cu bun simț și bun gust IA ROMÂNEASCĂ, așa cum nimeni nu a mai făcut-o până acum. Nu înzadar, oricine a auzit de Valentina își dorește să poarte o haină deosebită, creată de ea.   
 

Dar un creator are mereu nevoie de noi provocări.

O  mașină de brodat performantă, care i-ar permite creatoarei să își realizeze noile idei, e ceea ce ar ajuta-o acum să facă un pas înainte spre realizarea viselor sale.  Probabil, într-o țară cu mai multe oportunități pentru artiști locali și cu mai mult sprijin din partea autorităților pentru cei care contribuie la crearea și promovarea identității locale, asta nu ar fi o problemă. 

 Pentru Moldova însă, susținerea oamenilor valoroși este un lux, pe care țara nu și-l poate permite.  Iar comunitatea  este cea care poate schimba această stare de lucruri. 

O mașină de brodat marca Barudan 

Este echipamentul (http://www.barudan.com/ ) pe care și-l dorește Valentina acum și care, la pachet cu softul de operare și cheltuieli de transport ajunge la prețul de 70 000 euro. Acest echipament i-ar permite designerului nu doar să creeze lucruri noi, și mai frumoase, dar ar ajuta-o mult în dezvoltarea  și  în optimizarea proceselor de producere. 

 USAID Moldova va susține acest proiect cu 180000 lei. Pentru restul sumei, Valentina  îndrăznește să apeleze la sprijinul comunității de oameni care o admiră și care sunt gata să o susțină. 

Donează și tu! Sprijină această campanie  și împlinește-ți o dorință !

Pentru contribuțiile mai generoase, însă, creatoarea vrea să ofere în schimb  ceea la ce multe femei visează să aibă în garderoba lor - o ie de la Valentina. Mai exact, pentru fiecare donație de 200 euro, Valentina Vidrașcu va crea o ie și o va oferi în dar. 
 
În luna mai, 2019, Valentina va crea cu ajutorul mașinii de brodat o colecție specială pentru cei care au susținut-o financiar. Iar în luna iunie va fi gata să livreze toate bluzele.

story:
Let's make postcards vivid! LEDin is a mailable LED-based postcard created with thin and flexible circuits. With its help, you could send your special greetings to anyone! Family…friends…enemies…frienemies…ANYONE!



LEDin can be a postcard, invitation, greeting card, flower card or whatever…we just wanted to add a little spark with our built in LEDs for whatever occasion!


LEDin Christmas card video:

LEDin suits everybody! It doesn't matter who you are or where you are from, as long as you would like to say hello to anyone, LEDin is for you!



 

You can choose any of the LEDin postcards from one of our FIVE categories: Countries&Cities, Special Occasions, Zodiac, Light Buzz and Baubas!


All of our LEDin postcards are designed and made with love. Please help us bring that LEDin light to the real world!

Check out all of the LEDin's collections now to see how you can enlighten someone’s day today!



Don't you find most postcards these days are a bit…how should we say…dark and drab? Our team thought we should brighten up postcards so you can convey your experiences and adventures with a little bit of that extra shine. Currently, we designed 22 LEDin cards highlighting the main hotspots, and landmarks as well as the cultural diversity that makes your adventures and experiences so special for different countries around the world! (Germany, Spain, Italy, Netherlands, Canada, Mexico, Egypt, Australia, Japan, Russia, Singapore, Greece, Belgium, Turkey, Lithuania, North Korea, Brazil, China, Dubai, England, France and USA) 

We are extremely sorry that it is not possible to include all countries and cities at the moment. However, if you have any suggested countries or cities, please contact the LEDin team. We really appreciate your help!


                 


Countries& cities collection:




Considered sending a card with your Christmas gift? Still writing Thanksgiving messages on simple old stationary? Want to make that special someone feel extra special on Valentine's Day? LEDin has the solution for you!

Our team designed 18 postcards that best exemplify those special occasions. At the moment, those events are Easter, Thanksgiving, Teachers Day, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, April Fools', Christmas, Halloween, New Year, Graduation, Wedding, Promotions, Birthday, Giving Birth, Music and Get Well Soon. 

If you have any other occasions that you want to shine some light on someone’s day, please let us know! Our team is happy to hear from you and see what we can do to help you out!

               


Special occasions collection:


Bring the stars to your hands! Twelve simple, but exclusive, zodiac postcards including all constellations are available. The zodiacal symbols are designed as the buttons. Once the button is pressed, three stars on the constellation will start blinking, bringing the bright white stellar skies to shine brightly in your hands!

                  


Zodiac collection:


Light Buzz is a series of cards designed for when you want to convey that special message to friends, family, loved ones…and maybe ex-loved ones and enemies. The whole conversation is about friendship, love or betrayal and dislike between the mailer and the sender.

Keep Calm:

                  


Keep calm collection:

              

Text only:

                  


Text only collection:


Meet the loveable Baubas! The Baubas Series, which means monster in Lithuanian, is designed by our illustrator Milda Karpavičiūtė. The LEDin team is very pleased to take you into Baubas's wonderland.



IF you have the custom designed request, just tell us your requirements. The LEDin team are looking forward to working with you to convey whatever your message is and will guarantee your satisfaction.



You could choose the backside styles of the postcard also, here are the six options:




We've been sketching and prototyping LEDin postcards for the past year. We are now ready to start lighting up the world with our designs! Now all we have left is to start manufacturing! Please help us bring light to the world and make it happen! 

Select your favourite perk today and we won't let you down! 


A survey will be followed to confirm your LEDin selections. Additionally, 5% to 30% discount codes for our online store will be given to show the gratitude of the LEDin team.


If you have any concerns please don't hesitate to contact us through INDIEGOGO, Facebook, Twitter, email (support@ledintech.com) or leave a comment. Thank you for your supporting!! 




 



Follow us on Facebook, Youtube, Twitter, Instagram AND OUR OWN WEBSITE.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LEDinTech

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg6XudSm9PcmT30cKLKy1Ng

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LEDintech

Instagram: https://instagram.com/ledintech/

Pinterest: https://uk.pinterest.com/LEDintech/

LEDinTech: http://www.LEDinTech.com


Please check the guidance on weight and size restrictions of postcards and letters in your country. LEDin postcards are thicker than the ordinary postcard according to US and UK standards. But don't worry, you only need to pay letter prices to send LEDin to your friends!

It's completely safe to mail LEDin postcards. The flexible battery involved is environmentally friendly. It has the Certification for Safe Transport of Chemical Goods according to IATA Dangerous Goods Regulations (DGR) 56th Edition. The battery is functioned based on zinc and manganese dioxide, which are not harmful to the environment. 

The switch button of LEDin is specially designed to avoid pressing by mistakes during the postage.

story:
中文(繁體) | 中文(简体) | 한국어 | ภาษาไทย | 日本語

 

Sgnl is the smart strap that enables you to answer phone calls through your fingertip. Simply place your fingertip to your ear while speak through the embedded microphone. Replace your existing watch strap with Sgnl and you’re done, whether you wear a classic watch or an Apple Watch, Samsung Gear, or Pebble Time. 

 

 

 

 

Sgnl in the Media

 

Fingertip Communication

Hear your caller’s voice simply by placing your fingertip on your ear as you speak through a microphone embedded in the Sgnl strap.  

 

How Sgnl Works

Sgnl receives voice signal from your phone through Bluetooth. When a voice signal is received, Sgnl will generate vibration through its Body Conduction Unit (BCU) which transmits the vibration through your hand to your fingertip. As transmission is made through vibrations, there is no risk of harm to the human body. When you place your fingertip to your ear, the vibration echoes to create amplified sound within the closed space of your ear.

 

 

Sound Quality Test

The Blue graph represents the original sound signal, as inputted and the Magenta graph represents sound signals when received through the tip of the fingertip. In the transmission of speech, the voice frequency ranges approximately around 2000 Hz. Within this range, the sound signals through the fingertip don’t show much variation from the original inputted sound signal.

However, when this 2000Hz threshold is exceeded, the disparity between the sound signals begins to grow. This growing variance shows that it can be difficult to experience high quality sound when listening to music through the fingertip. 

With Sgnl, our primary focus is the transmission of the human voice, therefore we continue to diligently work towards lessening variation in that frequency range. Once frequency response in that range meets our standards, we have plans to extend Sgnl’s functionality to work across a wider range of frequencies.

Hear the Evolution of Sgnl: A comparative sound quality test

January 2016 (featured at CES)

 May 2016

 July 2016 (featured at IFA)

Watch Compatibility

Sgnl is a wearable smart strap, a watch companion. It is designed to fit all sorts of classic and smart watches with its specially designed lug adapter. Upgrade your watch strap now!

 

Even if you wear your watch on your right hand, ensure that Sgnl main body & Sgnl band are attached in the same position in relation to the watch face: Attach the band at the 12 o' clock position and connect Sgnl at the 6 o’clock position

 

Watch Compatibility Guide


The Sgnl App

Experience More in Your Life

The Sgnl works seamlessly with the Sgnl app to make your day healthier, more manageable, and organized. 

 

 

Hardware & Specification

 

What's included in the package

 

Our Team

About Innomdle Lab

Sgnl is the brainchild of Innomdle Lab, the first company ever to officially spin off from Samsung Electronics. Pronounced ‘i-nom-dul’, it means ‘dudes’ or ‘guys’ in Korean with an added nuance of friendliness and intimacy. It also stands for 'Innovation Medley', which conveys the team’s ambition for the endless pursuit of innovation through resolving daily discomfort with ground-breaking technology. 

 

Innomdle Lab began as an internal project of Samsung through its new internal acceleration program, C-LAB, in 2014. In September 2015, after only about a year of acceleration and incubation, Innomdle Lab became the first company to officially spin off from Samsung, because of its outstanding performance. Upon incorporation, Samsung contributed a small amount of seed funding, with no board seats. Although Innomdle Lab began within Samsung, it is now a fully independent company with all IPs, and no board seats available to people outside of the company.

Story & Timeline

With just a small simple idea, CEO Hyunchul Choi developed Sgnl after winning 1st place during Samsung's C-LAB competition in 2014. He stated, "A colleague was boasting about his smart watch, but was embarrassed by the fact that everyone around him could hear the conversation. As the number of smart watch users increases, they will all face the same problem." From there, CEO Choi began to wonder if there was a way to solve this and came up with the idea of using one's finger to transmit sound. He immediately proposed the idea to Samsung's internal corporate venture department and thus Sgnl was born.

 

Evolution of Sgnl

We believe in the power of design. We’ve gone through numerous prototypes to make Sgnl sleek and easy to use. Take a look below to see how Sgnl has evolved from its first prototype to its current and final design (5th generation, Sgnl).
story_txt:
中文(繁體) | 中文(简体) | 한국어 | ภาษาไทย | 日本語 Sgnl is the smart strap that enables you to answer phone calls through your fingertip. Simply place your fingertip to your ear while speak through the embedded microphone. Replace your existing watch strap with Sgnl and you’re done, whether you wear a classic watch or an Apple Watch, Samsung Gear, or Pebble Time. 
There's no one who never lost their earphone in their lifetime. With Sgnl, you can keep your cell phone alone in your pocket and simply raise your hand to answer a phone call without carrying any extra headset or earphone. When you place your finger to your ear, your finger not only transmits the sound but it also blocks out background noise. So you can hear very clear voice in a loud places without worrying about other people listening in.      Sgnl in the Media Fingertip CommunicationHear your caller’s voice simply by placing your fingertip on your ear as you speak through a microphone embedded in the Sgnl strap.   How Sgnl WorksSgnl receives voice signal from your phone through Bluetooth. When a voice signal is received, Sgnl will generate vibration through its Body Conduction Unit (BCU) which transmits the vibration through your hand to your fingertip. As transmission is made through vibrations, there is no risk of harm to the human body. When you place your fingertip to your ear, the vibration echoes to create amplified sound within the closed space of your ear.  Sound Quality TestThe Blue graph represents the original sound signal, as inputted and the Magenta graph represents sound signals when received through the tip of the fingertip. In the transmission of speech, the voice frequency ranges approximately around 2000 Hz. Within this range, the sound signals through the fingertip don’t show much variation from the original inputted sound signal.However, when this 2000Hz threshold is exceeded, the disparity between the sound signals begins to grow. This growing variance shows that it can be difficult to experience high quality sound when listening to music through the fingertip. With Sgnl, our primary focus is the transmission of the human voice, therefore we continue to diligently work towards lessening variation in that frequency range. Once frequency response in that range meets our standards, we have plans to extend Sgnl’s functionality to work across a wider range of frequencies.Hear the Evolution of Sgnl: A comparative sound quality testJanuary 2016 (featured at CES) May 2016 July 2016 (featured at IFA)Watch CompatibilitySgnl is a wearable smart strap, a watch companion. It is designed to fit all sorts of classic and smart watches with its specially designed lug adapter. Upgrade your watch strap now! Even if you wear your watch on your right hand, ensure that Sgnl main body & Sgnl band are attached in the same position in relation to the watch face: Attach the band at the 12 o' clock position and connect Sgnl at the 6 o’clock position Watch Compatibility Guide
The Sgnl AppExperience More in Your LifeThe Sgnl works seamlessly with the Sgnl app to make your day healthier, more manageable, and organized.

Our TeamAbout Innomdle LabSgnl is the brainchild of Innomdle Lab, the first company ever to officially spin off from Samsung Electronics. Pronounced ‘i-nom-dul’, it means ‘dudes’ or ‘guys’ in Korean with an added nuance of friendliness and intimacy. It also stands for 'Innovation Medley', which conveys the team’s ambition for the endless pursuit of innovation through resolving daily discomfort with ground-breaking technology.  Innomdle Lab began as an internal project of Samsung through its new internal acceleration program, C-LAB, in 2014. In September 2015, after only about a year of acceleration and incubation, Innomdle Lab became the first company to officially spin off from Samsung, because of its outstanding performance. Upon incorporation, Samsung contributed a small amount of seed funding, with no board seats. Although Innomdle Lab began within Samsung, it is now a fully independent company with all IPs, and no board seats available to people outside of the company.Story & TimelineWith just a small simple idea, CEO Hyunchul Choi developed Sgnl after winning 1st place during Samsung's C-LAB competition in 2014. He stated, "A colleague was boasting about his smart watch, but was embarrassed by the fact that everyone around him could hear the conversation. As the number of smart watch users increases, they will all face the same problem." From there, CEO Choi began to wonder if there was a way to solve this and came up with the idea of using one's finger to transmit sound. He immediately proposed the idea to Samsung's internal corporate venture department and thus Sgnl was born. Evolution of SgnlWe believe in the power of design. We’ve gone through numerous prototypes to make Sgnl sleek and easy to use. Take a look below to see how Sgnl has evolved from its first prototype to its current and final design (5th generation, Sgnl).
